links_reviews_text: Fit is great! They are comfy with just the right amount of give. I don't love the tie at the ankles. Might be better dressed up with heels than sneakers.
Got so many compliments on these. Fit well and a fun twist on plain black jeans! Also shameless plug for these 27 Edit shoes ;)

These are super cute and fun to wear. The denim is slightly heavy and some structured than most. As others mentioned, the little ties can be tricky to get right. When they show up in bag the ties are all folded in. I pre-tied them, used my steamer and got them nice and flat so they showed up. I thought they might pinch back in to nothing as I wore them, but they stayed at attention the whole time I had them on. I am wearing the RTR Nanette Lepore black silk wrap top with it in photo and got soooo many compliments on the outfit. I am a jeans size 28 but got the 27 based on looking at reviews from others my size/weight and I'm so glad I did, they fit perfectly.
Sized up and they were too big. Didn't get bows quite right but made them work.
Runs real small, too bad because they are cute!
They were cut to start the day, but got baggier as the day went on. Really wanted to love them.

These are black jeans, but the little tie at the ankle elevates them just a bit. Pretty thick denim with not a ton of stretch. Like regular denim, they will loosen out with wear. These are more low rise, not super low but definitely below the waist. I liked them a lot, will probably rent again.
Now on ankles didn't come out as pictured
These are supposed to be short pants, but they were long on me. I rolled them up once to make do, would not get these again.

links_reviews_title: I thought the ties were cute. They were actually the bad part of the jean.
links_reviews_text: These jeans fit great and were totally true to size. But, and this is a big but, the tie at the bottom was weird. Because the tie is made of thicker denim, they don't tie as cute as they do in the photos and they lie weird.

links_reviews_title: Stretches out as you wear them, would size down
links_reviews_text: Comfy but stretches out while you wear them

links_reviews_title: super cute, would have kept wearing 'daily' but I wanted to try something new
links_reviews_text: nice weight, comfortable fit, tie took a little getting used to but once I figured out how to make the bow look pretty it stayed in place - I recommend tightening and opening the fold of the bow when you take it out of the package or else it just looks squished

This bag was described as a "tote" so I was expecting it to be on the larger side. The description didn't have the bag dimensions, so I went with it. The bad was TINY! Hand in photo for scale. Could fit the essentials (phone, keys, card holder), but I was looking for a bag I could just toss everything in without having to switch to a smaller wallet. The color is stunning though!
I wish I had more of a chance to use this bag. It is really tiny but still cute for running errands.

This was way outside my comfort zone, both the design and the color. SO glad I tried it, one of my most favorite rentals! Runs a little big. I could see this working well for many different body shapes (I'm a pear myself). Fun movement and I ended up liking the color. Unique top, a total joy to wear. This will be one I rent again!
Funky mix between shirt and dress that could be casual, styled for work, or worn for fun. Genuinely love it and will probably come back to rent again or even buy.
Wasn't sure if this would work but I ended up loving it. I wore to work with boots (pictured), on a plane w white sneakers & leather jacket, and again on vacation with heeled sandals.
Was worth a wear...interesting and fashion forward. Not going to show off your bod, but fun to wear for a night.
Absolutely loved this top. It was comfortable for a very long work day and got lots of compliments. It's the right combo of edgy, different and fun.

I absolutely love this shirt! The "inside" base shirt is made of a thicker quality material with the flowy dress-type material extending long past the inside shirt. This shirt is so unique and eye catching! I'm usually very basic with clothing choices, but this shirt made me feel adventurous and I received a lot of compliments. I definitely plan to rent it again! If you are considering it, absolutely give it a try!

links_reviews_title: It's really dramatic and different without being wild or too colorful.
links_reviews_text: Wore it to work and concert. I really wish I could buy this one.
Very comfortable. I loved the asymmetrical line and design. I wore it first on a vacation travel day and it was a great choice. I wore it to work as well.
Cute

True to size. I usually wear L-XL in tops and would have sized up if XL were available. It was tight in the top (it's actually a black t shirt under the thinner fabric), but I wore it at work one day and got several compliments. The slit on the right side goes all the way up to almost bra length. You definitely want to wear pants/shorts that aren't see thru underneath.

Super cute unique casual style. Runs a little big in my opinion. I rented once in a M which was just fine but wanted something a little more fitted. It's a lot of shirt so I wanted to minimize the extra material. So I rented a S the 2nd time around. Both times looked fabulous!

Super comfy but cool and elevates your outfit immediately. Tons of compliments. Cotton T underneath the flowy chiffon tiered part with longer sleeves than expected but loved. Wore with cigarette pants with showing ankle and flatforms. Tried with longer straight leg silk pants but found the cigarettes more flattering
Comfy and cute all at the same time! Also surprisingly light and breathable for so much fabric. Tempted to buy.... :)
Felt super edgy in this top and got lots of compliments. It's not exactly form fitting so I tried to feminize it with some lipstick and heels. Felt like a total fashun blogger.

Overall I liked wearing this--I would never have picked it out to purchase so it was cool to be able to wear it once and be done. It was a roomy fit, which I like, and I wore it over spanx faux leather leggings. I liked how it had a unique silhouette but gave it a 3 because it wasn't something I could see myself wanting to wear ever again.
I love clothes that fit but aren't form fitting. This was the perfect level of fancy for a Carnegie Hall concert but still being able to thrown on a leather jacket for work!
Loved this top. Fit perfectly. Wish I could have purchased, but only 10% off $500. Got lots of compliments.

I finally understand what love is after renting this amazing piece. It's essentially a T-shirt but with an amazing detail. Super comfy and I received so many compliments on this. Definitely a winning piece!

This was such a good piece to wear to work with a pair of easy leggings. I think the fit is supposed to run a bit big, but I felt that the arms/sleeves looked a bit big and awkward on me. Everywhere else fit great. I paired with a jean jacket to dress down a bit and it looked great together.

links_reviews_title: Wore with shorts and over the knee boots to dress it up. I had so many compliments. Didn't expect it
links_reviews_text: Very Flowy.
Perfect weekend outfit! Very comfortable, great material.

It looks like a dress from the front, but from the side and the back, you can see it's a t-shirt. The print is beautiful. I love the way the long fabric flows when you walk. I wore it with a pair of black jeans underneath. It's a comfy piece that's great for work or the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Best rental so far this spring!
links_reviews_text: This is a wow piece! Endless compliments from men and women of all ages. It's figure flattering and the extra length wasn't bothersome as I had feared. The fabric and pattern are lovely in person. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: This shirt is not husband friendly
links_reviews_text: My husband was so mortified by this shirt that he refused to be seen in public with me while wearing it. It's comfy and definitely an interesting design, but overall it was just ok. Wore it once and returned.
#unique

I loved wearing this top. The pattern, cut, the fit, overall a beautiful piece of clothing. I Loved to flow of the bottom portion. I paired it with leggings for a super comfy and stylish look. I got lots of complements.
This tee shirt was funky and fabulous. It's a black tee shirt with layers of long sheer silky fabric. One side of the tee shirt has a slit. It was a little longer on me bc I am shorter.
No one can ever believe it's just a t-shirt until they touch it. I've rented this RTR item twice now and get the most compliments. I feel super comfy, classy, and amazing
Loved the fit. Very comfortable and stylish.

links_reviews_title: wore it for a cocktail event and got lots of compliments, great piece.
links_reviews_text: got a medium, should have worn small.
Easy to dress up or down. The top structured part is like a thick t-shirt material, the rest of the top is more flowy. Lots of compliments!

Loved this top and will definitely be renting again in the fall. The material is a little heavy for the summer, but the quality is amazing and the top looks really cute with leggings or bike shorts. I'm 5'2 and the bottom of the fabric is about an inch to 2 inches off the ground in flat shoes. Super cute and super unique. High recommend
Unique piece, and easy to style with leggings, skinny crop ankle jeans, or black cutoff shorts
Big and not very comfortable

I loved everything about this top! I wore it to work, & out for the night with black jeans and white sneakers. I received so many compliments. Great fit, comfortable, flattering. I would rent again in a heartbeat. Seriously considering buying this piece. It's fun, it's edgy, it has everything!
It is flowy and does run long. Had to pair with a heel. Tons of compliments!
Love this shirt. I wouldn't recommend it for women 5'6" or shorter unless they're wearing heels. I wore it with flats and the length was difficult to navigate on stairs
Would def rent again. Got a lot of compliments. Comfy and easy to wear.
I loved this long too. I wore it with leggings underneath and heels. Felt very stylish.

links_reviews_title: Unique! Nice drape to the fabric. Comfy and fun.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an outdoor graduation party. It was a perfect mix of casual chic. Flattering and fun! If I rent it again, I will go with a small. I had a medium which was a tad large in the shoulders and sleeves but it still fit nicely.
Size up. So cute, dress up or down.
This jeans are really pretty. I really like the embroidery on the sides. Also quite comfortable.
Pants are usually difficult for me because I am petite height but my waist is a 27. These were the perfect length on me and they fit like a glove around my waist. Would rent again!!
I love these pants SO MUCH!!!! True to size, so flattering (my booty looked FAB) and the detail on the sides is GORGEOUS!!!!

Shockingly - the design on these pants is just right - not too flashy, not to plain! These fit me perfectly and would be great for everyday wear (glad they are white since it has been 100 degrees here this week)
Definitely considering keeping this pair of pants! They are flattering, comfortable, and unique. I am 5'3 and they are a true cropped fit.
Glad i sized up! These are really comfy and have gorgeous detail work. They do seem a little worn in from wear and are off white, not white white. Really fun and I'd definitely rent again.

I got these jeans for a weekend in Austin and they were great! They are really more of an off white or sand color which was perfect for March. The crop length was just right for me at 5’4. I wore the 27s which had enough room in the thigh without a ton of gaping at the waist which is often my problem. They were comfortable to wear all day. The detail on the side is adorable and more noticeable in person than in the photo. The colors in the detail do somewhat limit what tops you can pair with them. I would rent these again.

links_reviews_title: Details for days and stretchy comfort too!
links_reviews_text: The fit is awesome like right below the belly button and the stretch in the jean was great too! The details are so cute! I really loved my outfit but these are cute with so many different tops and shoes...i just might keep them a while!
Super cute embellishments on the sides! Fit perfectly! Got a few compliments! I would never buy, they seem impossible to keep clean, but renting them.. they're great!
Beautiful detail & super comfortable. They are stretchy so they were a little baggy.

What an amazing pair of jeans from Tory Burch! The embroidered and embellished ribbon down the side adds the perfect level of decoration to these jeans. They do run true to size, and they have a bit of stretch for comfort. At 5'5" they fell right at my ankle and were comfortable to wear in the office the entire day. I paired these with gold sandals and jewelry, but with so many colors in the ribbon you have a variety of choices with your accessories! Wear these to a family BBQ and be the envy of every other denim-wearing attendee!
Adorable jeans. Great quality and fabric. I would rent these again. Lots and lots of complements!
I liked the color and detail at the sides. Can be dressed up or down. They are somewhat stiff though
Could not even get these all the way up despite them being my usual size. They were cute.
liked it so much I bought them

I like the off-white color of these jeans, and the embroidery stitched down the outside seams is really beautiful. Length was good as well. But the denim was somehow uncomfortable. It almost felt starched it was so stiff. Cute to rent, but not something I would wear a lot due to the comfort factor.
Size up.
The fit was odd, I think I’ll try a larger size
Beautiful nice material but very short
I thought these were cute on the hanger but did not like how they fit on me. I did not find them flattering. Maybe for someone younger?

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments every time I wore these capri pants.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Runs small compared to my Anthropology jeans. Did not wear.
links_reviews_text: Cute detail on the legs. The pants flare out at the bottom which looked a bit odd to me.

links_reviews_title: Way too short for long legs
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8 and have long legs and these hit about 6 inches above my ankle making them capris Such cute detail but not into the Capri look
fit was fine...true to size. The cropped length just wasn't flattering on me so I returned them. I did think the trim running down the leg was very nice looking.
These are beautiful - I bought them.
The fit is fantastic and the color is a winter white so you can really wear them all year round. The detail on the sides is beautiful. Wore with both a sweater and a tank - versatile!
The pants are cute and very stylist. Better for straight hip women. Not so great/flattering for curvy women.

links_reviews_title: cute pants. just a smidgen too tight.
links_reviews_text: I'm a true 27 and these pants were just a wee bit too tight to be comfortable. will try 1 size up next time.

links_reviews_title: Could not get them on and I wear a 29 in many other brands.
links_reviews_text: Size up if you are used to JOE sizing or AG
Unique pants. Goes with many things. Nice way to spice up the wardrobe

Didn't wear. I should have known better than to order these. I'm curvy and a true size 12 and these were too tight. There is also a bit of a weird flare at the bottom. The detail on the side is beautiful and the fabric is nice. They are cream, not white.
Not for girls with full thighs. I guess I should steer clear from pants by this designer.
These were too small for me so I returned

links_reviews_title: very forgiving, creating a great fit! luved.
links_reviews_text: fit great!

links_reviews_title: Runs small usually wear 28 should have sized up to a 29
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a 28 should have sized up to a 29

links_reviews_title: really great recieved lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: considering buying!

links_reviews_title: Wore casually and love them. So cute!
links_reviews_text: True to size

Loved these pants so much! I wore them to work and got so many compliments from men and women. The length was cute for spring and the designs down the side made the white pants so unique. Material was stretchy so ran a little big but can't wait to rent these again!
I wore these both to work and to a Cinco de Mayo party--the side details are great, very unique, and allow them to be matched with many colors of tops. Super comfortable and flattering.
Not a great photo I took so it's hard to see but the shoulders were somewhat fine but it was massive around the waist. It was comfortable to travel and looked chic.
Has nice fabric, the front works well the back has so much extra fabric that it makes you look like Qassimodo, made it work with a jacket, but would not have been able to take it off.
I rented this for work but was unable to wear it. Definitely runs large - would size down 1-2 sizes due to boxy fit.
Wore for work but with a blazer over b/c the armholes were so large my bra showed thru
Id suggest sizing down but I think you can't fix strange design
Decent work too. Cut is strange but fine for work!
The material felt like a cheap cotton which I wasn't expecting but it was a cute pattern and cute style. Wouldn't buy this from jcrew but it was a good rental!

links_reviews_title: Easy cute top for work or play
links_reviews_text: Very cute print and light fabric that is perfect for spring weather. I had to roll the sleeves because they were an awkward length for me, but I am 6'0", so this happens a lot.

Beautiful floral pattern. Bright and fun. Fit perfectly, the buttons didn't pull and the sleeves were not too long. I was very happy with this shirt and wore it several times before returning. Bonus: it came new with tags still attached!!
Fit well, cute for work. I wore it tucked in.

links_reviews_title: Fun top for the spring transition weather
links_reviews_text: Great too for transition seasons since its long sleeve, but the material is extremely like and breathable. Fun pattern with beautiful colors. Easy to wear to work or casually outside of work.

links_reviews_title: Casual shirt. True to size. Wore to work but would work gray with jeans for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: Great for casual event or work

I love a lot about this shirt. The fabric weight and hand is nice and lightweight. The pattern and color are vibrant. The detailing at the shoulders is lovely. However, the way the hem is cut and stitched causes the dreaded shirt roll-up. You know what I mean? When the bottom hem doesn't lie flat but rather rolls up and no amount of ironing will ever get it to go back flat again.
I decided against wearing this as the sleeves hit me a little short of my wrist. Could be cute with the sleeves rolled but wasn't what I was looking for
Nice casual top. Splash of color to my typical drab pallet.
Billowy cut but good for being tucked into a skirt or pants at work. Great color and print
Cute summer sweater but it's a little itchy!
Not as crispy as in the pictures but a bright sweater to wear with fun detail
Cute sweater with a bit of a peplum bottom. Sleeves are longer than shirt sleeve but. It quite 3/4 length. Mid weight sweater that has seen some wear. Came wrinkled out of package. Wore with jeans.
This shirt is fun and different. Only downside is the fabric is itchy which can be uncomfortable. But really liked wearing it for work to try something new!
This top runs large, and I was actually in between sizes. I went down because otherwise my normal size was a little shapeless. V cute for spring!

Not as boxy as I had expected, cute detail on the front and got a few compliments on the color. All stated it was very springy. I do not know if that's good or bad. I love the ruffle along the hem, especially how it hits in the back. Great sleeves, not too belled so I'm able to type all day at work.

links_reviews_title: Wore it three times! Flirty, girly and stylish
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater!!! Runs true to size, maybe a tad small
Cute, fun, eye-catching. Can dress it up or down. Ever so slightly itchy, but not too bad. Got lots of compliments. Loved the style and color of this fun top. Would rent again.
I felt this ran a little big, but loved it anyway.
Just meh- cute top, would probably rent again if I need a simple top with black pants.
Thick, sweater material, cute addition to the work attire.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear due to condition, but would have been very cute
links_reviews_text: When I took this out of plastic I noticed that it looked pretty worn. But I tried it on, and it fit perfectly, and was super cute. Unfortunately, after a few seconds, I noticed that it reaked of sweat. This particular sweater definitely needs to be retired to the garbage can, as dry cleaning obviously didn't get the smell out. RTR immediately opened a spot for me, but this is the second item I've received in unwearable condition in a month. It wastes time that I am paying for membership.
Simple and easy.
Dress up or dress down, great color, flattering fit

links_reviews_title: fit and design is flattering but too itchy for me
links_reviews_text: Would have been a great out fit if the quality of the fabric was better
I didn't wear because I was swimming in this sweater. I think it could be cute, so if I rent again I'll size down at least two sizes.
Nice top. Not well shaped but color is good Missed being great because it is boxy Would size down

This is a beautiful shirt and fits true to size. Aka I sized up to a L and don't need to. I don't give it five stars because the wool blend is a little scratchy. I will wear this again when the temperatures are cooler and see if it's scratchy.

links_reviews_title: I wore this top to an industry conference and it definitely stood out as a bright pop of color.
links_reviews_text: The top technically worked but I think it could have been slightly more fitted to be more flattering.
Very cute. Received lots of compliments. A little long past waist.

links_reviews_title: Good for work and not much else
links_reviews_text: Nice for work. Conservative, but a nice bright color for spring. Just the right weight for a transitional sweater.
Perfect for the weekend!!

Got lots of compliments on this top. True to size but if in between sizes possibly size up. Length his just above pants so could see this being possibly too short for some depending on size rented and body type. Would have loved to buy but way too expensive

links_reviews_title: a little fun to add to work attire
links_reviews_text: beautiful, fun top.. loved the detail
Flatters, warm enough to wear without jacket
Fit great and got lots of compliments
It fit very well, very cute. Ruffly without being overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: I didn't like how the ruffle fell on my rear side.
links_reviews_text: I didn't like how the ruffle fell on my rear side.

links_reviews_title: Adorable top! Lil bit itchy fabric
links_reviews_text: This top was so cute to wear. I'm not sure why the fabric was a little bit itchy. Maybe the dry cleaning? Maybe the fabric itself?
Loved this top! Got so many compliments. Wore it with jeans and black riding boots. Will rent again!
The top is a little sparkly which is fun. The shape works great with tight pants. The only thing that was odd was the line between the top sparkly pattern and the bottom pattern was a little stiff.

Warm, boxy fit (including wide sleeves), a little scratchy mostly due to the sparkly fabric at the top. I wore with a tank under to help with the scratchiness and also made the length a little safer on a cold day (not really cropped, just a little shorter fit). Not in love with it, but no major complaints.

links_reviews_title: Sparkly on the top with interesting detail
links_reviews_text: Cool sweater especially with the top and bottom contrast, but stuck to me all day (static) And ran large

links_reviews_title: Warm and a bit sparkly - perfect for December
links_reviews_text: Generous fit. Comfortable.

The sweater was a little too boxy for me in this size but forgiving if you're wearing to a eat a big meal ;) The metallic threading on the top portion of the sweater really makes it stand out. The fabric wasn't too itchy but I wore a camisole underneath.
This sweater is a little sparkly and glittery! I wasn't expecting that. It was perfect for dressing up black jeans on a cold day. Really cute with a matching hat!
Cozy sweater. Boxy fit, but warm and comfortable for casual weekend wear.
I really like the pattern on this sweater, but the fabric was itchy so it wasn't comfortable to wear all day. The fit was nice and loose, but it would have been nice if the material was soft.
The print was cute, but the cut felt wide and boxy. Wore it several times, but nothing too special to it.

I read other reviews and knew it had sparkles. But still wasn't sure about them after receiving. My husband liked it. I wore a couple times, it wasn't my favorite, but something different. It is a thin sweater.
It's a great winter sweater with a little extra sparkle in the thread. Not itchy, and it was warm. I preferred to style it with a french tuck into a light wash denim.
Perfect fit and beautiful sweater.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for everyday comfort
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater and hangs nicely, but the fabric around the collar is a bit itchy and uncomfortable.
I wore this a couple of times to different casual events. It was very soft and warm. The top has sparkle to it which adds a pop.

Great sweater for a ski weekend. It was a bit itchy on my sensitive skin but I wore a think layer underneath, which I needed for the cold anyways. The shape is not overly flattering, but I was moreso looking for comfort. I enjoyed it and would rent it again for a mountain trip.

links_reviews_title: wore it with black skinny jeans. comfortable look, for every day.
links_reviews_text: cozy sweater.
Somewhat cute, kind of short, very itchy.
A little baggy but that was part of the look - loved the sweater

links_reviews_title: wore it to casual neighborhood party
links_reviews_text: was a little large for me. should've ordered down

links_reviews_title: very cute for the holiday season. the sparkle is festive without being gaudy. boxy fit.
links_reviews_text: very cute for the holiday season. the sparkle is festive without being gaudy. boxy fit.

links_reviews_title: Cute and could be dressed up or down according to the occasion
links_reviews_text: Good comfortable fit, loved the sparkle!

links_reviews_title: Cute, cozy, with a little sparkle
links_reviews_text: I am not one for "sparkly", but this had just a tinge which made it perfect! Great for the cold weather. Con- it is VERY warm....so I dont recommend wearing a shirt underneath unless you are going to take it off.
Top color ended up being much shinier than the picture looked. Not so much my style.
na
A little more sparkle than I need in my life. Liked but didn't love
Very cute design and I like the boxy fit. The shimmery details on the top are really cute for the holidays and I will be wearing this again. Slightly itchy, but i got used to it.

You can't tell from the photo on the RTR site, but the top colored part of the sweater is sparkly. The fabric is a little itchy, so you have to wear a crew neck long-sleeved shirt underneath, but otherwise it's comfortable.
This can be dressed up or down and good for so many occasions. The waist was a little big and the chest was just slightly snug. Either way, I recommend.
Very stylish dress. Love it. Slightly big in a 4. I probably should've ordered the 2.

I've wanted to rent this for a while but was worried it would be too edgy for my conservative workplace. Glad I did it. Classy dress. I'm a solid 4 but think I could've gone with a 2 with this dress. I'm short so thought it added a little bulk but overall loved it

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not flattering for pear shape
links_reviews_text: I would have loved for this dress to be more flattering on me but alas, my hips looked even wider due to the pleats starting right there. I wore for evening dinner knowing I wasn't going to be standing very long and will return... I recommend for anyone else!

I feel like I could wear this dress almost anywhere -- casual with sneakers, my Rothy's to work, heels for a date night. Love the pleated skirt. One watch out: the skirt lining shifts around a lot and rides up when you walk, which isn't the comfiest.

links_reviews_title: I want to marry this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit so well and so flattering. A fantastic combination of faux leather and pleat and conservative enough for work. How strange that sounds but I loved it.
Wore to work and to dinner event. Very flattering cut.

links_reviews_title: This dress was edgy but classy. I dressed it up for a date and also wore to work with a blazer
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Length was perfect for tall girls. Very comfortable to wear

LOVE. This dress is so easy to wear, quite flattering, and works in a lot of situations. I wore it to a casual dinner out, a much more fancy dinner, and work. I'm usually a 10 or 12 and the 12 fit perfectly - 10 would have been too tight. I took it on vacation and it traveled well. I'd be tempted to buy this at a lower price, but as it is I am sure I'll rent it again!

Wore this to opera. Loved the fit on top, and the fun of the leather. I felt very chic in this. The size 4 was perfect. I wear a 6 in some designer brands but Rebecca Taylor and DVF are a solid 4 for me. I dk if that's helpful for sizing.
This dress added 10 lbs to me. I'm a true size 8, but am thicker in the middle. Maybe I needed to size down, but I think it would've been tight then. Didn't end up wearing.
Cute work outfit! Faux leather skirt toughens up an everyday black dress. Great for talls, perfect for a pear shape because of the flattering fit and flare.
Gorgeous dress I love it so much I may buy it.
The top is nubby, bottom is faux leather, which makes a simple black dress more interesting and fashionable. True to size. Great for fall or winter.
1000% will rent again! It was so gorgeous, comfortable and chic!!! Fit perfectly too!

I had previously rented in size 2 and it was too big. The 0 fit much better. I'm very small on top and the dress even has a little room in the waist. I wore on the first chilly day to work and later to an event with tights, booties and a moto jacket. Would have loved to go with heels and no jacket. Would highly recommend.

This dress is modest yet sexy at the same time Love the "leather" skirt and stomach portion of the dress so soft and adds an edge to your typical LBD Fits true to size very comfortable not too tight the skirt flares out a bit Looks better in person Felt sophisticated and classy I paired with silver heels and minimal jewelry Was a little low cut for the modest event I was attending so I added a lace bandeau underneath to cover the Cleavage
This dress was so much cuter on than on the hanger!! Top part is great even if you're bustier - wore to a work party but wasn't inappropriate - and the skirt was a good length for a petite.

links_reviews_title: Classy and professional - So many compliments it was almost embarrassing! Amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fantastic. If it would have been a little tighter on top I would have given it 5 stars. I feel classy and pretty. It is definitely cute enough to wear after work too. Definitely rent this if you want to feel confident and sophisticated.
Classy, edgy and fun! This dress zips up the back but the material actually has some give to it. Loved this dress sooo much!
Perfect if you have a long torso. Wore it to work. True to size but if you have a fuller bust you may need to wear a minamizing bra.
I was able to wear this to work with a sweater and for my special birthday dinner ! I wore a sweater over it and it looked like a skirt. I wore it several times as it was very versatile. Love!
This piece felt just as good as it looked. Great proportions, length made it great for work or formal. Nice fit in the bust for a bigger cupped ladies.
The top on this ran big so I chose to wear it underneath something else. Pleated skirt was a fun detail, but was challenging to walk around the city in!
Loved this dress and would rent again! Received many compliments! I wore it with heels but could be dressed down with flats. Top is made of a heavier material - holds everything in.

links_reviews_title: Great combo of edgy and conservative
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. Considering buying

The dress has a nice weight to it and I wore it to a conference with a blazer and a belt at the waist. The waist at the faux leather skirt was kinda large and awkward, but was fixed with a belt. Cute A-line cut and easy to dress up or down
Love love this dress. the leather pleated skirt adds a sophisticated punch to this LBD
had to lightly steam the pleats but laid well. very fun dress
It's easy to wear and perfect for the work week or business event.
This looked really cute on everyone else here, but I didn't find it flattering - seemed like it made me look a little thick around the waist.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove! So cute and comfy and I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Not too low cut and just below the knee.
A bit loose overall. Classy with an edge. Perfect for work or play.
Love the mix of textures on this one. I go between a size 4 and 6 in dresses, and wear a 4 in this (34D, and no problems with the top either).

links_reviews_title: Super fun add to shake up the work wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 6 in dress but reading these reviews I took a chance to go smaller. For bustier ladies I recommend a lace camisole. I didn't realize that the top was like a woven tweed that makes it look more interesting that the model picture. I paired it with a plum tweed peplum jacket.

links_reviews_title: Cool dress, not the most flattering I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: This was definitely a cool, edgy dress to change up my work wardrobe. I have to be fairly conservative in what I wear to work & this was still ok with a cardigan over it. Received a lot of compliments- not sure I would rent again though because I don't think it did me any favors in terms of flattering my midsection.
Cute on the hanger but the skirt detail made me look hippy, which traditionally doesn't happen that often as my hips are pretty normal sized. This dress would look great on longer torsos

links_reviews_title: A slightly edgy dress. Absolutely loved it!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. Great for a special event or an important work function.

I wore this for a long day at a convention I attended and it was absolutely perfect. Super comfortable and professional but with a bit of edge. I'm 5'10 and the hem fell right at my knees. Love this dress!
Unique dress with contrast of materials that work and looks amazing.

links_reviews_title: Wore it 3 times. Got compliments each time.
links_reviews_text: Such a unique dress. Saw it on a coworker (who also RTRs and had to try it). Wore it to work, work conference, and dinner. Even the flight attendant compliment it and I had a big sweater on over the top after my work conference. One of my fave rentals yet.
Lived this - wore it first day on new job - flew from ATL to NJ then wore it a second time While training in NJ - comfortable. Travels well. Will rent again and consider buying. Flattering

links_reviews_title: Awesome dress, photos don't do it justice
links_reviews_text: Flattering, unique, versatile. Would wear this again and again. Only downside is that it wrinkles quickly and easily, but still beautiful

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved it! It zipped right up, which usually stresses me out if it will or not.
links_reviews_text: Great quality, very age appropriate (I'm 40) but still sexy, nice details.
Wore this to a pitch meeting and slayed. A fun twist on classic black with the studs and the flare skirt

links_reviews_title: Cute and a little different! But long sleeves
links_reviews_text: Cute work dress with a twist - slight puffy sleeves. Sleeves are also long (though I have short arms). Fabric is thin and lightweight.

links_reviews_title: The dress is super pretty! In the picture looks quite basic but it's super classy
links_reviews_text: A bit too big on the waist but in general very flattering

links_reviews_title: Pictures does not do this dress justice
links_reviews_text: This dress is half the reason I signed up for RTR unlimited. It is chic and unique and the pictures do not do it justice! It is very flattering - although a tad shorter than I envisioned. May size up the next time so it's a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Love love love! Flattering cut, unique, comfortable and great quality
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect. I'm busty and it worked well. The skirt got a bit wrinkled throughout the day but still looked great. Beautiful styling and very unique. Comfortable dress also.
I wore this dress to work but I could easily wear it to a party. I got so many compliments! Everyone wanted to know where it was from. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Not as cute as the picture
links_reviews_text: Very stiff fabric
Wore for a work event . The front split panel makes it very easy to wear and forgiving
It fit my body well. A little on the short side for work, but the tulip detail in the skirt made it more appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Thought I would like this more
links_reviews_text: This is the kind of dress I would normally buy for myself: a simple black dress with some nice details that can easily transition from day to night. That said, I liked it but don't LOVE it in the way I thought I would. It's definitely cute and easy to wear, but I thought the "apron" at the waist puffed out in a way that was slightly unflattering. I ended up belting for a more defined waist.
Thinner material than I expected but I loved this dress! Great fit and details. Wore to work a few times!

I rented for work and liked the dress...even received a few compliments. It fits well and design is unique. Would not rent again only because the fabric is very light and my office is freezing, I was cold all day!
Great dress that transitions from work to evening easily. Received several compliments at work on the subtle detail of this dress.

I thought this was a really interesting dress to wear for a work event, but it was SO wrinkled (even coming out of the RTR bag) and then got progressively more wrinkled during the work day. Did ok for a one day wear, but don't get this for travelling!

Great fun dress. Material flows nicely. Fit was perfect. I usually wear an 8 but Chloe tends to run large so went with a 6 which was a good call. It was a little short when sitting but not bad. I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Nice option for a work breakfast/event
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed the look of this dress and how it hung. The sleeves were about 3 inches too long on me so I just tucked them inwards. And the inner layer wrinkled a bit as the day went on, which wasn't the biggest deal. The grommets were my favorite part.
Love this dress. Almost kept it. True to size. Enough said :)
I was underwhelmed when I put the dress on but got lots of compliments.
Fit was great! Got lots of compliments! Wouldn't expected the fabric to be better quality though.
The shoulders were puffy and a bit too school girl for me but otherwise well made and flattering. I went with a lighter floral rental for my son's senior luncheon.
Loved the detailing on a simple black dress, work to after work event. Work it with gold cap black pumps and I was killing it. Lots of compliments!!
This is a nice quality dress, but the sleeves are crazy long, the train hanging in the back felt weird, and it fits oddly in the torso with no give. I'd pass on renting this again.
I've rented this dress consistently for a few months now - it's form fitting but not restrictive, and the second dress layer adds a nice detail to an otherwise standard silhouette. Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, great structured piece
links_reviews_text: I loved the structure on the top of this dress, mixed with the fun bottom. Wore with tights but also could have worn over leggings. Lots of compliments for details on this modern LBD
Lovely details on sleeves and the rivets are so fun
Loved this dress. Fit well. Easy to zip on your own.
Couldn't zip up and not a lot of give in the dress even if I could. Short too

links_reviews_title: More dresses like this one, please
links_reviews_text: This is the kind of thing I joined RTR for (not $50 sweatshirts or J Crew sundresses, sorry). It is dramatic without being silly, beautifully made, with thoughtful details. I found it very flattering. The partial wrap-around skirt acts like a cardigan or a men's tailcoat - it's what you would do to hide your backside, but without actually looking like you're out to hide your backside. It is a smidgen on the short side but I found it okay for work.

links_reviews_title: My son told me that it looked like an outfit from some sort of futuristic distopia -
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't say the dress is not flattering but it's very severe - and it looks kind of cheap honestly, I didn't wear it

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, too short for work
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 6, however, since several other reviews noted this dress runs large, I sized down.....which was a mistake as the dress was just a little too snug to be comfortable, and it was way too short to wear to work. It really is a beautiful dress, but I didn't wear it. Definitely plan on renting again in my regular size.
Wrinkles easily
Comfortable, flattering, wore for work but could also see dressed up for cocktails with strappy heels and bare legs (I wore in January in the northeast so wore tights).
Wore this to work, was super comfortable and got compliments. looks good with flats and heels. interesting cut.
Ran large but was comfortable
Nice dress but awkward for and sleeves to long - did not wear

This top was really lightweight and the fit was great. The depth of the v was appropriate for a night out with friends but would have been too low for an office setting for reference. I'm usually an 8/medium in tops and the medium fit well. I love how in animal print is right now and would recommend this top!

Great basic tank to wear with jeans out to dinner. There was a pull in the top by the bust area, other than that it was very comfortable. A little loose on the top and became slouchy when I was seated.
Such a cute top! Could dress up for down. Wear so many different ways. Tempted to buy this! Will definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Cool top, should have got smaller size
links_reviews_text: Loved this fabric & patten! The silk was super comfortable, & leopard print jazzed things up for day or night. I should have got the Small (wasn't available) though Medium was sliding off my shoulders a bit & too low in front. I'd buy if there was a better discount! Recommend.
Great top! Love it!
Easy, breezy tank. Works for everyday, work day, or night out. It is on the shorter side, but can tuck in or wear out. And you can even wear a regular bra with it.
Very cute. Lightweight material. A little shorter than expected. True to size. Wore with black jeans and a cardigan for work which transitioned well to evening plans.

links_reviews_title: Great on trend animal print cami for everyday or to dress up
links_reviews_text: I ordered the large which fit everywhere except the neckline. I will try it again in the medium to see if it's a better fit for me. If it is, I'd consider buying this one. It's great for work with a sweater or blazer or an evening out.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this because it was too small.
links_reviews_text: I can be between a small and a medium on tops, and this one was too small to wear.
Chest area was too large / low cut.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top so much I purchased brand new from Rebecca Taylor site on sale.
links_reviews_text: This is really a classic, fits perfectly and dresses up and down depending on your day. Love this top!
Goes with everything -- casual to work to dressy.

links_reviews_title: Looked dressed up without feeling over dressed!!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Comfortable feel and fabric.

These pants are very cute with the ruffles. I just don't think they are made for my body type (short, bigger bum). These pants don't have pockets on the back which generally I don't find flattering on me. Because I am short these pants weren't really cropped (which worked in my favor for winter). I think these probably would have looked better on someone taller and less curvy. I didn't feel confident in these. The high waste didn't translate for me - I just felt restricted.
Love the pants but wish I got a size 2

links_reviews_title: Nice work pants with a little extra detail
links_reviews_text: Fabric has good weight and feels luxurious. I sized down but could have gone done another size. Great work pant for my conservative office.
Loved the ruffles. Great work pants!
LOVED! Great details to fancy up work wear.
Loose on the hips and thighs (and I have big ones) Very comfortable!

I read the reviews so I sized down one size and they fit great. I'm a little curvy so they fit my small waist well once I got them over my hips. The hardest part was matching my shoes to such a dark blue.
Loves the fabric and cut of these pants. Rented an 8 when I am a 6 or 8 and couldn't have gone for the smaller size. Loved for a good work event!
They're high on the waist and ankle length. Great with heels and ultra flattering.

links_reviews_title: So nice, would rent them twice.
links_reviews_text: Love, love, love these pants! The ruffles on the pockets are cute without being too much, and help them stand out amongst other work pants. Would recommend always pairing with a form-fitting shirt to really let the detail of the pants shine (and because they start to bulk up how your hips look if you pair them with looser fitting shirts). I tend to run between a size 2 and size 4...and these were definitely a little roomy on me as a 4. But the looser fit made them comfortable and very flattering from the front.
Great fit but a little short overall for tall people. Loved the ruffle touch on the pockets. Great quality material

links_reviews_title: Classic with a hint of fun!
links_reviews_text: These cropped pants are so cute and I loved the ruffles on the pockets! I rented these for work and also wore them out to a nice dinner and night out for work while traveling for work (see pic). There are pleats on the front, so you have to be okay with that. I loved the pleats, but could they definitely add a little volume to your hip area.

links_reviews_title: Great work pants w a little flare
links_reviews_text: -high quality fabric that fell nicely -ruffles are a fun touch, not real pockets which is good for puckering -a touch tight on my athletic calves but not to the point where I didn't wear -great with flats or heels -pretty high-waisted on me at 5'4" -I went down to a 4 and am usually between 4&6. By end of the day I thought 4 was even a touch big but I wouldn't have been able to fit into a 2
Nice, heavy fabric. Higher waist. The scalloped pocket details are such a fun touch. Wore these multiple times and will probably purchase.
5'3", 150 pounds, size 8 way too small. I didn't try exchanging, I didn't know how.
These pants are great for work- the pocket ruffles add some cute detailing. Many compliments!
Did not fit well on the waist and did not look well on my curves. Very pretty pants though
Very cute and interesting pockets, very high wasted, tough to find a top that went well.

links_reviews_title: Simple dark pants, with a little extra flair. Paired well with lots of items in my own closet.
links_reviews_text: I wore these for work and a handful of nice diners, worked well with items I already owned. Defiantly the item I used most in my last shipment. The pocket detail gave it a nice flair just beyond the norm, but still basic enough to work for a few different events. I felt the length was a little odd for me, it could have been and 1" higher or shorter to work better with different style of shoes, but a little extra time trying on different pairs and I found the ones that worked.
Rented these for work. The 8 was a bit big. So I am going to rent a 6 this time to see if they fit better and if so I am also going to purchase. Great pant for work that isn't so blah! So cute!
These were so fun and different to wear to work.
If you have a big butt and small waist- these are the perfect pants for you! Never have I put on a pant that fit me so perfectly, in length too! Can't wait to rent them again!

links_reviews_title: Cute staple pants with a little frill
links_reviews_text: Pants fit well and were flattering I will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: super cute, super duper high waist
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a 6-8 and I'm glad I got a 6 in these. The ruffle detail is adorable. As other reviews say, these are super high - I have a fairly long torso and these went right up to the rib cage. I could have pulled them even higher, actually, but that's probably because they're fairly roomy in the hips and thighs and I don't have enough there to fill them out all the way. Best to wear with a cropped top, otherwise the ruffle detail gets lost, and that's what makes these pants special. Fabric is nice, feels like high quality.
Perfect for work

links_reviews_title: Really slimming pants, wore to panel event.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit! Great for someone who is petite and the ruffles on the pockets are super cute.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. high waisted fit and great detail on pockets
links_reviews_text: High waisted
didn't even wear these--the fit was too weird. May work for someone really tall, but a disaster for someone 5'4"

links_reviews_title: I LOVE these pants! I wish I had gotten a size 4 but super cute!
links_reviews_text: If you're in between sizes I would size down.

I'm giving these a 3 because I do think they are really cute but not for my body type (big hips). They were weirdly baggy in all the wrong places and pooched out in the front by the pleats. I wore them at my waist but the pockets on the back were way too high. Ruffled pockets are a cute touch but since the pleats pooched out that detail got lost. I would recommend for straight and narrow body types.

links_reviews_title: Nice, cute pants for work, but runs too big
links_reviews_text: Pants were very cute, just runts a bit big. I'm hourglass shape and I usually wear a 6 or an 8. Size 8 was a bit big.
These pants fit very well and I like the fabric. I am curvy on the bottom so I loved the fact that the pants were flattering but not not overly revealing

links_reviews_title: The pleats and ruffles on pockets are so much fun!
links_reviews_text: The higher waist and pleats are flattering to the figure. The quality of fabric is top notch. I wish I could wear these pants everyday!

links_reviews_title: Cute but super high cut waist
links_reviews_text: Cute but waist went nearly to my bra line even though this pant was recommended for petites, and I am long waisted for a petite woman.
I rented the 4 but really needed the 2. Would have been cute with a tucked in shirt and booties. No belt loops so couldn't do anything to size down.

links_reviews_title: These are so flattering and adorable...if they fit
links_reviews_text: These are great quality but we're pretty big for me in the waist. Everywhere else fit perfectly and I still consider wearing them but would have had to wear a shirt untucked, since there are no belt loops to wear a belt. And a shirt untucked kind of defeats the purpose because it hides the ruffles. Otherwise, I would have loved these!

links_reviews_title: Love it. Many compliments. High waited. You need a slim shirt.
links_reviews_text: Seemed very high quality. lots of compliments.
I've rented this twice for work; Cute ruffle on the high-waist and fit true to size for me. I didn't want to buy a pant this trendy, but it's been nice to wear the style a few times.
The pants have a nice detail on the pocket. The material stretched, and is form fitting, provides a nice shape. Loved them.
Flattering pants! And the ruffle pockets give them a fun look while still being dressy. Loved them

A little edgy for my buttoned-up office, but it was fun to wear. It's very high-waisted, so in my case it needed an untucked shirt. There is no give in the waistband, so size up if you're on the cusp.

The leather is soft and flows. The metallic is subtle and interesting. Wears well. Can dress up or down. The sizing is foolishly off! I went two sizes up, and it fit perfectly then (note: no give in the waist). I definitely recommend this skirt, but be prepared to size way up.
I enjoyed wearing this piece at Christmas time at the office.

links_reviews_title: Fun skirt - definitely took things up a notch!
links_reviews_text: This skirt was fun to wear on a night out to celebrate. I was surprised to find that it runs small; my free back up size was almost too small to wear. Worked great with a tucked in shirt and black tights; could be worn dresses up more or down. It definitely helped bring a festive mood to the celebration. Would rent again!
The quality of this skirt is amazing. The simplicity plus the dark and kind of shiny grey makes u stand up :)

Wore this to a bar for a birthday party so I needed to dress it down a little. After trying it with tons of tops I went with a simple dark v-neck tee. The waist doesn't have any stretch. I'm about 23" where it hit and probably only had an inch to spare. It's also very static-y especially as I was wearing with tights but I brought some lotion and rubbed a small amount on top of the tights every couple of hours which seemed to do the trick!
Great color and I was able to erase with sweater that covers the top because it was so high waisted. Would order a size up. Wore it and liked how it looked

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, professional and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this skirt, it was the right length to be professional, but still had a bit of an edge to it. I got a lot of compliments on it. There is no stretch in the waist material, but I didn't have any issue with it. Highly recommend!
Pleats are perfect
Loved the color and feel of the skirt. It felt a little tight around the waist. Had to return it and size up.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous skirt you can enjoy dancing in all night!
links_reviews_text: Fit to size though a bit snug, even for someone with a smaller waist. If you are wider in your waist or a straight/athletic build I would recommend going up a size. For those with small waists, should be fine with your normal size. Loved the color and length, great to not have to deal with pulling down a short skirt/dress all night. I'm relatively short and loved where it hit with booties or heels. I wore with tights since it was NYE but could wear without if warmer. Perfect for dancing and enjoying yourself all night without having to worry about it. Highly recommend, I got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: It was shiny and very holiday like
links_reviews_text: I went down in my size as my backup and that one was good but still a little big.

links_reviews_title: Very femine but edgy with it being leather
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my significant others work holiday party! It was beautiful and sophisticated. One issue was static. I wore tights and the skirt and tights kept clinging to each other. Be prepared to habdle that situation if wearing with tights
Love this skirt as you can easily transition from day/office to night/after work cocktails or date. The fabric is soft and has a nice metallic sheen to it. Will def. rent it again.
It was a pretty color and length but it was very tight around my waist
Im in love with this skirt! lots of complements. it runs big, so make sure to get a size bigger.
I wore this once to work with a button up tucked in and once out to a bar with a bodysuit. I will definitely rent again.

Normally I can wear a 4 for a high waisted, "circle-style" skirt. This runs very small, as I had the 6 and it wouldn't even zip up on me. It was cute, but unfortunately didn't have a chance to wear it!

links_reviews_title: N/A The color is beautiful but I couldn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: I needed a size 2 in this skirt.

links_reviews_title: I got this to wear for the weekend and work, but just ended up wearing it to work.
links_reviews_text: My regular size wasn't available, so I sized up and it fit pretty well, so I'd say it runs a bit large. The pleating and length make it conservative enough to be appropriate for work. Easy to wear and very cute.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this skirt - so great for work
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt - I wore it with grey tights, and a black sweater and it was exquisite - I got so many compliments! Would have definitely bought if Spring weren't right around the corner.

links_reviews_title: Just okay. Pleats not ironed down
links_reviews_text: Rented this with my unlimited for a conservative party. Glad I followed the reviews and sized up because the waist is super tight. I feel like this was once a great rental but maybe it's time to retire it. The skirt is supposed to be knife plated all the way around -at least from the photo. No pleats anymore on mine so it was just a big pleather circle skirt.
Material has no flexibility. I sized up and wish I had gone up x 2
The waist was smaller than expected and although I ordered my size I ended up wearing it very high.

links_reviews_title: Way too small in the waist!
links_reviews_text: Ugh! Great material and cool metallic finish but way too small to wear. Sent back ASAP! Darn
I LOVED this skirt! I'm usually a 2 or 4 in skirts and the 4 fit perfectly. It looked super cute with black tights, grey booties, and a black top. I almost bought this, I really loved it
Lays perfect in the front and back!

links_reviews_title: Tiny waist band. Not a fan of the material.
links_reviews_text: I have a small waist. I usually wear a 6 in a skirt and occasionally an 8 but usually 8 is too big in the waist but good for tighter skirts in the hips. The waist was so tiny in this. I could get it on, but it was very uncomfortable. I wanted to take it off almost immediately. Furthermore, the material is paper thin and unlined. This is not a winter skirt. It also felt much cheaper then it was. The pleats are not as firm as I'd like. I also think it's the first time I've seen a non-pencil skirt that can give panty lines. I didn't like the way it lay at all. It was not flattering. This one is going back without wearing it. I feel like it would work better for someone without hips and a super tiny waist. Size up maybe even two sizes depending on your body shape.

This skirt did not work for me at all. I'm generally a 10 or 12, and the 12 was too tight for me. Too small in the waist, too clingy to my belly. I was also not a huge fan of the faux leather, which felt cheap to me. I probably could've made this skirt work in a pinch by wearing a sweater or an untucked skirt over it, but since I have unlimited I decided to just send it back and get something more flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great quality just not a good fit on me!
links_reviews_text: This skirt ran a bit small.
As other reviewers have mentioned, the waist was a little tight. Sizing up solves that problem. I wore this with a black cardigan, black tights, and black T-strap Mary Jane platform heels.
Was tight on 28" waist
I'm a hard 6 always and got the 6 in this skirt. It's adorable but so very tight in the waist. I couldn't wear it. Such a shame!
Very small. I typically wear a 6-8 and this barely fit.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of shine
links_reviews_text: Looks dressy without being over the top. Easily transitions from day to night. Fitted at the waist as others mentioned. I have a narrow waist so wore my regular size, but there was no room to give. Consider sizing up if you have a thicker waist.

Material was thinner and more glittery than I expected. I am typically a size 4 and there was plenty of room at my natural waist in a 4. The weight of the fabric was lighter and less substantial, and showed lines from any shirts I tucked into it. Didn't feel right for winter weather. Decided to just return it.
Waist is too tight. Skirt length is shorter than on model (2" above knee) and material looks more like plastic than faux leather. Not worth it.
My typical size and larger back up size were both too small to zip. This style runs very small, and the fabric was not as thick as I hoped it would be.
Waits runs small. Couldn't wear but would have been lovely.
I loved the texture and color. However, I have a pear shaped body so it wasn't flattering on me. It made me look broader than I am.

links_reviews_title: Comfy material, with stretch. Nothing special
links_reviews_text: Size down. I'm a true 4/6 and I wore an XS. Has elastic waistband. Comfy but nothing too special.

I rented this at the DC store location. I would never have picked this off of the app, but it was new with tags, and the fabric was nice enough. It is very cute and has a nice fit. I wore it to farmers market and a brunch on Father's Day, and another day when I was leaving the gym after swimming. I briefly considered purchasing, but I have other stuff in my closet to wear that is similar. That's why RTR is so great - I don't have to add to my closet and take care of this to enjoy wearing new clothes.
Love this dress, it's so comfy and hangs just right!!

I bought this because it is the perfect dress to be stuck at home in. It is comfortable and I do not feel like a slob in it. You can dress it up or down. It is the perfect foundation to build upon with accessories. Love it!
This dress was a surprise. It is very soft and comfortable. Loved it do much I bought it! Very plus size friendly.

I love this dress. The elastic waist is not super tight. I definitely size it down to Medium. I first rent it in Large. It still fits but the elastic waist dropped a little bit. So I rent Size medium on the following month and it fits perfectly. It's a very comfortable material and I love how fabric falls on my body. It is a thin material; so it will show your underpants or bras shape. So definitely have to wear seamless underwear for this one. Keep your regular size if you want just a touch of room. But definitely size it down from your normal size if you want it to be fitted in a chic/comfy way. (I'm 5'2', 154lb, usually size 12 in GAP/size14 in J.crew).

links_reviews_title: So comfortable you won't want to return it
links_reviews_text: PROS: I could wear this every day. It is so soft and light. It's perfect for casual summer day. It came with the tags on and so I was SO tempted to keep it. CONS: It will show every little bump underneath. I had to throw some Spanx on to go out, but I didn't care. It was still very comfortable.
Loved this fun sparky, cropped black sweater. Perfect for a girls night out with high waisted pants in chilly weather. Puff sleeves, cropped length make it trendy.

RTR Trifecta Paired the Keepsake cropped, shimmery black sweater with the Amanda Upchard lioni high-waisted black skirt and Kendra Scott Fabia statement earrings for a work holiday party. So comfortable and festive. The sweater is perfect for an added touch of glitz and so comfy. I didn't notice how itchy it was throughout the night but if I were sitting for the night I might have felt different. Perfectly cropped for high waisted bottoms to still be office party appropriate!
It's definitely itchy but I loved the fit of the sweater. It's cropped, so perfect with high-waisted jeans and booties. Love the billowing sleeves too

links_reviews_title: Perfect amount of sparkle without overdoing it!
links_reviews_text: Great sweater! Wore it to a few holiday parties and got lots of compliments. It fits very cropped so I needed to wear it with high waisted jeans (I'm 5'7). Absolutely loved how it looked. Could dress it up or down! Only con is that the material is a bit itchy.
It fit very well, was not itchy as I was worried it might be, and sparkled beautifully!

Besides being a little scratchy, I have no cons for this top! I'm really into the bubble sleeves this season, and the sparkles gave it a little something extra! Perfect for the holidays or to spice up your winter wardrobe!

Absolutely LOVE this top, was skeptical when looking at it but, once its on it is wonderful. Super comfy very stretchy so get your true size. If you are busty go up a size to give yourself some wiggle room. You can wear this with any standard bra A+! I would pair this with dress pants high waist pants, if you do low cut your midriff will show.

links_reviews_title: Holiday Sweater perfect for Night Out
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater and received many compliments! It is a crop top, so its short in length but pairs well with high waisted pants or if you want to show some middrift! I went up a size to grab a little more length.

links_reviews_title: A little too fancy for everyday, but gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect fancy sweater, and there's not much more I can say. I'm short, and this sweater was a bit cropped, but only slightly. I wore it to coffee (LOL). I may have actually been over-dressed for the first time in my life.

Wore this for my firm's holiday luncheon and paired with a black taffeta party skirt. I got quite a few compliments. It is a little scratchy, so I wore a shirt underneath it. I did not find that it runs small, I thought the fit was true to size. It does hit pretty high, but I like tops that are shorter in length to pair with high waisted bottoms. I considered keeping it because I liked it so much, but I decided I would probably only wear it for special occasions, and when I do have a special occasion, I usually like to wear something I haven't worn before - so sadly, I sent it back.
I got so many complements while wearing this sweater! Looks great and is unique. Only downside is that it is kind of itchy, but i would still reccommend.
Loved this sweater! You cant tell from the picture but its almost glittery and very festive. It is very cropped so you need to wear it with something high waisted but its a fun top!
flattering, ends in all the right places, cons- scratchy

links_reviews_title: Sent back for a couple of issues
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this. I almost did. It's super cute and fit well, but at my age, I can't wear such a crop. I should've known it'd be too short (check the photos) but I figured high waisted pants would suffice. They didn't. I still had belly exposure. It's also incredibly itchy, so a long sleeve undershirt is required, making the exposed belly fabric limited. I sent it back without wearing. So sad. :(

links_reviews_title: Not for tall or long torso
links_reviews_text: This just did not work for me and my height and I have a long torso, so its always a gamble with crop tops and this was a miss for me. It's adorable just was not flattering on me.
Super uncomfortable because of the itchy fabric and the tightness of the band around the rib cage. It didn't have any elasticity or give at all. Didn't wear bc I'm not showing off my stomach lol.
I didn't wear this because none of my pants were high-waisted enough. Other reviews about the material are right, it's a bit scratch. But I think I would have worn it with the right bottoms.
I did not end up wearing but is a really cute top and looks great on. Is a little scratchy when you put in on, but I think after wearing it for a bit it wouldn't be that bad.

I LOVE this sweater. I love the shimmer to it and also like that the sleeves that balloon out a bit. You can really dress this up or down. It's pretty cropped so need high waisted jeans/skirt to show no skin. It runs maybe a bit on smaller side so would size up if in between.

LOVED this sweater. The crop length is PERFECT- even on me (LONG torso). Paired GREAT with high waisted black jeans. The sleeves are incredible, and the mock neck is perfect- not too tight or high. TONS of compliments on this. My only knock off the 5 star rating: the material is relentlessly itchy.

Very cute sparkly black sweater that screams it's the holidays!! However it is slightly scratchy around the neck. And although there was obvious loss of glitter everywhere I was happy, but I did notice that my palms were all flecked with tiny tiny glitter at the end of the night. Overall very cute, especially if worn with high waisted pants.
Cute sweater but didn't even wear once because so scratchy
the cut of this is beautiful, it's a little drapey in the sleeves but tighter at the waist. goes amazing with a high waisted pant or skirt. so cute for holiday parties or dinner out with the girls !

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it for my event...
links_reviews_text: Very itchy! Nice fit, but couldn't wear it because it was so itchy!
Could not wear. Too itchy
Really enjoyed this top! The sleeves are fun and it looks great on. A little scratchy on the torso but I just wore a tee underneath. Would rent again.
It was definitely unforgettable because I didn't have the chance to wear it due to the size running small. I got a medium and large, but neither size worked out for me.

links_reviews_title: Great birthday celebration for my daughter.
links_reviews_text: It fit great! A little short in the torso and after a few hours it got a little itchy.

I really wanted to love this because the sleeves were really fun and flattering, but the cut of the sweater was just way too short - on my average torso, the bottom of the sweater hit at least 2 inches above high-waisted jeans. If you like short crop tops then this would work great, it just wasn't quite my style.

links_reviews_title: Chic crop sweater to wear with high waisted paper bag pants
links_reviews_text: Being petite/short but curvy (8/10 in dresses) I sized down from my normal M/L for a fitted look. I have a short torso and the sweater hit just at my belly button so it definitely is cropped (I'm 5'1") but because of that it looked great with high waisted black pants that have a bow in the front. It is stretchy and accommodates my 32E chest and extra belly weight. The arms were fitted at the wrist which was nice. The glitter thread is not subtle. I would rent this again.
In between sizes M and L. Nice cut, sequins are beautiful. Mid thigh length for taller women. Received lots of compliments.
Such a cool shape. :)

Rented this for a night out in Nashville, TN. The look and fit of the sweater is great, but the fabric is very itchy. Luckily, the night was chilly and I was fine wearing a cotton black long sleeve shirt underneath so that it wasn't touching my skin.
Worn for a saturday morning gathering where i had to give a presentation - great with super high waisted jeans.
Wow cool, fun sweater. Has sparkles, which do not show in photos. And, the material is a bit stiff. But, it looks so cool!!!

links_reviews_title: Nice to look at; if you can resist the urge to scratch
links_reviews_text: I tried it on and within seconds I had to peel it off. If was super itchy inside. Do not recommend it if you like being comfortable.

I was totally obsessed with this piece! It's definitely not the most comfortable (a little scratchy) but the overall look makes up for it! Perfectly cropped so you're not showing any stomach, but you don't need to tuck it in.
Nice fun sweater. I wore a long sleeve undershirt which kept it from being stratchy. Great cut, love the sleeves and cropped fit.

I was prepared for the cropped look to wear with some high waisted slacks - but this is higher than normal. I did love the sleeves and the overall quality, but it really felt strangely shrunken in the bodice part. Size UP, even if you're like me and usually wear 4/6. I ended up not able to wear this with anything I already had. I think I could have probably made a large work, but oh well.

The sleeves are so cute on this top. It's thicker material-almost sweater like. It's cropped and runs a smidge small. The small was fine with high-waisted jeans (not too much tummy peaking out). The style is really flattering and would be great on a shorter girl.

Rented these pants for a winter ski vacation. They run a bit small. They were long on me but totally fine with my ski boots on. After heavy lunches/apres the pants definitely started to feel a bit tight lol but overall they are great.

I'm a true size 0 so was skeptical about renting when the smallest size was a 2. However with leggings underneath they were perfect. The only issue was the length, they were a too long without shoes but when my skis and boots on they were a good!

I typically wear a 4, but when I rented the 4 in these pants they were way to small. So then I got an 8 (as seen in the pic) and they fit fine but were still a little bigger and longer on me than I would've liked. And then I got a 6 and they fit perfectly! Long story short, size up one size.

links_reviews_title: Ran too small in the waist. Ended up renting the 12.

links_reviews_text: great pant. did not wear the 8R. sized up to 10R because waist of 8R was too tight.

links_reviews_title: Typical skirt for work with a fun hem. Size up!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fun asymmetric hem of this skirt. I recommend sizing up one size since it was a bit snug at the waist. The length was great - not too short and skims right above the knee.

I love this skirt, and it's so versatile! It was mostly true to size except for the part underneath that was a little tight making it slightly hard to walk, especially up stairs/hills/curbs. Overall loved it though, would totally rent it again in a heartbeat.
Usually a 26/27 in jeans so I went with a medium to be safe -- and it was too tight to leave the house in. Not great if you're curvy.
This fit really nicely and looked super cute with a sweater and tights for work. Was maybe a tad snug and sometimes when I sat down looked a bit short but overall it was great!
The inner skirt for this is literally so tight it's almost impossible to walk. It's a darling little skirt, but not cute enough to not be able to walk.

I rented a S at first and although I could fit into it, it was so tight in the hips I could barely walk. Rented a M and it was roomier in the hips but still tight! I like the design and it's warm just be aware if you have a curvy bottom like I do there's not much room in the hips and you're limited when you're walking (will have to take shorter strides).
a size large says it's between a size 6-8 which is accurate, but if you wear anything larger than a size 8 this skirt most likely won't fit. I'm between a 6-8 and the large fit but was snug.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work for winter in Florida.
links_reviews_text: Fits great. Material is thick yet it's sleeveless, perfect for wearing in Florida winters with a light cardigan but would have looked great with a turtleneck underneath as well.
Has pockets!! Love this. Fits great & I felt great wearing it. Rcvd compliments too.
full-skirted with a nipped in waist, gives flow to a structured top. double-breasted plaid reads modest with a bit of a funky vibe. play around with layering under or wear alone.
Perfect for work
Runs a little large (again, great for growing belly bump!) absolutely loved it!
Never wanted to take it off. Perfect for a day of presentations
Waist hit me very high, but I like it a lot with the belt. Heavy fabric. Pockets!
This piece was very large and matronly. Definitely do not recommend. Maybe size down?

I wore this to work on an early spring day and loved it. The material is mainly polyester but feels like a fine wool. As you can tell the armpits are a little low, as well as the front but I was very comfortable adding the white tank. This dress is not a summer, warm weather dress. It is very comfortable. Received a lot of complements. I'm not very busty so probably could go a size smaller, Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Didn't live this, but wore anyway
links_reviews_text: So, based on the reviews, I figured the waste in my normal size would be too small. So I went up a size, and while the waste was fine, the chest had a little extra space that wasn't too annoying, but the skirt was just way too huge. I just pretended like it was supposed to fit that way... and still wore to work. But the conference I had originally rented it for, I didn't wear it to, picked something out of my own closet.
Well made dress, great fit for a pear shape. It runs warm, so it was lovely for walking around in the winter (with tights/leggings underneath).
I love this dress. It's super warm. However, not for the busty. As you can see, the first button was a little stressed.
I wore this to work. Super comfortable, winter dress - nice and cozy. My only complaint is that the skirt was a little full for my taste.
I wore this to a networking luncheon and felt I stood out amongst the pantsuits and sheaths. Add a great pair of heels for a chic juxtaposition to the matronly length
Heavy, lots of compliments, the waist is cut too high for me and fits small around the bottom of the rib cage without much give.
Unique but still obviously work appropriate.

Adorable perfect for a nice work meeting dress/coat! So unique and fun. Got so many compliments at the meeting, I even wore it for a photo shoot and we had umbrellas, so naturally i was mary poppins on the set!

links_reviews_title: I really liked this dress. I got so many compliments. It was perfect for work.
links_reviews_text: Fit slightly tight on the shoulder and hips.

The dress is very well made and I liked the idea but it didn't flatter my figure. I think it would be amazing on a curvy figure (which I unfortunately do not have). Love the suiting influences but only wore once and returned.

This was a very comfortable dress. I wear a 12 regularly and this was true to size. High quality material. I wore it to work then watched a play after work. It is a great day to night outfit. I received plenty of compliments.

I sized up from a 4 to 6, glad I did, because it is fitted across the rib cage. The fabric is fantastic and comfortable. I loved the prim and proper look, and perfect piece for a transition from work to an after work event. I definitely would rent again and highly recommend. I received compliments from men and women all day.
This dress was fantastic. Super sliming for the waist line. The length was longer on me since I am on shorter end of the height spectrum. I wore with booties and a turtle neck body suit underneath.
I was hesitant as it's long and can be conservative, but on it was fantastic. I put a sheer bodysuit underneath and some booties and got compliments all day!
Little snug around the rib cage, but I think a size up would be too large. Good length for a petite frame.
Dress is tts. Very fitted at waist. Dress have no stretch. Can be worn with a shirt or by itself. Got so much compliments from strangers.
Lux fabric and comfortable dress. Rent this
