But it's still a nice leather jacket and plenty warm for the evenings with layers and a scarf. I'm sad to see it go-- maybe we will meet again in the fall!
This jacket was a showstopper! It was buttery soft it fit perfect and it just made my night! I wish I could buy this coat. I would definitely rent it again.
So warm and runs a little big but it was perfect for a NYC day!

The way the pockets are sewn in creates a weird baggy like bulge around the waist. It was bizarre, the rest was good but I couldn't bring myself to wear it out unless I had my hands in the pockets all night.
Love the cut on this jacket. Looks chic and sleekm

links_reviews_title: great overall leather jacket, super soft leather.
links_reviews_text: ordered a large and it fit comfortably, usually am a 10 in tops.
Very chic and stylish. Will definitely rent again.
I love this jacket. It's incredibly soft and easy to wear with anything. It runs a bit large. I am normally a small and should have gotten the XS for a more fitted look.
Perfect fit - very soft - loved this jacket and contemplated keeping it!

links_reviews_title: Buttery and amazing. Great cut and great hand feel.
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket. It felt very cool and hip without overdoing it. Pulled me out of my "mom fashion" rut when I wore it over floral to an evening wedding and gave me a little edge. Great quality and easy to dress up or down.
I'm 5'1", 115 lbs, and a 34a-B, and the M looks a tad oversized on me but fits over a sweater. I think the small would also fit. I do love this jacket!
Loved this jacket. Light enough that you could wear indoors and out. So buttery soft with classic fit that can be dressed up or dressed down.
Staple piece for fall/winter wardrobe. Great style and fit. Will wear a ton.

I used this for a weekend long wedding to wear in the evenings and at rehearsal dinner. I'm 5'1 and 110 lbs. The x-small was a little large, mostly in the sleeves (too long). It had a casual, loose fit which I ended up liking. And the leather is so soft and feels high quality!

links_reviews_title: Fit ok, leather was incredibly soft
links_reviews_text: This jacket wasn't as fitted as I like. When unzipped the back/waist area belled our instead of staying nice & fitted against my back. The leather was amazing quality. Overall a nice jacket, just not great for someone who likes a very fitted look.
Work to casual to formal. Great piece. Wore it many times each week.
I wore this jacket a few times, it fit great and didn't feel to tight like most leather jackets.

This jacket is amazing. It is so soft! The shape is perfect, but also very neutral with no embellishment. It is also surprisingly warm. They also put the pockets in the right spot, so you can actually put your hands in them.
Great sleeve length, very flattering & soft as butter!! Loved this jacket!
Such a great leather jacket! It's buttery soft and fits like a dream!!!!

This was kind of disappointing since usually I like Vince. I didn't like how one side didn't fold over to match the other side when left unzipped. It looked sloppy. And it was not really right for my frame. I felt kind of boxy in it. Overall you can't really go wrong since it's a pretty basic style, and the leather felt nice, but it was just not as good as I expected it to be.
High quality leather, soft. The fit is nice. A basic jacket, it did not have a wow factor but I wore it several times.
Very cute and comfortable!

This jacket is absolutely amazing! The leather is so incredibly soft, and the fit is spot on. I normally wear a size 4-6, and got a medium so I could wear it over winter clothes. However, I didn’t think about the fact that I was renting this in Pennsylvania in the winter, and it is not nearly as warm enough for our below freezing days. I will absolutely be renting this again come this spring, and I will wear the heck out of it!

This is a gorgeous, elegant jacket. The letter is buttery soft, so much so that I was hesitant to wear it for fear of scratching or stretching. A little too delicate for everyday wear, but still beautiful.

links_reviews_title: this was fine but nothing special
links_reviews_text: looks like the pictures
Great fit, very cute, can be dressed up or down
Super cute open or zipped! I could wear this every day

links_reviews_title: Tomb Raider Secret Agent dominatrix vibes, feel me?
links_reviews_text: Dress it up, dress it down, whatever you do, a black leather jacket is a timeless must in a closet and THIS is the perfect one
Material is great, very versatile. Fits perfectly! I rented another leather jacket from this same brand, the third time.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is perfect for everyday use and vacation!
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect, comfortable, and versatile. I wore this on the plane, going out, while walking downtown. It is the perfect leather jacket and is stylish. I love it so much that I'm actually considering buying it!

links_reviews_title: Wore it as an everyday jacket whilst on holiday.
links_reviews_text: A really nice, buttery soft leather jacket. The cut is a little boxy, but I didn't mind that so much.

I'm usually a M but went with the S because I wanted it to be more fitted. It was perfect leaving it open. I wouldn't zip it but it would be very snug if I wanted too. But I liked how it fit leaving it open. Great length - not too long. Really soft nice quality leather. I liked that it didn't have too many buckles or belts like other leather jackets. Just a little pyramid details underneath the leather so it wasn't too bold. Great everyday leather jacket!

Rented this jacket as a layering piece for a trip to Napa Valley. It was perfect over light pieces and warm enough for the upper 50° weather. I almost needed to size up to a Medium and would have had I needed to pack bulkier tops. I would consider purchasing this jacket as it's very comfortable, simple, and soft.
Great leather jacket. Fit like a dream. Have to wear it partially zipped or it falls funny. Love the subtle spikes details.
This is a great leather jacket and I like the little studs for an edgier look. Highly recommend. Fit was perfect. I'm wearing the small.
This one ran big and was boxier than I was expecting. I'm usually between a S & M (4/6). I read reviews and ordered the medium in this one. Wish I ordered the small!!!
Love, love this jacket! Super soft leather, tags were still on. Fits very well and I have a bigger chest.

This jacket was awesome, it fit really well and fulfilled all the things a leather jacket should: warmth, cool factor, fit, and style. It's no cropped and not too long, it's just right. It is a nice soft leather, the studs are an embossed effect, not actual studs. Definitely thinking of purchasing
Feels so good on and fit me so well. I usually wear a large 8 or small 10 and got the medium. Definitely try this one!!

I definitely needed a small, but they only had an xs so I took a chance. It was too snug in the shoulders, although it looked super cute! Fit just fine through the body and I could zip it closed no problem. If you're between sizes or have broad shoulders go with the larger size. Super soft, supple leather.

Loved it. The fit was perfect. I'm small so I like small to smallish fit when it comes to jackets. This was "smallish," meaning it wasn't a tiny cropped jack, but it still felt someone fitted with the shoulders lining up where they should. The texture on the collar was great without being too in-your-face. Wanted to buy it but there are other RTR leather jackets that must be tried!

Love this jacket! I was torn between a small and a medium but glad I chose the medium. It fits perfect -- comfortable but still fitted. Can't wait to wear this with everything! The leather is super soft and lightweight. I also love how it's streamlined - now flashy szippers or buckles -- but the embossing adds a fun touch. Thinking about buying this one!

Made of super soft black leather. Loved the detail on the collar which added a rock and roll/ biker vibe. Wore all winter long and always received compliments. Ran a tad large in size, especially in the sleeves. Was able to wear a thick sweater underneath if needed for extra warmth, but also looked cool with a tshirt. Absolutely loved this jacket. Will try to rent again next winter for sure.

links_reviews_title: A nice leather Jacket to have
links_reviews_text: Fits just right. Nice material

I love this piece. I almost bought it, and now sad I didn't. I will definitely rent again - worked for everything from a dress/jacket combo for a wedding, to casual jeans and a tee. Feels so much like real leather, and the "studded" detail sets it apart.

links_reviews_title: Love this! Wear it all the time. Work, weekends, night outs, etc. Very versatile, cute and cool!
links_reviews_text: Fits seems true to size. Zips up. Plus has pockets with zippers that fit keys and lipstick.
I enjoyed wearing this jacket. It was a little boxy, but I could easily layer underneath the large
Loved! Almost bought it.

links_reviews_title: Great leather jacket with a small twist!
links_reviews_text: The jacket had small detail on the flaps which made it slightly different from other leather jackets. The jacket runs true to size but is fitted and snug, so size up if you want to layer. If you're just going to wear a thin shirt or t-shirt stay true to your size.

links_reviews_title: Fun jacket and would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size.
Perfect fit! The detailing in the leather added an edge without being over the top. Highly recommend!

I adore this jacket. I wore it during the day and night. It transitions so well between outfits that I'm considering buying it. Other reviews had said it fit boxy, but I thought it was perfect. I'm a size 6 with an hourglass shape and didn't think it overwhelmed me at all.

links_reviews_title: Cute! But a little snug and leather a bit slippery
links_reviews_text: Cute jacket, great quality. I tried to make it work but ended up returning. I got a Medium (the only size available at the time), but could have gone for a large. It was ok without any heavy or thick clothing underneath (eg sweater). However, the shoulders and back felt kinda tight, with slightly limited mobility. When I stand sideways and tried to move my arm the back of the jacket would lift up and out. The leather is also slippery- by that I mean I tried wearing my shoulder bag and it keeps on sliding off lol v annoying. Overall very cute design, would recommend sizing up??

links_reviews_title: Great, edgy piece for dressing up or everyday.
links_reviews_text: Leather is extremely soft and buttery. The jacket looks a bit edgier in person, which isn't normally my style, but I liked it so much that I found ways to wear it anyway! Fit was true to size with room for a light sweater underneath, if wanted. My only complaint was that it was a bit short, but I do have a long torso.
I liked wearing this jacket. great length for a petite

links_reviews_title: This is such a stylish leather jacket - quality is amazing & I got compliments each time I wore it.
links_reviews_text: fits true to size and is super soft. This jacket jazzes up any outfit...either for work or for a night out!

links_reviews_title: Studded but works for everyday. Love it.
links_reviews_text: The fit and weight were great for everyday wear. It was comfortable and versatile. The leather is super soft and the studded details are subtle, so it can easily be dressed up or down. I highly recommend this jacket and I'd rent it again.
Fit well and buttery leather. Recommend

links_reviews_title: Love the cut, fit, and details!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3" and this jacket hits me perfectly at the waist! Love the details around the color and the material.

OBSESSED. I wore this for work, dinner, out, wedding events - literally good for everything. Keeps you warm, but breathes more than some cheaper leather jackets. Studs make it unique but are subtle enough that you don't actually have to be an 'edgy' person. Fits perfect, maybe just a hair big but I didn't mind bc it was winter and I was wearing sweaters/long sleeves under.
Love this jacket. I may just have to splurge and buy it! Fits great

links_reviews_title: cool jacket, easily interchangeable with multiple outfits, even office wear and an evening event.
links_reviews_text: a little long in the sleeves but true to size around the shoulders and bust
I usually feel like leather jackets run small, so I sized up to a large, but the medium would have been perfect. Still wore it and was super cute, just a little big in the arms
Very soft jacket, the feel is amazing! It looks so fashionable, and the fit is perfect.
I'm 5'2 and this coat fit perfectly on me. Just the right length. I wish it was a little warmer but with a scarf I was very comfortable even in Chicago December!

links_reviews_title: Nice cozy coat that does not look to busy
links_reviews_text: Warm and well fitting

Liked the colors and gray quilted soft lining. Ran true to size on me. Would not size down if tall. Fabric/structure looked a bit ragged for the price. Maybe from repeat dry-cleaning. Liked this coat but didn't love.

The pictures I saw online of this coat don't do it justice. The colors are more vibrant in person. The coat has a larger fit so I would size down. There are pockets on either side, and the whole coat, including inside the pockets, is lined with a soft quilted fabric that is super warm. This is one of my favorite Unlimited rentals yet. :)

I realize this is an oversized style type coat but I do think it's a bit big. I ordered a Small/ 2. Definitely should have ordered a xs/0. The fabric and color is beautiful. Would love if it were slimmer.

links_reviews_title: Nice material, warmer than I needed and a bit boxy
links_reviews_text: This coat is very warm- I wore it on an average NY fall day and I was sweating. Great color/pattern and really beautiful, but not super flattering given that it's boxy, plus it runs large

links_reviews_title: Had wanted for everyday but not what I had hoped
links_reviews_text: The jacket was much thicker than I had imagined. Was looking for a lighter feel so this much bulkier than I wanted.

links_reviews_title: I never really wore it because it was a worm evening and the coat is heavy and more for winter/fall
links_reviews_text: The fit was fine I ware a 6 or 4 and I sized down to a 2 and it fin well.
This coat is warm and cozy. Also looks very cute! I love the color.
The coat felt very drabby. Too large, not flattering and colors very grandma. If the cut was better it would have worked, but didn't do it for me.
Very boxy and unflattering. Looked like a jacket my 65 year old mom would wear grocery shopping.
Very cute. Wore it every day for a week. True to size no fit problems. I have long arms so but the sleeves fit great. Would for sure rent again
not flattering/warm enough for what i needed at the time
I loved this jacket on my trip to Philly in fall. It is warm and stylish!

links_reviews_title: Very Cute, But Casual vs. Formal
links_reviews_text: I think this coat is beautiful, well made, and is perfect for those going after a more casual, bohemia type look. I rented the coat for a formal event, and, unfortunately, it didn't work. The weave of the fabric is a bit loose, and the colors appear a bit faded. Again, for a casual weekend jacket, that is exactly what some people are looking for. I also thought the jacket ran large. I am a true size medium, and wear 8/10. I ordered a 10 (due to limited availability) and think I could have worn either a 6 or an 8. Would be cute with jeans and a sweater!
Very pink and lavender Runs large Nicely lined for warmth

links_reviews_title: Really beautiful, perfect for a 40 degree, sunny day.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this coat! It hangs really nicely and has some room for layers underneath. I would recommend it for cool, but not cold weather. The lining is a bit worn out, but I ultimately enjoyed this brighter temporary addition to my outerwear wardrobe.
Love the materials, design, and extra warmth this coat has in one package.
I loved this coat, it was warm and felt very luxurious. I had many comments - it is a lovely purplish shade in person and was perfect for the end of winter moving into spring.

While the pictures look quite fitted, there's no structure at all to this coat. I'm an 8, I ordered a 6 and it was huge on me. Wouldn't recommend unless you're wearing it over some serious winter gear. Looks kind of shabby.
I can’t find anything wrong with this cozy coat!

It was comfortable and intended to be oversized, I ordered 2 sizes smaller and loved the fit! My husband loved it on me also and I got a lot of compliment. I kept it for a while and I considered buying it.

links_reviews_title: Kept me warm and looking girly
links_reviews_text: Boston winter was A-OK in this coat.
Loved the lining

If you're thinking about renting this... do it! This beautiful textured coat is oversized in the chicest of ways. The colors are neutral but fun and go with mostly anything. The coat is substantial and cozy. Get ready to be showered in compliments! Wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Great colors, and loved the length!
links_reviews_text: It's a good comfy fit, I'm usually a size 2 but a size 4 in outerwear. I got a size 2 in this one and it was perfect. Just like other reviews do mention though, it's very heavy. Unfortunately, it also does not have pockets! So I couldnt use it for my phone or winter gloves.
Fits large, very warm, loved it better with casual/jeans than for work.

I read the reviews that this was oversized but rented one size down thinking it would bring it in a bit. It's very lovely and warm but no matter what it will be oversized so if you don't mind that then it's a great coat. I prefer a more tailored look so I wasn't a huge fan.
Sleeves run long.

links_reviews_title: Fun jacket and wow did I get a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work one random day with black jeans and black booties. I paired it with a black tank top underneath and am glad I did because I definitely got a little warm throughout the day and had to take the blazer off to cool down. It's a heavy fabric and lining. I felt like it ran a big big, especially in the chest and arms area, but I am almost 5'8 and liked the length. It's boxy so it felt important to have a slim bottom with skinny jeans and the same colored shoes so that it created a clean, slim line. I could see wearing this open over a black dress with heels for a work meeting or presentation. It was fun and definitely a statement piece. The last thing that I didn't like was the name of the designer on the back of the blazer - just felt tacky to me. This isn't Juicy!

links_reviews_title: extremely well fitted and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I rented this thinking I could layer a light sweater under for Seattle winter. However, I was only able to layer a thin T-shirt under but it ended up being perfect for my LA vacation. This blazer is so easy to dress up and down and is very well made.
Runs a little oversized. It's fine, probably wouldn't rent again.

This is not the type of blazer you can leave open. I was hoping to wear it open with a graphic tee underneath, but it didn't look right. That said, it's still super cute. I paired it with a belt and it was a win. Would rent again.
The small was a bit long on the sleeves for me but I liked the oversized fit. Just sad it was missing a button.

Loved this jacket! Wore it to work and got tons of compliments. Tres chic. I'm normally a large but grabbed the medium because it's all they had in the store, but I ended up loving the fit. Will definitely rent again and put it on my "ran into some extra cash and know just what to buy now" list.
This is a great version of the oversized plaid blazer. Easy to wear, even for this old lady.

I tried on a size XL because that's all they had in the store, and it fit really well! I wanted it to be just a little oversized anyway because my office is casual. The jacket is lined in a black silky material, so I cuffed each sleeve and liked how it looked. The material is smooth and I loved the big pockets.

links_reviews_title: Versatile and warm long plaid blazer
links_reviews_text: I wore this blazer a couple times for work and the weekend. It was warm and fit well buttoned. It didn't look good unbuttoned ; too roomy. I also wore with black skinny jeans and black turtleneck and it looked even better with that. I'm usually between a 2 and 4 and the Small was perfect.

I really wanted to love this jacket! Unfortunately, the fit was off - it ran a bit large & pulled in the wrong places. It's thicker than a regular blazer and kept me warm in a cold office. I won't rent it again.
Really comfy and well-made blazer that can also double as a light jacket due to size. It runs a wee bit large, but maybe it's meant to be oversized.

This jacket looks great from the front, easy fit, beautifully made. From the side you can see it has a few fit issues for us apples when it is fully buttoned. The back bunches if you have a bum and the sleeves are slightly too long. Someone a little taller and a little less curvy will look like a total boss in this. I'm going to wear this all month despite the fit issues!

The fit was a little weird when I first put it on. It was tight in the arms and shoulders but baggy around the middle. I do really like the jacket though and have worn it to work a couple of times already!

This blazer is perfection. As a tall girl I always find that blazers are too short on my long torso so this one hit at the perfect spot. The fabric is a good weight- not too thick not too thin. If it weren't so expensive I would buy it in a heartbeat. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Neat jacket very nice coat for everyday or going out.
links_reviews_text: Fits great it's light weight.
Nice versatile blazer. I wore it a couple of times. Dressed down with jeans for dinner with a friend and then buttoned it up with black slacks and heels for work

links_reviews_title: Loved this chic longer boyfriend blazer
links_reviews_text: A great blazer. Wore with denim and it was super cute for work with the sleeve rolled and some patent black boots. Would reco!
Wore this with skinny leg black trousers and black booties - professional but not stuffy!

I loved it. At first, I was not too impressed. I put it on over a pair of jeans and a black t-shirt and fell in love with it. Because it does not have a shape to it, I highly recommend wearing pants that add some shape, unless that is what you prefer.
Oversized fit was great. The pockets are quite deep which is helpful for carrying your phone throughout the day. Looked nice open or buttoned up. Great work blazer!

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it - arms were too tight
links_reviews_text: Cute but arms too tight

links_reviews_title: I felt professional yet stylish in my meeting.
links_reviews_text: Great weight for cold NYC winter. Great color. Nice fit in shoulders but a but too full in body.
Big in the body
Not quite short or long enough to work on my 5'11" frame!
Perfect fit, high quality! LOVE!
It runs very big in the body. Going to rent size small but worried it may be too tight in the arms
Wonderful to wear to work. I received lots of compliments.

I liked this so much that I wore it two or three times before I returned it. The overall color is gray but there are black, red, and blue (very fine) stripes in the print, it makes a plaid. I received so many compliments on this jacket. Even men loved it. This is another classic that I would like to own.
Fun to coordinate with red or white satin blouse underneath. Wore long silver/gray/red/sky blue silk scarves for contrast and interest. Great for hosting professional meetings at HQ.
This is my favorite thing I've rented. I have kept it for two months, might keep it for three.
It was entirely too large for me. I’ve updated my profile.
Tailored, professional look. I love the red accent stripe. Paired with black tailored pants and a red scarf for a polished look!

links_reviews_title: Casual, but refined. Easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: A little slim in hip area. Helped that it was oversized.

links_reviews_title: I thought this would be a smart light jacket for Fall, but it looked too officey for my purposes.
links_reviews_text: I'm good with the oversized "boxy" fit in general, but the shoulders didn't hit right, so not for me.

links_reviews_title: Love this Blazer Jacket! You can dress it up or down. Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fabric is soft and fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Really cute blazer that I wore as a jacket
links_reviews_text: Extremely well made with some neat little details. Oversized without being too loose. I couldn't tell if it was supposed to be a blazer or a jacket, and I wore it as a jacket, but I think it could work for either (and maybe others don't make a distinction between the two like I do).

links_reviews_title: Very over sized chic blazer. Runs large!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9", and this blazer was quite long on me, although that is the style. I would not reccomend to anyone shorter than me. I should have gotten a medium, but I have a large bust, so I'm always afraid to risk a smaller size with coats. This is a great option if you are tall, and are looking for a comfy, high quality, oversize blazer.
a bit boxy
I'm a musician and I've been wearing on my international tour. It looks great. It can be for dress up or dress down

links_reviews_title: Cute, runs big, warmer than expected.
links_reviews_text: Will prob rent again & try a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I might have to buy it!
links_reviews_text: Amazingly versatile piece...with pockets! I'm usually a S but ordered Size XS based on reviews. Rent it...you won't want to send it back!
it is def for warmer weather. But makes every outfit more chick

links_reviews_title: Too baggy - didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: Sized down and it was still too big. Needed to be a straight cut but instead it's wider in the middle which is not flattering - and I'm tall - so usually I prefer this long look.
Ended up wearing this in the rain and it worked like a charm. Manned anything look extra chic.
Lots of compliments. Modern sleek design. Comfortable. Grabbed this in store. One size down was perfect. Good for tall. Didn't look like a robe/salon cape. Loved the big pockets for cell phone.
This piece is very easy to wear, thanks to the relaxed shape. The inside is very soft, and it did not feel too stiff on. Will definitely rent again!
I think this fits big. But it's also warm for a mile la night
Got several compliments, fit is great and quality is great but it felt a little too much like a smock. Not my favorite piece so I wore once and sent it back!

I used this duster as a "jacket" over a sleeveless jumpsuit I wore to a nightclub on a chilly night. It runs large so I ended up wearing it draped over my shoulders. Like another reviewer said, it can end up looking like a bathrobe. I received compliments but thought it was just OK. *I'm on the far right

links_reviews_title: This was super cool but do be careful, it was hard to style to make it NOT look like a robe.
links_reviews_text: This was super cool but do be careful, it was hard to style to make it NOT look like a robe. I did get a lot of compliments on my "style" that day so just make sure you have a whole look prepared.

links_reviews_title: Very boxy. I'm too short for this look. Could really dress this up though. Lightweight too

links_reviews_text: Very unique.
It's a decent layering piece, nothing memorable. Wore with fitted turtleneck and slim black pants. It wants chunky accessories.
I will rent this again for sure. It's good for a plethora of styles and rocks with a faux dress or a tee and some jeans, paired with some funky boots. Comfortable and loose fit.
Runs really big! If you are petite it will overwhelm your figure

This just didn't work for me. It is very, very large and has no shape to it so as a result I sort of look like a very fancy, shapeless garbage bag. Did not end up wearing. The quality is nice though, so I only take the one star off for the sizing issue.

I loved this piece! I probably could have gotten a medium, but I made it work. The fabric is light so I didn't feel like it was wearing me down. I wore it in Vegas during the day as we walked around in March. I would rent this piece again!
This was much lighter weight than I expected so did not keep me warm, also I looked like a hairdresser
Looked great. Fit just like the picture..a little larger than I would have liked but still looked great and nice and comfortable.
I'm normally a Medium but based on other reviews, I ordered a XS. XS was perfect and I received a lot of compliments. I wore it with black booties, ripped black jeans and a black sleeveless bodysuit.

Nice piece not for everyday purpose. Used for photoshoot and looked very nice on camera. Definitely can look very robe-ish. Had to put a very fancy belt around it and accessorize it a lot to make it not look like a robe.
This is one I may have to splurge on. It's instantly New York mod min chic.
This is a fun kimono. I normally never recommend sizing down, but I do for this. It's a lot of fabric. I rented the XL, but would try the L in the future. I liked it!
Awesome!
I could not love this jacket more. Instantly elevates any ensemble. I got a ton of compliments each time I wore it. Was so sad to return, will probably end up purchasing.

links_reviews_title: This is a fun fashion accent.
links_reviews_text: The style is large so size down if you want it more fitted. It had a nice luxury feel. I have it for early Spring and it adds snap as a third piece with jeans or a skirt and blouse. I will wear till the weather gets too warm.

links_reviews_title: Cool piece but could never get the right styling down.
links_reviews_text: Quality item, cool piece... but being short and curvy, I could never get the look quite right with it.

links_reviews_title: Wonderfully chic smock if you like that look. I received many compliments at an art opening.
links_reviews_text: Oversized, great over body hugging clothing. When you want to wear a comfy knit, but need to take it up a knot he.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous evening we've been planning for 16 years.
links_reviews_text: I knew what to expect from other reviews - this jacket has no shape and runs very large. But it is a lovely leather and worked perfectly for my weekend in Vegas.
Awesome jacket for adding some edge to your look. Easy to wear and lightweight. Imagine best if on the taller side.
Kimono like
Loved this leather duster so much!!! Wore it multiple times to dinner with leggings and even to work with jeans and a white tee. Versatile and fun

I love the look of this item- think goth Golden Girls- and the feel of the fabric is great. It's not a great look for a pear/hourglass shape. It's cut very straight and even belting it made me look like I'd stolen a hairdressing smock from my salon. Lots of pros but definitely a "not for me" item. I do think it runs very large- I typically wear a 12/14 and the medium was plenty large, just not cut right for my shape.

links_reviews_title: Terrific piece to dress up leggings and boots.
links_reviews_text: This is a great basic jacket to dress up leggings and boots. Got tons of compliments!
I thought I could rock the skinny pants and oversized jacket look, but this was so large it swallowed me whole.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work or fun!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work, then to dinner and a broadway show. I absolutely loved the fit of it. It was snug and slimming without me feeling uncomfortable.
Cute dress! The ruching in back gave me a nice silhouette, and also caused slight touching in front to give me a waist...
This is a great dress. Flattering and comfortable. I do think it is a little too sexy for work but I would definitely rent again.
Such a flattering fit! So chic! And so comfortable
This dress is forgiving. It is comfortable as well. I am 5'2" and 136 pounds.

links_reviews_title: Great for nice dinner out in winter; too sexy for the office
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and very flattering. The ruching in the back draws attention to your rear end, so I would not feel comfortable wearing it to the office. But it was great for a nice dinner out in the winter
I got so many compliments on this dress. The fit is perfect. I got it for a conference I was attending and it was nice and warm in those freezing trade show rooms.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Great for work
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The medium fit easily with my 25 week bump (138 lbs). I think it looks much better in person than in this photo. Great length for work. I would definitely consider renting this again.

links_reviews_title: Girls night out with my bestie!
links_reviews_text: Stretch material so its comfortable to wear and the ruching down the sides of the dress make it figure flattering.

fitted in a flattering way. Length was great long sleeves kept me warm. Heavy material so best in “office winter”. Definitely a "sexy back" but I'm sitting most of the day so it's not on display. I would buy this!

I love the weight of the fabric and the form fitting. Really makes my waist look small and skirt doesn't ride up. I wasn't sure I'd like the gathered skirt, especially behind but it's working in all the right places! Will definitely wear again.

Wanted to love this dress but I felt like a sausage squeezed into it. The lines that I believe were meant to distract from a tummy actually emphasized it. I tried it on with Spanx but it didn't seem to help. Great dress and maybe I should have tried a size up but after the attached photo I'm going to opt to hit the gym.

links_reviews_title: Business in front. Party in the back
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for work despite other reviewers warning that it may not be work appropriate. I thought that it was super cute and the front was plenty conservative, but I took a chance and wore it to work even though the back may have been a little too sexy. Paired with tights and boots

links_reviews_title: Great dress to wear for air conditioned conference!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect! Very versatile. Conservative enough for daytime wear but can transition to cocktail no problem. The colorblock top is a really interesting detail that makes it stand out.

Love. This. Dress. Bombshell dress that is sleek and Figure-flattering. This dress is super-tight, body con. I thought with the rouche-ing (is that even a word) that it would not look so right on. Not safe for work! Great for dating

links_reviews_title: Cute and flattering work appropriate dress.
links_reviews_text: I like this dress. I have no real complaints and the 4 fit well. I liked it but just did not love it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it the shoulders kind of pooped out and didn't look right.
links_reviews_text: Body con would have worn if the shoulders didn't poof
NA
I did not think the rear was too sexy for work, though I was wearing a size larger than I really needed. It was comfortable and just felt like it looked good. Great for a day of meetings.
Stretchy and forgiving, but super cute. And the color block is a nice detail. I may have to keep this one for a while!!
Fit and Keith was perfect. Vet flattering and perfect for daily professional
Too big on me. Should have ordered a medium

This dress was very sexy, and I paired it with long boots. However, it rode up A lot and I was constantly having to adjust which was annoying, but not enough of a nuisance for me to give this anything less than 5. I just love the Nicole Miller fit. Consistently good.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit perfect! I wore it to dinner & church. It gave me curves that I don't have!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size
Felt very confident and sexy with this dress. Would recommend.

Very comfy and solid work dress. I would rent again but size down as it was a bit large on me and stretched by the end of the day. Wore it for travel and length is great for sitting on the plane, but a bit bulky in the bag on the way home the next day.

links_reviews_title: This is an amazing dress. The material is very comfortable and the style is very forgiving.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments, it hides most flaws. It is very comfy.
The fit was perfect. The cut was flattering. Amazing fabric that doesn't wrinkle. I wore to an outdoor evening event with tights and boots and felt great all night! I'd rent this one again.
This dress was very flattering and fit really well. My husband also thought I looked beautiful in it too.

links_reviews_title: I think I could have work a L....The dress has stretch
links_reviews_text: The fit is a tad bit large
Beautiful, fits perfectly, great for work!
Really like this dress, rented the L but it was a bit small for me. Usual dress size is a 10.

This was very comfortable and a nice thick material- hugs the body but not in a too tight way. For my body type, I did not think this was too sexy for office attire. Rouching just adds some unique detail.

links_reviews_title: I loved the way it fit my shape!
links_reviews_text: Great material and fit
I wore this during the day with a blazer and at night without. Packed effortlessly - no ironing!
Love this dress but snug around the waist and chest for me. I am going to order a large instead of a medium.
Great fit glad I rented large very form fitting super comfortable and stylish. Great with tights and boots.
With stockings, the dress rode up a little. But still cute dress.
Not for a curvy woman
This dress was great for work - and for going from desk to drinks. Would rent again
Comfortable and cute! I wore these several times.
Cute shorts - dressier than average and looks like a skirt. Runs big.

My go to size 6 fit perfectly. The material was a little thicker which made these nicer - I would suggest a more form fitting top as my flowy tank made me look way “thicker” In pictures -as the shorts are slightly pleated in the front . These were perfect for a steamy outdoor concert night!

Nice shorts, wore them casual this weekend and will dress up with blouse sandals for work. The front pleats make it a little more thick than I would like, not so flattering. And my biggest complaint was the zipper, it constantly fell down and would not stay zipped, even though the shorts fit me fine
These are cute. Worth a rent for every day running around.

Loved the high waist fit of these shorts. Perfect for a weekend baby shower. Comfortable and felt cute. I'm usually a size 6 and these fit true to size. Not too short either. More Rent The Runway looks in my IG @sereinwu
It was fine. But nothing special.

links_reviews_title: You can dress them up or down
links_reviews_text: Run big- i went down a size
Wore this to a day festival. It was cute enough but a little poochy in the front

links_reviews_title: Choose these shorts for a day of wine tasting in Napa!
links_reviews_text: Shorts fit perfectly and were super comfortable!
Cute shorts, they were a little puckery where the pleats are, but overall they were cute and comfy.
Perfect length for a petite person. Nice high waisted. Love the material.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is nice. The legs are really wide so at that length it was a little awkward feeling.
links_reviews_text: Fit was fairly true to size.
These are nice shorts, but something that hasn't really stood up to repeated dry cleaning. They run slightly big, but I still wore my normal size. If you are borderline, size down.

links_reviews_title: I've never been able to wear shorts like these- until now!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, butloose around the legs so for women like me who have big quads, they were magical!
Small in waist, roomy elsewhere but so cute, light and got a lot of compliments.
Loved these shorts. Very flattering and fun for a day at an amusement park.
They were too big, they suggested I wear a 4 and I was swimming in them
True to size. Easy to move with loser fit!
Runs large
Shorts were super flowy from the hips out and weren't extremely flattering

links_reviews_title: Ran very large, but seemed nice.
links_reviews_text: Ran very large -- didn't wear. But they seemed super comfortable while still being cute and just a bit dressy!

I reserved these for a long weekend to Phoenix. I thought they were great. They are short, even on me and I am 5"4'. The leg openings flare out a little, which I liked, but it isn't the tailored look you see on the model. Overall, I like them and will rent them again this summer.
Great fit
Fit was too big. I should have sized down. Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: Runs small and pleats in front are unflattering!
links_reviews_text: I think if you have wider hips these shorts are not your friends! Besides the fact that I ordered the wrong size (my fault), the pleating on the front is extremely unflattering, puckers and makes you look bigger than you are. I don't believe this would be fixed by getting a bigger size unfortunately. If your very slender and not as curvy these shorts will probably look great.
Nice shorts but fit a little loose. They were fine for an extra pair of shorts on vacation.
Fit well.
These shorts are P-E-R-F-E-C-T Love!!!! Might purchase. Very flattering , super current. Easy!!!!!

Whenever a RTR review says beware theses shorts are short, I say BINGO! And these did fit great. My legs are relatively slim compared to having a curvier butt... so I definitely filled out the backside and had no problem with the size of the leg opening. But I could see that being a problem for some other body type. If you've got a flat a** or thick thighs, these aren't gonna work for you. The studs we're uncomfortable, as some other reviewers mentioned. I got a few good wears out of them. They were definitely cute enough to buy, but they're pretty memorable so I'll wait till the spring and definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love! But no stretch in thighs FYI...
links_reviews_text: LOVE these adorable shorts! Wore to 2 parties and they stretch comfortably at waist etc w/ wear ...except leg openings b/c of the metal studs. Just heads up if u have athletic etc legs & need a bit more room. Really want to buy them. Wore w/ both fitted untucked white t & a slightly blush tucked in tank w/ grey jimmy Choo wedges! LOVE!!
True to size shorts. They are short shorts so if you are looking for a longer fit, these aren't for you. The studded detail was great. I got tons of compliments! Would rent again!

Only reason 4 stars instead of 5 is because an 8 wasn't available but probably would have fit me better. Since I wasn't wearing them with tops that needed them to fit high-waisted like the model picture, the 10 worked, being slightly baggy and very comfortable. Loved the studs & camo, these were a nice alternative to my usual denim cutoffs. Would rent again in an 8 or 10!
I thought the metal studs would be covered with fabric on the inside. They weren't. You can feel every single one. Also, it runs small. Not worth it.
The camo fabric and the studs are such a fashion statement...loved these shorts . Wish the fabric had been a bit brighter which may have faded a bit from use. Other than that, they were awesome.

I generally wear a size 10 but went up a size to be sure. The 12 was too big. They were okay for one wear but were too stretched out to wear again without washing. Disappointed but will try again in a smaller size.
Runs very small and as other reviews say, are very short. The gromets were cold and uncomfortable on my legs. Will not wear.
Run a little big but once u get the right size they fit really nicely
Short... but trendy and cute! I even got complements from my teen boys that could careless!!!

links_reviews_title: cute - i think mine were too big
links_reviews_text: pros- trendy cons - fits my legs but was way too big in waist. - if you have a bigger butt and smaller waist I would pick something else
I am a size 2/4 in shorts and skirts and definitely needed the 6. These do not have any give. Fun to wear for one fun night out.
Too short. Color okay

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs large - wasnt able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Cute but runs large - wasnt able to wear it.
Shorts fit high waisted on me, wore them all day
Not very flattering shorts. Unless maybe you have a tiny waist, a big butt, and skinny legs. It felt baggy around my stomach creating a round belly. Not the best shape.

I seriously considered purchasing these shorts! I paired them with the zadig & voltaire rock and roll sweatshirt and it was the perfect casual outfit. The fit is true to size, although the waist is a little loose and the legs are a little tight. manageable though!
so many compliments on these!

Overall ran very large. Had a lot of extra fabric in the back crotch/seam area. Not in a hanging down way, but if I held that center seam and pulled straight back, was big as if I needed a bubble butt to fill it out, if that makes sense. The waist was also large, but it fit well enough to wear with a cream tank and a dark blue denim AG jacket with the sleeves rolled up, white Jack Purcell's. We're cute overall, just a little big. The metal studs did clack against each other when I walked but that didn't bother me. It may for some so thought I'd mention it!
These were cute for every day wear. The metal grommets added a little something to these.
Cute shorts! Were a little too big in the waist but fit well in the butt - I think my normal size would have been uncomfortable because there isn't a lot of give.

links_reviews_title: Loved the shorts they were so cute and the nail stud detail made them unique
links_reviews_text: I am only 5'2" and they were perfect but I think if you are tall they might be too short but they did fit true to size
The studs make these shorts stand out. What a fun detail.

I thought these were really cute and I received a few compliments on my errands. Probably needed to size down but the 4 was out of stock and Cinq sometimes runs small, so I thought it could get away with it. The fit runs in between true and small. Cute nailhead details, be careful where you sit. I lunched at a restaurant with wooden chairs and nailheads were not super comfortable.

I loved this shirts from the pic so much I was mentally prepared to pay $200 to keep a pair of shorts. But...... if you have a booty forget it. Unless you are comfortable in skin tight non stretch material by pass these adorable shorts. They will not flare out on a booty they way they do in the model. I shed an emoji tear.

First these are SHORT, I know that is the style now...but I would love at least one more inch to cover the fat part of my upper thighs *sigh*. These shorts are cute and not too heavy, and fit true to size, but lost me on the rivets that got so hot when out for the afternoon I felt like I was burning the round dots into my leg every time I sat down!

This is why I love RTR ... these shorts were so cute and comfy. I wouldn't have bought them as I know the studs are dated but with RTR I got to try and wear and now my closet isn't overfilling with one-time wears.

links_reviews_title: Run a little big otherwise cute
links_reviews_text: Too baggy

I ordered this dress last minute for a my nephew's bris. I usually run between a 6 and a 8 but the medium was not available. Although I may have been able to size down, this dress was perfect for the occasion and many people asked about it. Wish I owned it!!
Cute detail. I didn't love where the shoulder seam was - it made me feel like my bra straps were slipping. I did like the dress though!
Belted to give it more shape. Thick material

Such a cute dress! A teeny bit small so I would size up. It worked for work with tights but I was tugging at it when I stood up. Should be perfectly work appropriate for more petite girls. I still go so many compliments though!!

I read the comments and sized up to a medium (normally a small) and the fit was perfect. Hard to tell but this is navy but with the accents on the shoulders that were black it slows you to wear black tights and shoes without breaking any fashion rules. This was such a great dress received lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Nice enough for one time wear
links_reviews_text: Fit was a bit tight through the chest, shoulders and arms. TTS through waist and hip areas. Nice material. Don't normally love navy and black together, but this dress was perfect with black sheer tights with a seam down the back! Lots of compliments at work.
Nice and easy
Loved the concept of this dress. The overall look is super classy. Being average height, however, it fell way too short for work so I had to send it back.

links_reviews_title: This dress is NAVY with black trim!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress but always forget it's really navy! I received a ton of compliments throughout the day. Very flattering!
Love this dress would buy - really flattering. Size up one size.

Love this take on a little black dress. It's likely way too short for anyone taller than 5'3" but was flattering for my 5'1" frame. I loved the ruffled sleeves, which added interest and coverage of problem areas, making it more age appropriate. Paired well with black modern pumps.
ran small, arms and waist too tight
Its fine!

links_reviews_title: Cute cut, nice material... but kind of awkward
links_reviews_text: Aacross the shoulders and collarbone, slightly weird fit. Loved material, color and cut. Wore once for a work event with black leggings though it was not too short for my 5-9 frame... but was too tight/narrow on top which almost never happens to me
Very form fitting. Runs aside small. I did like the thick material but could not wear.

links_reviews_title: Other people seemed to like the dress!
links_reviews_text: I originally didn't like this dress (fabric is not the nicest), but it grew on me during the day. I paired it with tights because it is a bit short, but wore it to work no problem and felt pretty good in it! Also I sized up to a Medium as the other reviewers said to and it was a tad loose up top, but totally not noticeable.
N/A

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Got so many compliments! Wore to a church ceremony at a wedding and a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: -I am a petite girl, so the neck and shoulders came up a little high, but it was very much wearable -The sleeves are pretty tight
BEAUTIFUL classic dress. Very flattering, asymmetrical hem, rich fabric, and comfortable. Runs a tad small so size up (I wear a size 4 but comfortably wore a size medium).
I returned and didn't wear because I'm 5'7.5 and it was way short but very nice, I would try to get a M and wear it or buy.
I'm short so the dress itself was not super short on my. The navy is super flattering.
I loved the relaxed but classy feel of the dress. I did not find it to be too itchy but not the softest fabric. I really liked the bell sleeves. Paired with boots it looked great.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting this dress-I love it
links_reviews_text: I'm super busty, and this dress is flattering, with a little sparkle, but also conservative enough for a work party. It's a really nice shade of pink and it's a really feminine look!
Rented this for my event at Nordstrom, subtle sparkle, GREAT FIT, flattering cut, would rent it again, and if I could wear a pink sparkly dress everyday, it would be this one.

flattering but please note that it's super itchy and very shiny! i wore this to work and felt a little disco ball ish... on the other hand it's a little too long for a night out. maybe good for a holiday party or wedding, something party like on the formal side.

links_reviews_title: Pretty in pink! Loved the dress but kinda itchy. A medium fit me.

links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work Valentine's Day event. The color is more of a coral than punchy pink, but still pretty. It runs smaller than I expected. I'm usually an XS or S and definitely would have wanted a M in this. The waist is really fitted but it falls over the lower stomach in a weird way- especially if you've had babies and your lower abs aren't concave anymore!

This dress was such a disappointment for a few reasons: -It has metallic thread! I didn't get that from the photo and should have notice that in the fabric description. -The material is very rough and scratchy. If you wear full spanx underneath that will minimize the itch. -It clings to your chest. Like really clings. It will stick to the bottom of your boob and underwire bra and flaunt every inch. Maybe it works better on a small chest, but I felt like it was waaaay to much on my D cup.
Scratchy material and hugged all the wrong areas (stomach).

links_reviews_title: Unwearable. So itchy like a million needles on my skin.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, fit and style, but couldn’t wear it. So itchy and uncomfortable

I sized up to the medium, since there were no reviews, and I'm glad I did. The dress is tight and scratchy (from the metallic thread) to get on, and the medium fit perfectly in the bust and waist. The hem was shorter than on the model, somehow... This dress is really cute, but it's not as dressy as I thought from the photos, and it's best for cooler days/ nights.

This runs slightly small, I’m a 4 and ordered a small but a medium would have been more flattering. The way the waist band hits makes your lower belly pop out in an exaggerated way. This dress is very sparkly and very very itchy. I tried it on and immediately put it back in the bag and sent it back that day.

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual - great for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments on the color. Cute tucked in jeans or left to hang loose.

Loved this sweater! The color is perfect for fall and it was super warm and cozy. However, it was much shorter than I expected based on the photos and other reviews. The one I got was almost cropped. Even so, I still loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute asymmetric sweater- very warm and soft.
links_reviews_text: Sweater was warm, soft, and very comfortable. The size large is not nearly as long as shown on the model, but overall the product was comfortable and very wearable.

This was a great piece to rent. However there is a small stain on the front. This is the piece I would've love to keep in my wardrobe however I wasn't willing to spend the money to the stain. This piece laid nicely and is super sexy without being to much. The color is great for all skin tones as well!
Nice details and great color for fall. It's a little bulky, so not great for my straight figure.

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: I wore this sweater multiple times in a week - to work, to run errands and to our family Thanksgiving. The color is perfect for fall, and though it has a baggier/ boyfriend fit (which I love) it is true to size. You want to choose your normal size for the appropriate amount of fabric to drape correctly. Got lots of compliments and it is super warm! Great with jeans and booties, or with leggings and Uggs! A fall must.
Really like it. Great color for a strawberry blonde

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater!! It was perfect for our fall engagement pictures
links_reviews_text: It fits great! It's super cozy and I loved the color and the asymmetry!!
This sweater was perfect to transition into the fall weather. The color is trendy. I love how it angled longer to the side. My only objection is that the sweater I got was starting to look worn down.
Rental seemed very worn in and faded. Lived the detail but it as too big and bulky for my smaller frame. Had a funny odor too.
Great, warm sweater with an interesting cut and fun color. Fit great, would rent again.
What a great sweater, it was warm and flattering. I loved wearing it so much I kept it for almost a month!

I am in love with this sweater. The color, quality and style is amazing. You have to wear an undershirt, it is not uber thick but kept me a comfortable temperature. The sweater has an odd hem WHICH I LOVE...the different directions of the weave makes this a quality, superb item.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, style and fit on this everyday sweater!
links_reviews_text: Loved the rich color, cute angle at the bottom and the thicker comfy feel of the sweater. Would definitely rent this again. Very versatile.
Slouchy sweater with cute angles
Sweater is cute, wasn't in great condition when I got it. Was very worn.
Didn't like the fit on my body
The sweater is oversized, nice and comfortable for casual wear, but it is nothing spectacular.
Color is nice but it had no shape and was HUGE especially on the sides.
The color and weight of the fabric is nice, but the fit is unflattering. It's asymmetrical under the arms (not just the hem) which made for a bulky effect on one side.
This is a great throw on piece. I've worn it belted and loose, both looked great. I might size down next time so it is a little less full.

This top is easy to wear and looks great with jeans and black pants. I wore this top multiple time so I am surprised I don't have a picture of it. The knit is a bit bulk but it wasn't itchy and it fit very well. I would say this fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Fits fine. Didn't love the color.
links_reviews_text: I didn't really end up wearing this because I didn't like the color very much. It's a good fit, though and comfortable.
Comfy and warm
The fit was true to size, really cute sweater in person.
Nice asymmetry and loved the color, but the fit didn't quite work on me - it was a bit too baggy and sagged in the front, making it look like a had a big gut in profile. I didn't end up wearing this
oversized
Great sweater, super cozy. This one was a little worn with pilling.
Oversized, great color.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater! Wish I could have splurged and bought it.
links_reviews_text: I'm a small/medium in sweaters. I went small with this one and it fit perfectly. Nice thick material not itchy or anything like that.
This sweater was a great color and soft. I loved the somewhat structured sleeves and the asymmetrical hem. There was quite a bit of pilling by the time it got to me though.
I'm long waisted so had to wear a shirt under this so my belly wouldn't show, but otherwise I enjoyed wearing this. Wore with skinny jeans and flats as suggested.
Super cozy and comfortable for fall. Great color. Unique sweater with very large arms, dolman style.
Standout, stylish top, temping to buy. Wore it tucked into black pants. One of my favorite rentals so far

It's a cute shirt. I would have chosen a different fabric. Someone mentioned in a review that it doesn't wrinkle easily but I actually disagree. The little frills down the front and the back of the shirt are kind of permanently creased because the fabric is so crisp. Fit isn't bad although if I owned this I'd have it taken in a few centimeters near my waist. All in all it's a cute concept with poor execution. Would have been much nicer in silk.

links_reviews_title: THIS IS WHY I LOVE RTR
links_reviews_text: I have very broad shoulders so I typically don't even try on tops that may accentuate them. But this top caught my eye, and because it's just a rental I figured what the hell. I'M IN LOVE! Compliments all day long and I felt so fab. Wore it to work (as pictured) with a skirt, then wore it on the weekend with white jeans. Beware: the top is VERY straight fit, so depending on how wide your hips are it may be slightly snug. I side-tucked it so it was NBD, but it looked a little odd/unflattering if I wore it untucked due to the bottom fitting tighter than the loose chest. All in all a gorgeous top & I definitely plan to rent again!

links_reviews_title: So cute. Perfect for work and drinks with friends
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. Wore it a few times.
Great for jeans and casual but standing out
Didn't realize the scarf came separately in a little bag, I stupidly love the fabric but it looked like a potato sack on me.

links_reviews_title: Scarf makes it! Such a great top!
links_reviews_text: So wonderful for work or play. Debating not giving this one back and buying it! Note: I at first thought the scarf piece (which is separate) was missing and didn't see it packed separately in a little bag until I was about to send the top back. You definitely want to wear with scarf. Comfortable cotton that does not wrinkle easily.
This was a very cute cotton top with a great cut. Loved the matching scarf.

Very different but cute... I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because the handkerchief necktie is not attached. If you're not creative you could get frustrated on how to mimic it just like the model. It's a stiff cotton top whereas for some reason I assumed it was made of silk blend/ blousey like material.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a walk down the runway!
links_reviews_text: Fits so nicely and doesn't hug. It is such a fun style and material. I highly recommend!
So many complements! This shirt fits really well and translates from a semi casual work environment to night, no problem.

links_reviews_title: Not bad but not what i expected
links_reviews_text: I thought the material was going to be silk and didnt realize the neck was a separate handkerchief. Not a lot of hanger appeal but when worn its actually kinda cute and bold. A fun different look.

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a day on the water
links_reviews_text: Adorable shirt...wore to a boating brunch.

links_reviews_title: So pretty and soooo colorful. I got compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: the color on this is amazing. it looks better in person and goes perfect with denim and white.
Runs small

The material was not what I had expected - I thought it would be more silky - and the fabric seems a bit cheap. However, the fit was cute. The scarf did not come with the order for size 38, but I wore it without, which made for a more casual look. Comfortable short though. Also - bra shows under the arms.
It was tighter in my chest. and it was shorter in the body. I like a little length to tuck into my jeans in the front.

I am petite (5'0). The torso is long on me so while it fit it bunch up because of its straight cut. The 40 was perfect for width of chest and shoulders though. The black enamel on the top snap buttons at the back of neck are chipped. I wish I was taller to wear this!

I wore a long black blazer over this which toned it down a bit, but would've worn it without as well. The size 42 fit me well (usually wear a S or M top, 34-35b). Due to the boxy design and arms/sides silhouette, I recommend this for ladies who have well-toned arms for the most flattering look. Also, beware that since this is a woven cotton textile, it's prone to wrinkling and lacks stretch. Would rent again in the same size.
I'm pretty adventurous but this was a little too crazy for me. The shape is very boxy so it swallowed my shape. Didn't wear, unfortunately.
C
Great colours and print but unflattering boxy shape
Was a bit narrow in the fit; however, so great. I received so many compliments on this top. The scarf was an awesome touch; however, it didn't stay in place very well.

The colors are red and royal blue--it looked turquoise in the pic to me. The scarf is a separate piece and drove me a bit nuts trying to keep it straight. But the style and bright colors are really fun and I got a lot of compliments on it. May need to be ironed on arrival. It's cotton and doesn't ship well.

links_reviews_title: It was a great statement piece.
links_reviews_text: Super cute, added some spice to everyday casual wear. I could have gone a size down, it was a bit big. Overall, I was happy with it.
Was difficult to wear and as other reviews have noted, it's a little bit boxy. However, with the right styling this could be a great top that really stands out.
Wore this with a pair of red pants. Did not find it to be strange fit as others mentioned Perhaps size up? I wore it tucked in.
Snug in hip but over all great

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern. Not flattering at all on.
links_reviews_text: It's two pieces. The neck is a scarf thing you need to tie up. Very boxy fit. Did not wear.
The fit is perfect! The stripes are so much fun! So unique! Can be dressed up or down! Rent this top!

this shirt looks so cute online but was a major disappointment in person. the material is stiff and makes the shirt look cheap. the fit is very boxy, and the fun collar (in my opinion, the best part of the shirt) isn't even attached! it came in a separate bag and was almost impossible to style it the way it looked online. I didn't end up wearing it, and will definitely never rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Bold colors and great little scarf!
links_reviews_text: This was a great statement top. I unintentionally wore it to the airport for a work trip and felt like a Southwest Airlines attendant, but other than that, I did enjoy the top.

This is such a high-fashion and chic top, but still totally fun and fresh. It fit true to size but can be a little on the smaller side because it has no stretch to the fabric. If you have a curvier bust, I would definitely recommend sizing up. I would recommend styling this with black pants and white heels - So fashion forward and on trend for a bold statement look.
This is a great color but WAY too big for me.
This coat is the most beautiful shade of red! It's stunning, but runs very large and is somewhat boxy.
Very fun color, but it is very oversized. It is a very lighthearted coat, as well, I had to layer to feel warm.

I loved this coat. It's such a rich beautiful color. I wore it everyday for the month of February. It was great for wearing over my suits for work but still looked good with jeans and a sweater. It's a little bulky but it is warm. My favorite of the coats I rented.
Awesome color and fit. Received tons of compliments! Will rent again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! The color is beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Loved this red coat. I wore it a few times with a variety of things: a blush dress for work, a white top and black skinny jeans, etc. it looked great with everything. If I were to rent again, I would rent a size 8. The 8 wasn't available so I went with a 10. Normally I'm a 10, so I though it would be fine, but it was quite large.
This coat is gorgeous. The color is a rich orangy red. It's a little oversized but I like that style. It's also super warm. Love love love.
Silky pockets, very well made, soft and furry shell, gorgeous color. A real eye-catching coat. Good for the mildly chilly day. Boxy, oversized fit.

Loved this so much I wore it for a work photo shoot! This coat makes a great statement and I got tons of compliments on it! I would say that it's fairly warm but I wore a warmup jacket under it in NY- if you're dealing with 20 degree winter days, you'll want something warmer, but it's good for weather on the high 30s and up. The size two still gave me a great boxy shape without being too big, and my friend who was going to get it in a size six tried it on and it also fit her no problem- so definitely get a size down!
I get so many compliments on this coat. I'm considering buying it. It soft and warm enough for most winter days for me.

Runs a bit large, but the cut is supposed to be baggy. the pocket flaps are odd bc the real pockets aren't where the flaps are. the color is gorgeous though, it's warm enough for 30 degree weather, and the fabric is nice and soft.
Fit beautifully and was so warm. Also, it photographed so well. Would rent again.
This coat got tons of comments, kept me warm and fit easily over sweaters. Not too precious a fabric, either, held up well with tote & backpack straps. Super roomy. I would order an 8 next time.
Loved the color, but I should have sized down as it is quite oversized. Otherwise the quality is beautiful and it is warm and chic!
Glad I read reviews because coat is big. I got a 4 and it was oversized but perfect for winter layering. I would definitely get this again.

links_reviews_title: if you like to stand out
links_reviews_text: great color and material easy to put on and comfortable to wear runs large

links_reviews_title: runs reliably 2 sizes too big, I am usually a 12 or 10 and was swimming in a ten
links_reviews_text: couldn't wear, it was way too big

links_reviews_title: I was super excited about this piece until I tried it on. Unfortunately, it was much too large.
links_reviews_text: It was so large that the sleeves went past my hands and there was lots of gathering in the back. It was not a good look.
Wore this out for drinks and everyone who saw me in it said some variation of "I love that coat, it really makes your features pop." Also comfy and warm.
fit large and roomy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and cozy as a blanket!
links_reviews_text: Love Love Love this Coat. Perfect for every occasion. Wore with jeans, suits, and cocktail attire. Warm, soft, and stylish. Lots of compliments. Only issue was it is REALLY big. I am usually an 8, ordered a 6 based on other reviews, and wish I'd gotten a 4.
Rented this for every day wear. Fit was oversized, would recommend sizing down one. The color is gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a daily basis
links_reviews_text: Loved the oversized cozy fit and the eye popping red color

links_reviews_title: I usually wear an 8 jacket/blazer, saw the reviews, ordered a 4, and it was huge---
links_reviews_text: The size 4 fit like a size 12 or 14---- I am 5/7 135 lbs--- usually wear an 8

The picture is true to color. It is BRIGHT red. I think it's got a bit of reddish orange in it; that's why it's so red. I love it tho. It adds a pop of color in a sea of black coats. It instantly, instantly brings an otherwise boring outfit up to a whole new level. I walk with more confidence with this coat on. I wore it to work and going out. It is pretty warm. I was able to wear it in +35 F weather in NYC. It does run a bit large, but I like that because I can wear a chunky sweater underneath comfortably. I would highly recommend it.
This coat definitely runs large, but I liked it. It's a great vibrant color and I almost didn't want to return it.

I didn't wear this. I expected it to be oversized, but on me it was really big and looked silly. I own another Trina Turk coat in a size 6 that fits perfectly. This might look better on somebody taller than me (I'm 5'4").

links_reviews_title: Loved the color- an orange red, almost "safety" orange.
links_reviews_text: Loads of compliments when I wore this. Very warm and perfect for 35-45 F weather. Very very over-sized. I possibly could have gone down 2 sizes.
I keep this coat for three months! I'm sending it back only bc I found a coat very much like it on sale. Great quality, beautiful red. So many compliments!!!
The color is beautiful but the coat is super big. I sized down to a 2 and probably could have used 2 more sizes down. Fun printed lining.
I love this. A friend remarked how she is always wearing her ski jacket b/c that is so comfortable. I made her try this on. Looks great and feels great.
I downsized AND wore an oversized sweater and STILL huge on me. Could not wear it. I should have gone down 2 sizes as recommended by everyone else!

links_reviews_title: Loved this, great color, thinking of buying.
links_reviews_text: Not the warmest coat, but perfect for the holidays. Great when I visited my parents in Southern California, not so much for NYC winters.
Loved it

links_reviews_title: This was made to drape and look fantastic - just not on me
links_reviews_text: This jacket would look amazing on someone with a different weight distribution. Mine's all over, so this just added to the round dumpling effect - but it would look so great on someone with either an apple or pear shape. The color is vibrant and bright and gorgeous. I fit two sizes smaller than my usual with a nice sweater underneath. I didn't wear it out, because the cut didn't flatter.
It's a bigger fit but its cute that way.

links_reviews_title: Size way down. I usually wear a 6, but based on reviews, I ordered a 4. It was still far too big.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear the coat so can't comment here.
Size 6 was super large could have went with a 2. But still a great coat!

links_reviews_title: Just wore it for the daytime!
links_reviews_text: I was really excited about this coat, but ultimately wasn't in love. The fabric was a little thin and felt very felt-like, and wasn't super warm. I thought it would be a little more structured, but the fabric was really soft and kind of droopy, if that makes sense. It looked cute on, but just wasn't for me! I will be sticking with more tailored coats in the future, I think.
runs WAY big. i think it is meant to be oversized but just looked ridiculous on me.

links_reviews_title: SO CUTE and super thick /good material
links_reviews_text: Y'all. Love this skirt. It's thick and stretchy and it can adjust to your body type ! I have an hourglass frame so the ruffles really did make my hips look larger , but I love a good hourglass body! Flaunt what u have!
Will rent again!!

Wore this is an outdoor concert at the beach as well as multiple other times on vacation etc. skirt it very cute and different. A little short but perfect for summer. The inside liner rode up a bit but didn't bother me too much.
I wore this for a date night and it was so girly and cute. It was a perfect length, not too short and was great with a pair of wedges. I would recommend this for any occasion.
Loved this, super cute and fun. Wore on a date and just for fun.

links_reviews_title: Fit was perfect. Tons of compliments. Cute for weekend or work. Pair with heels for nighttime.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. No complaints.
Beautiful flirty skirt

links_reviews_title: People stopped me on the street multiple times to say how much they loved the skirt
links_reviews_text: #fun #cute #party #datenight

links_reviews_title: So versatile! Great day to night skirt
links_reviews_text: True to size
Loved everything about this skirt! Got lots of compliments and it was a great length considering I'm 5'11"

links_reviews_title: Fun skirt, but needed bloused shirt
links_reviews_text: This was a great vacation skirt. Perfect fun smile. I would have thought i could wear a fitted tank but the top of the skirt is so cinched it didn't look right. A loose fitting shirt and jean jacket were perfect though!
Super cute & fit right

LOVE this skirt! I got a lot of compliments on it--from a wide cast of characters. My teenage daughter wanted to borrow it and a friend's husband who never commented on anything before said, "I love your skirt--or whatever it is." I thought I would wear it over a bathing suit to the beach but there's too much fabric. I did wear it with a t shirt to a party. Also was great for just walking around, paired with tank top and sneakers. Deciding whether or not I buy it!

links_reviews_title: Really cute, just didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: Very cute skirt with pretty floral detail, but the ruffles poof out a ton. Wasn't flattering for me.

links_reviews_title: made me look like a cup cake
links_reviews_text: i have smaller legs and a petite frame so this kindof made me look like a cupcake. a little too poofy for me. its very cute and well made. but not for me
too form fitting at waist, unless you have a super flat tummy, it will show!
The skirt is definitely a bit tight but I think its supposed to fit that way. Very flirty and fun!

Absolutely loved this skirt!! I wore it to work and then to drinks after with friends! Perfect for both! Can be paired with a tshirt and cute sneakers or a nicer top and sandals. I got tons of compliments when I wore it both ways! Will definitely rent again!!
Felt like a 7yo girl wearing this but what a fun skirt! Super high quality

links_reviews_title: I tried this on in the store thinking it was a top!
links_reviews_text: I would never wear this as a skirt because I love it as a top more!
its an awkward style unless you're stick thin. I wish I was, the prints and colors are adorable!
Cute on trend skirt for vacation. Runs very small so size up.

links_reviews_title: Fun, but a little too "poofy" for me
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size, but I found that the different layers created a bit more volume than I would have preferred.

links_reviews_title: Great skirt, need a tight blouse to balance the puffiness at the bottom
links_reviews_text: Did not end up wearing the skirt. It was incredibly puffy.
1000x yes. Favorite earrings on RTR i need to own these. So easy and go with everything and light weight. No brainer, add to cart ASAP
A little hard to get on at first but they are beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Modern and unique twist on the everyday gold hoop
links_reviews_text: I wore these just about everyday. They were heavier but, that was expected. I was able to wear them throughout the work day. Great quality and can go with any outfit.

links_reviews_title: Perfect earrings to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Loved these earrings so much! They are stunning and true to size.
Loved this sparkly piece - added a subtle statement. Very flattering. A bit itchy.

Love the fabric and metallic look of this sweater. The only thing to consider is that it's very short in the torso compared to the model photo -so you will have to wear it with something high waisted.
Fits snug but with a lot of stretch. I'm usually an XS or S for tops and the M worked well.

links_reviews_title: Sweater has gold threads that make it look like a holiday sweater
links_reviews_text: Lightweight sweater, short in the torso. I was on the fence about it when my daughter said it looks like a holiday sweater due to the gold throughout. She was right I probably won't end up wearing this one after all.

It finally happened- I got a rental new with tags! This sweater is beautiful and perfect for the fall. It has some shine to it which adds some nice detail. It seemed to run a little small- the length was fairly cropped, and the sleeves were too short for me. I expected them to be longer since they are full length on the model in the picture, and I'm assuming she's pretty tall! That's a small detail, though because I wore them pushed up to 3/4. Overall- great sweater!

links_reviews_title: allowed me to wear really nice jeans with a belt - not my usual look
links_reviews_text: a little too tight around the neck
Slightly sparkly. Fit me very well.

Wore this for work and to my holiday party that was during the week after work at a nice restaurant. I paired it with dark green dress pants. The arms are short, but I think that is my design. They were wrist length on me. Although most sweaters are longer in the arms, I felt like the shorter length made it more professional/tailored.

links_reviews_title: Stunning cropped sweater with a hint of sparkle.
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this sweater except the very short length on my 5’9” frame.

Paired this with high-wasited button front cords for a party and got lots of compliments. But definitely size up! It kept coming untucked even from high waisted pants and had to keep the sleeves pushed up to hide how short they were

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear it due to size.
links_reviews_text: Smaller than expected so I had to return it. It was also more sparky than it looks in the photo.

links_reviews_title: Great casual but put together top!!
links_reviews_text: Wore once already as the MC at my son's pinewood derby event. Felt put together without looking cheap/trashy.
