Note: it is a bit cropped/short so best to wear with high waisted jeans. Wore with a pair of skinny jeans from spanx and some booties and felt great. Plan to wear again to work before returning.
nice colors, but very short. Picture on display deceiving.
Too short!
Didn't end up wearing I wasn't expecting it to be so sparkly

links_reviews_title: Pretty winter sweater but I am 5'9 and sleeves were too short and short on waist so size up.
links_reviews_text: Small. Size up.
A little short
This sweater is so fun but a little shorter in front than I like. Need to pair with hair waisted skirt or pants.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Crazy short in arms and torso.
links_reviews_text: This is not as pictured. Sleeves are bracelet length and top us very cropped. Marked as medium and overall size was fine, just extra, extra shirt.

links_reviews_title: Love this shirt! Very comfortable and stylish. You can dress it up, but also wear it to work.
links_reviews_text: This shirt fit me perfectly. I'm 5'0 and 110 lbs, so always worried that clothes may run big, but the XS was a great fit. Although the fabric looks like it would be itchy, it's surprisingly comfortable and kept me warm in the office. Only complaint is that it looks a little off if you try to tuck it into pants or jeans. Other than that, I have no complaints! Will definitely rent again.
This can be a nice everyday top or can be dressed up. It has a little shimmer to it. Fits nicely.

I loved this pullover - it's plush without being overly warm, and I loved the pretty mauve/pale pink color. I sized up for a looser, boxier fit. It's a little shorter than I was expecting - I felt comfortable wearing it with jeans but not leggings. Will def rent again in the cooler weather!
I loved this sweatshirt. I kept mine at home for a second month. Pretty color, cozy, and super easy to wear. I loooooooved it.
This sweater is so comfortable and easy to wear with leggings, jeans, or shorts. It's a baggy fit but fitted in the sleeves.
perfect loose fit
This sweatshirt is super casual. It's fuzzy and warm but pretty short. Not bad for lounging around but that would be about it for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a super casual sweatshirt.
links_reviews_text: Loved it
Simple comfortable causal top
Fun polar bear pattern for winter season. It's cute and festive and not itchy but very soft and you do not overheat.

links_reviews_title: Fits snug but sleeves and legs need to be longer.
links_reviews_text: If you're tall this is no good. Also, it stretch's out too much.

This piece is everything you'd expect from this designer. Well constructed, beautiful and so comfortable. However I really struggled with what to wear on top to make these pants just right. I definitely felt like I was swimming in them as well, so size down if needed.

These fit slightly large in the waist but I wear between a zero and two so they are probably pretty true to size. I'm only 5'2" so they are also a little long but they felt great and I loved wearing them.
Super comfortable and cute, these pinstriped pants will look great on anyone and can be worn with everything from a t and sneaks to a silk blouse and heels. Love love love.

links_reviews_title: The perfect plaid trouser with modern details
links_reviews_text: I've been looking for a nice pin stripped pant for a while now and these were perfect. I loved the wide leg and folded waistband. They were very comfortable as well. These fit perfectly, but if I had a big meal that day I might have sizes up!

Cute and different (almost evokes a sort of 1930s thing), comfortable, and has pockets that fit more than just your fingers! I really liked the pleating, and the blue/black color is versatile. I would note that they are unlined and given the thin material, did tend to wrinkle over the course of the day. The side zip closure was also prone to sticking at the waistband. My main hang up at the end of the day is that they are somewhat restricted from a style perspective, which isn't ideal for a work pant. Given the wide leg and pleating on the hips, I found that they were only flattering when worn with a pretty closely tailored top and stilettos, and pinstripes don't go with everything. As a result, they sat in my closet awhile before I wore them. I may rent again when I want to wear these specific pants with something, but I did not find them to be the type of rental you rotate through your regular work wardrobe.
Wore them to work and loved them! Comfortable and fit true to size.

These pants are great. I love the design, the pockets, and the fit. They hit me at my true ankles standing which was a pleasant surprise. I probably could/should have worn an 8 but I plussed up after a particularly indulgent Thanksgiving.
I typically wear black skinny ankle pants for work. This was a nice option to mix it up a bit
Fit perfectly at the waist and were a good length for my short stature. Flattering fit and classy for work. Change of pace from regular work pants.

links_reviews_title: Love love these wide leg pants
links_reviews_text: These are so cute, flattering and fun. A little bit in the waist but a great fit in the legs and butt. I have thick legs and sometimes wide leg pants end up being tighter than expected through the leg. Not the case with these! Loved them!

links_reviews_title: I loved these pants and got a ton of compliments on them from all of my coworkers!
links_reviews_text: These pants fit great around my waist and were the right amount of loose through the rest of the leg. They looked awesome paired with a cute button down shirt or white turtleneck sweater.
Slightly large in the crouch but not noticeable. Very professional look. Easy wear. Light fabric.
Fit was really nice for me. I am very pear shaped - about 27" waist and 40" hip with a very long torso. pants were light and comfortable and looked good for work
Size four was too big and these size two fit but for the last 1/2 inch of zipper. I liked these but my husband didn't think they were flattering. Good length for petite women.

The pattern is classic. Fabric is on the thin and light weight side but still structured. Runs a tiny bit large so not super high waist as expected. Big and deep pockets are a plus. Would rent again size down.

I rented these to try our the culotte trend and see how these would look. It's a nice light fabric and a good cut even for women with larger hips, but they were too large and should probably have gone with a smaller size.
High quality pants! I liked the fit, accentuates the waist and flares at the bottom. Cons are that they do get wrinkly so I had to iron it every time I wore it.
These were exactly what I wanted - they fit perfectly and were comfortable. Very good quality as well!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable I ended up buying them!
links_reviews_text: The 2 was a little large around the waist, but super comfortable! Loved the thickness of the material: not too thin, not too thick. I'm short, so these cut off right at my ankles. Ended up buying these because I loved them so much.

I would have saved these for summer if I had realized they were a thin material. I also don't know WTF I was thinking renting a smaller size in LK Bennett, as I have found this brand runs small. Needless to say I couldn't zip them up all the way but could hide that with a longer sweater. The waist was very tight but the width of the pants seemed fine and they actually ran longer than they look in the picture.
I was so excited for these, but sadly they arrived and I saw how unflattering they were. They were large all over, and made my hips and thighs look huge. Could not wear
I sized up to a 14 as it was my first time renting pants. These were huge all over. Did not think even sizing down would work. Sent back without wearing
To big
I've always been skeptical of wide leg pants, but these were great. They looked great, were extremely comfortable, and still looked polished for work. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Funky length but liked the stripes
links_reviews_text: Fit okay. I wouldn't have bought these at the store but wore them because I wanted to get make my rental worthwhile. The pleats were a little funky (I have pretty big hips) but what was really weird was the length. They came almost to the tops of my shoes. I am sure I looked kind of crazy at work, but c'est la vie!
I'm 5'4" so they fit me like regular pants length. Like the way they fit could have actually used smaller size just based on the pleats.

links_reviews_title: Great style but just didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a 10 with this designer. I could not wear these - they were absolutely huge. I will size down two sizes when I re-order.

These pants are so effortlessly chic and work appropriate. I loved wearing them. I sized up because it is an English brand and I tend to need to go up a size for their sizing but this brand is TTS. If you are on the shorter side these may fall at an awkward length.

links_reviews_title: Very cute for a casual work day

links_reviews_text: Sheds like crazy so beware when wearing with darker colors.

I like a good oversized cardigan this time of year. It helps avoid bulky jackets. This one is okay - it doesn't have pockets and it was way "fuzzier" than it appears in pics. Luckily it's not itchy. It just kind of gave me a bag lady feel.
It's not too fitted so you'll still feel comfortable after eating, but still has that fitted look. Love it a bunch, and reordered it before sending the original back to get dry cleaned.

Solid sweater. It was a fun, bright red which was great for the holidays. The fabric and the ribbing made it feel and look a little more nice/high end. Other than that, it's just a basic red sweater, but a good one! Ran true to size.

I really like the color of this knit and it was really comfortable wearing it. I usually wear small but had no size so just rented medium. It was slightly big for me but still it worked fine even with a slight big fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, but a challenging shape.
links_reviews_text: Due to the fabric, this top was an odd shape and difficult to find the right bottoms to match with it. The length of the arms and top itself was exceptionally long and the material didn't lay properly and thus, it always looked bunched.
Nice color and fit (not too tight); material is bit itchy.
Loved tight fit, and lovely bright colour. Wore it loads, can easily dress up. Would happily buy but it's not worth $171!!
Great color for multi-seasons.

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color for the winter
links_reviews_text: This top is meant to be tight fitting, so keep that in mind! It's a really great color. Still warm even though it's not super thick, which made it great to tuck into high waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: I wore this sweater multiple times- under a work jacket or with jeans, belted or not
links_reviews_text: This sweater feels true to size, and is an amazing color! I have long arms and I did not feel like I had to constantly pull my sleeves down all day. The ribbed material is a bit thicker so it hides bumps. I am used to open neck or v-neck sweaters, so this was a change for me. If you are uncomfortable with the collar close to your neck, this may not be for you. Overall, I loved it and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great cut, perfect for work/everyday when you want to look a bit more polished
links_reviews_text: This knit is perfect to dress up a simple pair of work slacks or leather pants. The knit is sleek and wrinkle-resistant, the color is vibrant, and the fit is slim but not tight. I'd definitely buy in a few different colors.

links_reviews_title: Great color and style. Weird fabric.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was so stiff I had to wear an undershirt. Not very comfortable. Great color though.
Nice vibrant color, but nothing special. Needs to be tucked in to look polished because the ribs continue all the way to the bottom of the shirt.
Form fitting yet flattering. Very comfortable too!

This turtleneck is a little bulky for layering, which is what I originally rented it for. The sizing runs large in my opinion, and when the fabric bulks up it just feels heavy. Beautiful color though!
I LOVED this jacket! I wore this on a vacation to the snow and it was so chic and warm! Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket for my trip!
links_reviews_text: Loved having this for my vacation! It's warm and comfy, and although it's a bigger/thicker jacket, it's a true XS in that it wasn't too wide in the shoulders. Room for layering underneath. Wore this jacket the entire trip! Would definitely rent again (and considering buying it!!).
Dress up or dress down! Very nice quality
This coat was amaze !! The fur so warm and yes, It's reversible ! It fits true to size and it's so comfy & cute! If you're thinking about getting it, don't think twice. DO IT!!

Beautiful coat. A little more oversized than I expected, so it looked best worn open. Very warm and more versatile than I expected. I docked a star for some of the fraying at the cuffs and loose threads on the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Wore several times; very warm, very soft, is also reversible. Received many comments when I wore it
links_reviews_text: Fit great but can look a little bulky.
very warm & cozy TTS

This is what RTR is about! Who needs to personally own a faux fur houndstooth shearling trendy $600+ jacket? "Not I" said the cat! lol! With that said, it was sooooo much fun wearing this! It's definitely a statement piece. And let's not forget WARM!!! Although you're on your own on the bottom, the top is definitely secured with being bundled. If you like a snug fit, you may want to size down but if you plan to wear heavy layers like sweaters & sweatshirts then order your regular size. It's definitely cropped like literally stopping at above your waist. My arms are pretty long so I didn't roll up the cuffs. And last but not least if I'm not mistaken it's reversible! It was delivered inside out & I don't remember seeing any labels on the other side. I particularly never wore it on the other side because I thought it would be too dressy for me but a really cool feature nonetheless! Will rent again!!!

Really sharp Looks expensive Fake fur lining thru entire jacket so very soft. The fine check pattern looks very elegant. Wore it at work( my office is always cold) but is really a jacket that can be worn outside.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fluffy but fits small
links_reviews_text: The color, texture and fabric are all really nice. But fits small, especially around the arm and chest (and I don't even have large breasts). Definitely size up especially if wearing it as a winter coat over a sweater.

It's reversible and when I first received this I thought it was the wrong item. The other side is a light brown faux fur material. Very poofy and also cropped. Pockets are too high up. Does seem warm.

links_reviews_title: Unique, very warm, soft as a teddy bear
links_reviews_text: True to size, so many compliments
I love this coat. It was soft, warm and stylish. I received many compliments.

Absolutely loved this jacket and wore it multiple times. Incredibly warm even in super cold weather. Faux but feels like real fur. Tight fit but that's the design. Very stylish. No pockets is only downside

I loved this jacket. It's incredibly warm - I wore it today in Boston when the temps were 4 degrees Fahrenheit and it was perfect with a wool sweater & a tight base layer. Also, really cool looking with skinny jeans & boots or booties. I think I will keep it for another month, and maybe buy!

Real "Hallie Parker disguised as Annie James experiencing London for the first time from the back of a limo" vibes, here. I absolutely LIVE FOR THIS COAT. It's so warm and fashionable! I can't say enough good things about it. RENT THIS!!! Pics on @thanksitsrtr bc this app isn't letting me add a really cool pic of myself haha :(

links_reviews_title: Soooo cozy and perfect for chilly days and nights.
links_reviews_text: Fits well. Tight on the arms but super fuzzy and i loved it.
fits a bit boxy but great style and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color for a fun night out
links_reviews_text: Fun, feminine, flirty and flattering. It slipped on the shoulders a bit, but not too bad. I wore a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful too great for work or night out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top, so many compliments! Wore it to work with it safety pinned to close a bit more (could also wear a cami under), and then again to dinner. The color is stunning! Looked great with white and blue jeans. I didn't wear the belt that came with it - highly recommend
I really liked the color of the blouse and the cut. It's very feminine and accentuates the waist.
Lovely, flirty and feminine but size up to wear as intended-closed with the snap. Worked fine but was a bit snug. Paired nicely with black trousers and simple flats.
The fit is tight around the bust and has a very deep V-neck. It's very pretty and looks good with a camisole under if you wear it to work

Loved the fabric, design, and silhouette. I wore it for a date and had to use a safety pin at the chest. It just ran really small and I am not large chested! Definitely size up if you're larger than an A cup. The sash was a nice special touch.

I wore this for a date night with my husband. I don't usually wear anything this brightly colored, so it was a fun change for me. It was frilly and feminine, without being over-the-top. The button closure at the top of the bodice kept it from opening, which was really nice. The optional tie is a nice touch, and I probably could've worn it without, but the I felt like the top ran a bit large, so tying at the waist was the right choice. This top was cool and comfortable at a bar and crowded comedy club.
Very cute shirt, you may have to wear a top underneath since it is a little bit low cut but a very nice fit

The top fits in my normal size and the fabric is really beautiful, but the neckline is SO low. I could've worn a camisole underneath, but thought that it would really take away from the beautiful print material. For a top that would typically be a "work-appropriate style," it seemed contradictory to the rest of the top's style to be so low cut.

links_reviews_title: The fabric pattern was beautiful but the snap kept coming undone.
links_reviews_text: Needed to wear a cami under this even with the snap closed. It was tight in the chest and the snap kept coming undone which was annoying being at work. It fit well everywhere else so I don't think sizing up would help.
Love this top. Flattering
the front wasn't pressed right so the lining showed most of the night and the snap at the chest kept coming unsapped so I was constantly fussing with this shirt. Terrible.
I loved this! So fun and feminine! I had to wear a shell under it because it ran big but it looked great with a shell and made me feel pretty.
This top has a cute fabric, but there are way too many ruffles. It hit me in the wrong places, and the ruffles made me look like I had enormous hips. Sent back immediately.
Cute top
This top fit very well, accentuating my smaller waist. It was fun!
Love this blouse. Great cut and fit. Snap doesn't keep top closed but a safety pin fixed it. Considering keeping.

links_reviews_title: Don't rent this unless you want your entire chest exposed
links_reviews_text: The shirt fit fine, true to size. The v neck was down to my sternum.
A very cute top. Flattering, comfortable, and stylish. Would rent again.
Too tight
uncomfortable fabric
The hook kept popping open!

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual for day or night.
links_reviews_text: True to size for the most part. My bust wasn't quite big enough to fill it out. So, if you are small busted, probably should size down.
The size 12 I rented did not come with the sash as shone on the picture, but it was a fun top to wear.
Comes up short in the torso and you need to wear a little camisole underneath but it looks great on!
Couldn't wear it at all. Too tight.

This top was ADORABLE I received so many compliments on it! My only complaint was that the snap at bust would pop open if I moved to quickly/ laughed. I wear a 34B and rented a size 2 that fit nicely every where but if you have a larger bust I would definitely size up

links_reviews_title: It was a nice pop of color
links_reviews_text: The fabric and print are great, the snap that hold the shirt together continued to open whenever I moved. It is also on the shorter side.

Overall this top was true to size BUT I could not wear it like the model in the picture. There is a snap right at the chest but there needed to be about 4 more inches of fabric to close the snap. A cami was necessary due to how low cut it wore on me. The fabric was nice and not see through.

links_reviews_title: Everyday wear to add some spring color to a fairly dark wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: Liked it, didn't love it. Nice material and cheery colors. Didn't drape properly and tight across the chest. Could have been just a shade longer, though I am tall, so may not be a problem for others. My high hopes were disappointed. Could work better for a different body shape.
Did not fit me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect blouse to wear for Spring.
links_reviews_text: This blouse is to wear in spring. Loved the belt. My only complaint about this lovely top is that the snap button would pop open and revealed more than I wanted. I had to wear a tank top under it.
Fun top. Low cut for smaller chested girls. Pinned it and it looked great.
Size up if you have larger breasts.

links_reviews_title: Can't believe I wore hot pink!
links_reviews_text: Really not something I would typically go for, but this shirt was super cute. It made me feel so good! Will definitely be renting again for a vacation later this summer.
Great fit, very fun print
Top just too frilly for my taste & runs small across the chest.

links_reviews_title: It looks even better in person!! It's really beautiful!
links_reviews_text: It fits pretty true to size.
I am not a big girl and certainly not in the chest area. Very unflattering.
I would like to have worn it but it didn't fit. I feel like I should go up 2 sizes if I want to rent again. The middle button kept unsnapping and everything was too tight.

links_reviews_title: The dress brought to life our CASITA family photos. The colors are even better in life.
links_reviews_text: The colors are so vibrant and beautiful. This dress fits beautiful for any woman with curves. I'm small chested with wide hips and I felt very comfortable wearing it.

The print and colors are beautiful. The details on the embroidery is what makes it. If it wasn't so tight in the band at the top, it would be perfect. Due to the tightness of the band, I went without a bra. I would'n't size up though because then the straps would fall down. This dress isn't about shape, but it about fabric quality . If you're okay with that, then you'll love this dress.
Such a fun and colorful dress. It does run a bit tight in the bust area but overall very comfortable.
Love this dress! Fit was perfect as well as length. Got so many compliments on this dress. The print and colors were great and really made the dress stand out. Will definitely order again!

I absolutely loved this dress. The colors were vibrant, the material was high quality and the details were beautiful. It was loose and fun to wear for a beach vacation. Like others have mentioned, the dress is extremely tight across the chest, so I was unable to wear a bra with it. Because of the thick fabric, I didn't really need one, but that did mean that the tag in the back of the dress was very itchy. If you are busty, you would definitely need to size up for this dress to work! So, the dress is true to size in the body, but definitely runs small in the chest.
Super fun print, comfortable and high quality
At 5'2" this was almost to long but it worked. Got compliments. A little loose around the bust I could have worn a 4.

I got this for a quinceanera/mexican themed party. I loved the authentic look and it was soooooo comfy. I wore a short jean jacket over it at first since it's winter time, but I was actually warm enough without the jacket. Maybe the thick cotton and long dress helped a bit. Or maybe it was just all the margaritas =P
Bought this for a vacation to Egypt. So comfy and beautiful! The top is a bit tight, but other than that it's perfect!

This dress feels like breezy luxury. Beautiful colors, rich embroidery and a flattering fit made it my favorite dress on vacation. Perfect for dinner at a nice resort. As other reviewers have mentioned, the straps are an unusual length that create a bit of a dilemma for large breasts. I had to decide whether to put my DDD cleavage over or under the top of the dress. I opted for a push-up strapless bra that pushed the girls slightly over the top. Without a bra, my breasts were completely covered and secure, creating a peasant-style fit that was more casual and still pretty.

I've rented this dress a few times- it never fails to impress. Wore this walking around and biking in tulum - perfect most comfortable sun dress for vacation or summertime. Endless compliments. Simply adorable.
Easy and breezy. I wore with hoops and a topnot, with a cool fedora and with a fresh blowout for a family lunch. Would be great for travel as it barely wrinkles and is resort perfection

Wore at 24 weeks pregnant. so wanted to love this dress - it is just beautiful. Unfortunately, others have mentioned the fit on top is very weird. You can't really wear a bra - even a strapless one, because of how the bodice is. I don't have a large chest so went braless but the look is strange on top. The shoulder straps we're also too long on 5'3" me, so I had to wear a sweater on top to cover up. Maybe a smaller size wouldn't have had the strap issue - I went a size up from what I normally wear pre-pregnancy.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress on vacation. I wore in on Lana'i and in Cartagena in the daytime, and it fit in perfectly in both places. If your bust is bigger or lower than that top bust piece, that piece will sit above your boobs. I would've liked it even better if the top section fit me across the bust, but it was still really cute.

I rented this for Mexico and the pattern was perfect! I felt soooo cute. The length is really great and material. The only trouble is the bust as it's very snug. I definitely couldn't wear a bra and had to let go of my busy fitting in the top properly. It looks cute regardless!
I thought this would be a weird fit but it's the most comfy maxi I've ever worn! Was in great condition too.

Couldn't get enough of this dress! It's a weighty fabric with gorgeous embroidery at the straps and skirt, narrow at the chest and flowy through the waist and skirt. At 7 months pregnant I wore with a denim jacket to the office and by itself to the fair. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: Easy and fun! Fit as expected and got so many compliments. Allowed me to hang on to summer for one more weekend!

links_reviews_title: fun dress for a casual weekend
links_reviews_text: This is definitely not the most flattering dress, but I did actually really love it - I actually wore it three times while I had it! Once to work with a little jacket, once out at night on Nantucket and then for a day in Cape Cod. For my height, it was basically the perfect length maxi and I loved the printed fabric. For a casual dress I would totally recommend! I do agree though that it was a little tight around the top, so while the material on the bottom runs maybe a little big, I thought the top was true to size.
Rented this for vacation in Turkey! Loved it so much I wore it twice! True to size and didn't wear a bra with it. Was comfy and adorable!
I liked the look of this dress and it was very cool on a hot day. I ended up returning it after one wearing because the band at the top was uncomfortable and compressing.

links_reviews_title: "Little flower girl on a commune." Dress runs true to size. Beautiful fabric.
links_reviews_text: I ended up not wearing this dress because it wasn't flattering on me and looked like a mumu. My husband commented that I looked like a "little flower girl living in a commune." The fabric is gorgeous and I love the orange color. I usually wear size 10 in RTR tops (5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and this dress in size 10 fit perfectly at the chest (which is the only place where it is fitted). It needs to be worn without a bra or with a strapless bra. Since the dress fits tight around the chest area (which is a good thing if going bra-less), it definitely flattens the chest like pancakes. Would be more comfortable if the chest band had some elastic in it. The straps are a bit long and are not adjustable, so they will likely fall off the shoulders a lot. If you like this style of dress, I recommend you give it a try. For me, I need a little bit more shape.

links_reviews_title: Ended up ordering another size up
links_reviews_text: Rented my true size six and what came had stains all over the bodice. The RTR staff were extremely kind and accommodating in letting me send it back. I had the same dress resent in a size 8, which fit much much better. This dress was perfect for a hot day at the brewery and paired well with yellow flatforms. I actually thought it made a great throw on and go dress!

links_reviews_title: I love the color and got a ton of compliments. Really comfortable and fun. I wear it with belt
links_reviews_text: Stylish, fun to pair with accessories and super gorgeous

Rented with unlimited. Followed other reviews and sized up to an 8. Happy I did because the chest was still a bit snug!...no stretch and side zip. Comfy and flowy everywhere else and very bump friendly. Wore this one a few times - work and backyard BBQ and people loved it. The colors and details are amazing in person!

I rented this for an outdoor wedding in May in NC. I would have rented a 10 or 12, but the 14 was the only size in stock. The straps and chest were a little big, but length and overall fitting was still great. I received so many compliments and loved the heavy but bright material!

This dress is bright and well made. The fabric is light to medium weight but cool enough for warmer temperatures. I added a belt to get more of a fitted look on the upper torso. The chest area is quite tight, and the rest of the dress quite flowy,so I would not recommend this dress to ladies with larger chests (it barely zipped over 34Bs). Overall another great rental!

links_reviews_title: Great for my 25 week baby bump
links_reviews_text: Like other reviewers, I found this to be very tight in the bust, but otherwise great for my baby bump. I probably would not wear if not pregnant as it's very loose fitting and would likely not be very flattering - but great for anyone wanting to hide any thing.
Love the print and the color. Wish it had pockets. Also found the bust to be very tight.

Perfect!! I seriously felt so great in this dress, I got a ton of compliments! The fabric is heavy enough to not need a bra, it's also really roomy for big meals. A great midi length for taller girls.
Super cute dress!! Casual and fun. Fits true to size. I wore a size 4. The top part of the dress does run on the snug size. The length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for NOLA Jazzfest. Comfortable and colorful!
links_reviews_text: Side zip felt secure. Quality cotton fabric with trim detailing. Straps are non-adjustable.
Loose and flowy in body of dress, perfect for 22 week baby bump. The chest area was restricted but overall the dress felt great and color is fabulous!
I loved this dress for our tropical vacay. Even thought it was a little big up top, it worked and was super comfy. I got lots of compliments, and many people asked me if I had bought it there.

I didn't really like how this dress fit - I think it would look better on a small busted girl. If you have a bust the front pushes out making you look pregnant. This dress would also work well for someone who IS PREGNANT! That being said I got so many compliments all day long. I put a jean jacket over it so that helped with the fit issue.
OBSESSED. Favorite rental yet.
Great for tropical chic. Beautiful eye-catching fabrics. Was snug around the top
Loved this dress. The armpits were tight, but it was very cute.
Loved the design and cut of the dress. Perfect for when it is very hot out and you dont want anything to stick to you. Maybe size up if you have a larger chest!

This dress was so good I almost had to buy it. I love dresses that you can dress up or down, and this is definitely one of those. I wore this dress twice during my rental. I styled it with an ankle strap heel for a casual rehearsal dinner, and then with a sandal for brunch and errands over the weekend. Another plus, this dress hides everything while still looking chic! #winning
My sister said they were cute from the front but looked like a diaper in the back
These are short in the front and roll down in the back so even if you're slaying clowns at a kids party your asset is covered.
A great pair of white shorts that you can pretty much wear with anything!

I was looking for high-waisted white shorts to wear with a bralette for my bachelorette weekend - these were perfect! They were comfortable to wear all day, didn't dig in at my waist, and fully covered my backside. The 28 was a bit loose around my natural waist, but I actually preferred it that way - it was more flattering and easier to dance in!
These were huge. Im normally a 0 or 2 and these fit like a 6 or 8.
Definitely size down one if possible! Cute fit and style.

These did not fit my body like some other reviewers unfortunately. I was looking for shorts that weren't super short. If you want them to fit as a longer/looser short, suggest ordering a size or two up. Disappointed.
Cute shorts, nothing special and runs small. Skip it.

links_reviews_title: Great shorts, but they run big!
links_reviews_text: They run big, but are a cute, oversized high waist style if you get the right size.
loose on butt
Front looks great, back sags and the hems won't stay up.
Wore them a ton on holiday and at home. Crazy comfortable, weirdly flattering despite being kinda puffy. Really want to keep them... might rent again and buy!
The fit was very straight and slightly small. They were really stiff and wouldn't have been comfortable even if they were a size larger. I didn't end up wearing them.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear on a hot day!
links_reviews_text: Once over the hips it’s a good fit. Love the loose fitting leg and easy to dress up or down!
They were very short - mostly in the front.

Might try in a smaller size but in this size they looked like a diaper on me. The inner thighs would not stay rolled up even just standing to try them on. If that had stay rolled up I might have attempted these but with that and then being to big it just wouldn't work.
too big, size down 2 to 3 sizes
On the larger side. Super cute for work! Can play up or down.

links_reviews_title: I wore this both to work and to hang out during the weekend. Love it!
links_reviews_text: I like the blue, black and white striped details. It is a little long, but that made it look good paired with leggings, and I also tucked it in with a skirt and it fit well. This top is versatile and was great choice. I would definitely rent it again!

I absolutely fell in love with this dress. It's so simple chic and versatile. I received so many compliments on this dress at a work meeting. I wore it 5 times and kept it for over a month. I wish I had purchased it and still may in the future!
Loved everything BUT the fabric is quite heavy and warm! But the neckline looks summery.

I had a little bit of order regret after choosing this for my unlimited shipment, but was pleasantly surprised upon arrival. This is unique, super easy to wear, and weirdly flattering?? I love it and can't wait to wear it to work! It is a bit warm - probably too warm for September in Oklahoma, but I'm going to hang on to it for a bit!!
Definitely oversized - I think going a size down would help! Super fun and different. I belted the dress so I didn't look like a blob lol

links_reviews_title: Super easy to wear for the day (with sneakers!) and then to switch it up to heels at night.
links_reviews_text: It's definitely oversized but I still found it flattering because it's flowy and also had the nice v-neck.

This was a perfect dress! Very put together, a chic cut that's relaxed but not sloppy, doesn't wrinkle, can be dressed up or down, and the navy makes it more interesting than a black dress. I almost talked myself into buying it I loved it so much. Would be perfect on vacation for multiple uses!

links_reviews_title: Comfy with a bit of dressy
links_reviews_text: This is really a bit of a "sack" dress but very comfortable with nice detail at the neck. Not a "figure flattering fit" but worked well for a vacation dress.
Super comfy. I went down one size and it was perfect. May have gotten away with regular size too. Lovely nuanced color when in the natural daylight. Stretchy fabric around cuffs, like a sweatshirt.
Can't go wrong with Tibi! Will rent 10 more times!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses ever!
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this dress! I rented it for vacation and wore it almost every day! I own a bunch of Tibi pieces and have rented a bunch from RTR and I am consistently a size 6 (their pieces tend to run small, as I'm usually a 4/6). This dress however, runs large so the 4 fit perfectly!

I rented this for some evening dinners on vacation. While the fabric and style was nice the overall cut and length were ridiculous on me. I'd recommend sizing down at least one size if you don't want the dress to be extremely oversized.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear dress. Dress it down or up
links_reviews_text: Great dress. I didn't size up, I'm 30 weeks pregnant and it fit perfect. Fun to wear with sneakers

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, but very low cut up top
links_reviews_text: Comfortable mumu; perfect for a casual house party (with cute slides). Very low cut in front and, because the fabric is fairly heavy, impossible to secure with fashion tape. Maybe size down if you want to wear it without a top underneath.
Loved this dress but looked best belted. It's enormous and tent like but with a belt it was great. I'd size down next time to an 8 or 10.
probably best if youre taller than 5'6", isnt too boxy and still can see your shape in it
Loved everything about this dress. Size down!!

this dress was incredibly light, flowy and beautiful. it does run a bit large so petite ladies, beware! the dress grazed my ankles and was a bit on the larger end--however, i really liked that it was oversized. i think you can belt it to make it more form fitting

links_reviews_title: Loved the look of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Way too large on me! Would definitely recommend sizing down about 1 or 2 sizes. It was very long on me and the sleeves went past my hands.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Anything and Everything
links_reviews_text: This is my absolute favorite dress. I've rented it so many times and have now dedicated the 4th spot on my unlimited plan for it. It's loose, but has a beautiful romantic silhouette. The teal is gorgeous, and the fabric isn't cheap, but also not too high maintenance. I've worn this to casual walks to the park, running around the city, at work, and at fancy brunches. You just cannot go wrong with this one. The length is a perfect midi, and is so easy to dress up or down.
Flattering and comfortable. Particularly cute when belted. Good material; looks nice!

One of the most comfortable yet beautiful and put together dresses. It's oversized by nature but I'd still consider sizing down 1 size next time (it just wasn't available this time around). It's a great canvas for styling lots of different ways -- belted or not, big earrings, can play with fun shoes, etc. So a good pick for a trip or time when you'll want to wear it a few times in a row but still have it feel different.

Love this dress!! I wore it three times during my rental period. It was perfect for the freezing cold spring weather we've been having. It is large and quite sack like, but that's just the look and I think it works! Will definitely rent again.

This might be my favorite rental yet. Can be dressed up or down, wire with gold boots for work and sneakers for running around town, flowy but not overwhelming. I usually run 6-8 but rented a 4, perfect. The color and fabric are beautiful, totally wanted to keep this classic.

links_reviews_title: Way oversize, in not flattering way
links_reviews_text: The dress is way over-sized, not in a flattering way. Tried to wear it with a belt, but didn't feel right. I ended up to wearing it once, don't think I would feel good in it. Maybe will do better job as maternity dress, maybe for someone with bigger curves, did not work at all for me.
Not form fitting, but I'm very petite and it didn't swallow me at all
Didn't get a chance to wear it, but 3 stars for the fabric feel.

links_reviews_title: Amazing compliments- I would rent again!
links_reviews_text: I love baggy clothing, especially dresses. The material just laid nicely without being to baggy.

links_reviews_title: Loved this for brunch with friends
links_reviews_text: Loved this maxi, runs very large, but is also generally baggy. Could have gone down a couple sizes, but it was great for making me feel put together running some errands and going to brunch with friends. Would definitely rent again.

A beautifully made dress. I'm rarely disappointed by any Tibi piece. I'm currently 9 months pregnant and I wore this to work, got endless compliments and it was so comfortable to move in and be in all day. I would say it runs over sized if you're not hugely pregnant but it's a nice lose fitting dress!
Wore for a few business meetings with tights and booties. Gorgeous, unique and comfortable but runs HUGE. I'm normally a 12 or 14 dress size and the 8 was still fairly generous. Def size down!
This dress was turning heads, in the best way possible. I wore this but honestly wished I had sized down at least 1 size. Will probably return and rent again in a smaller size.
Generous fit but still flattering

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a school function for my daughter and for dinner with necklace /boots
links_reviews_text: really great, nice flair, easy to put on but looks a little bit more elevated. Runs long in the sleeve.

Amazing dress that i paired with a belt to make empire wasted in order to dress it up a bit! I got so many compliments on this dress both times i wore it! Loved the material and dress as a whole, would probably size down to a 10.

links_reviews_title: Loved but too small to fit my iPhone 11
links_reviews_text: I was so excited when I saw RTR got this Susan Alexander bag in but was disappointed when it didn't fit my phone. I won't rent this one particular style again but glad there's a bigger version!
Very fun rental! The top is completely open and cant be closed so everything inside is exposed and could fall out.

Loved this sweet innocent top for rodeo! However the sleeves did fall a lot... I still felt overall pretty good in it. The material is thin and I didn't wear a bra - I don't think a girl could! The top is kind of awkwardly right around the chest.. It worked for me but may not for everyone.

Agree with the other users that the straps are very long. I should have tried to pin them but I didn't and they kept falling down. I loved the look of the shirt and it was cute for a day at Disney. It is definitely shorter in the front so if you don't want your stomach to show I suggest wearing high-waisted bottoms. Over all I really liked the top and I'm glad I rented it.
Cute but super wrinkley material, even after ironing. Straps were falling down continuously

links_reviews_title: definitely a little small and short but otherwise cute summer top
links_reviews_text: this top was cute and had a great summer feel to it but it was a little short and tight. i didn't have to wear a bra with it though

Loved this top. It was easy to pair with anything from pants to jean shorts and I also did not have to wear a bra with it (which is awesome!). However, it was really stretched out on the top and the straps were falling off of me. Someone definitely needed it in a larger size but still wore it and it was pretty frustrating having to pull up straps every 2 mins. Still a fun comfy top though!

links_reviews_title: Good for a casual night out
links_reviews_text: I usually am a medium but because of reviews went with a large and the straps were way too big, I suggest sticking with your regular size unless you have a bigger chest. It has a lot of stretch in the body of it and its flowy, would rent again.
Loved everything about this shirt except for the fact the straps kept falling down. Wrinkles easy.

I ordered the medium based upon other reviews. The straps were too long for me; however, if I ordered the small I believe it would have ended up showing my belly button which I never want to do. Also wrinkles easily, but I like that I didn't have to wear a bra and was comfy to wear too.

An adorable summer top. Super lightweight material, almost see through perfect for unbearably hot day. Smocking falls above the chest so the top is boxy and voluminous but I loved it with skinny jeans and minimal accessories. Would recommend !
Size down for this. Very very flowy and not a lot of shape. Still such a cute pattern though.

The perfect top for a sweltering summer day! Running true to size, we recommend sizing up as there is no stretch to the fabric and this does have a fitted lining beneath the flowy top. This can be worn with a standard bra, but is best for women with A-C cup sizes. Pair with your comfiest jeans and a simple necklace for a perfect daytime look!
So cute! But very boxy. Not flattering if you want to take pictures.
Could've gone a size up because of my chest. Perfect summer tank and wished I had a better size.
Too small unfortunately and I couldn't wear it. Not very flattering either (ordered size m, 150 lbs 5"5)

links_reviews_title: Cute print but disappointed in fit
links_reviews_text: Maybe better for girls with smaller boobs.
good fit
Cute, fit well and very flowy
Really cute too but more of a crop. It runs short but large bust-wise
I did not wear this. It's cute on the model, who is skinny with little curves. It did nothing for my figure, and I've got a good athletic build with hella curves. I looked like a blob.
Wore with white jeans, very cute and easy to throw on for a weekend day.
Runs a little small

The straps were definitely too long on the M, and somewhat long on the S. It's super annoying to have to keep pulling them up. Nice flowy fabric and good for a hot day. The body is also short. It looks much longer on the model online. I'm tall so maybe that's the problem. Wouldn't rent again. Kind of a bummer that I used my birthday rental on this.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Wizard of Oz showing.
links_reviews_text: This was so comfortable and cute.

Such a cute print. Unfortunately the shirt was already wrinkly when I received it and the straps didn't lay flat. It made the whole look a little disheveled because the top wasn't as crisp as it appears on the model.
I wore this with tight white skinny jeans. It is a cute shirt but has a bit of a little girl feel to it. Also, comes up a bit high.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! But it was stained
links_reviews_text: I loved this top.. it's slightly cropped, it was a boxier fit, cute and summery. Wore with high waisted white jeans. Only complaint is that there were small brown stains in several places on the top. They were subtle so I wore it anyway, but I'm still disappointed that RTR would send a shirt out that is visibly worn or with stains. Gross. Top itself was great, but as a customer I expect better quality control. Cross your fingers you get a clean one!
Top fit true to size. Super cute. My only complaint was that the straps kept falling off my shoulders! They were very loose. Kind of annoying to keep having to adjust.
very cute summery piece to wear with white jeans for errands around town.

Really cute top, but I shouldn't have sized up. I thought from the photos that it would be tighter in the bust, but it is very stretchy. I will probably try it again in a small. The gingham is very cute and girly, perfect for the weekend!
Pass if you have a large chest it made me look enormous

links_reviews_title: Soft and perfect picnic or BBQtank.
links_reviews_text: Super soft and lightweight. Was a little wrinkly but it didn't bother me. East to pair with shorts or jeans.
This fit was not flattering at all.
Fit great. Wore it with light wash jean shorts. Got many compliments. Strapless bra a must!

The straps were too long for my shoulders and not adjustable. The print is adorable, as is the shape, but it was way too poufy and unflattering. It did come new with tags and might work for certain body types, just not mine.

I love this shirt so much! I tied it loosely in the front for work, but I plan on wearing it this weekend and will tie it tighter to make the shirt more cropped. The pattern matches with dark, light, white, even pink pants. The fabric is light and airy. I love how it hangs.
This blouse is super cute! Pretty delicate pattern and a trendy tie front detail. Loved the poufy wrist detail on the sleeves. Wore the L and it was true to size. Good everyday wear!

links_reviews_title: I liked it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This was sheer so I wore a cami underneath but it was perfect for brunch at the beach. My friend loved it too and I got other compliments while out so I bought it! It's cute enough to dress up, yet casual enough to dress down. Perfection!
Really loved this too. Wearing it for Easter. Wish I was a little bit longer but i can deal with it for one day. Great top to hide my arm
Super cute everyday blouse. Love the sleeve, front tie, and neck details. Colors are great for spring. Wore multiple times over the course of a couple weeks. No complaints!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a job interview and I got the job!!!!!
links_reviews_text: It's a light fabric and the prints are perfect for spring!
Light and breezy. Sheer-ish so I added a cami underneath. True to size.
I love this shirt. The pattern is so pretty and the tie in the front is flattering. Can dress up or down.
I've rented this more than once and love it with jeans
Would definitely rent again. Very cute top that fit true to size and worked very nicely with jeans. Wore to work with jeans as I work in a more casual office.
great

links_reviews_title: Cute top for work or everyday
links_reviews_text: Fit well true to size

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt, not for broader builds
links_reviews_text: I'm a little broader iwith an athletic build and it was tight along my back and shoulders. Afraid to wear it so I returned it. Such a cute shirt though!
Overall very nice material and good fit bit a little shorter than expected. Had to be careful at work. Also it's a little sheer so need to wear a tank top underneath.
Sheer just wear a shirt underneath
Long in the arms and tight across the chest.
Fits true to size with a cute pattern. Loved the tie at the bottom! Material was nice and was flowy.
Lovely print and colors, loose fit, super comfy!
Great color and fun print for spring/summer.
Fit was good and wore to work but nothing unique about it

I loved the print and fit. I'm usually a small or medium but the medium was perfect for the loose fit I like. I wore three times and decided to buy it as the price was right, too. Only issue for me is the clasp at the top doesn't stay closed, but I don't mind it open.

links_reviews_title: Cute flowy top for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: Flowy fit perfect for a day out. Fabric is thin but not see through since there's a cute pattern to it. Weather got much warmer than I anticipated but since the shirt was thin, I was able to stay cool. Would wear again!
Comfortable and flattering, the ties trail a bit long
Fabric is sheer but it's also slick and not very breathable. Not a good choice for a hot day despite the lightweight look.
Nice print
Fit true to size

Liked the print and the fact that it was new with tags. However, the front was a lot shorter than the back and I just didn't like the way that looked. I was unable to tuck in the back since I'm currently pregnant and wearing maternity work pants that go over the bump. However, the tie in the front hid my baby bump so well the girls at the OBGYN office didn't realize I was in my 2nd trimester!
Very light weight - great for warm weather.

This was the perfect blouse for an outing in Nashville where the weather was warm but lots of air conditioning. It is slightly sheer but not enough to need something underneath. The fit was perfect - slightly big in the body but the shoulders were right on.
Neckline doesn't lie flat for larger breasts.
Cute top a little big I would've gone a size down

I liked this top a lot, and my husband even complimented it. I liked it best with fitted pants, but it works well with the shorts in the picture too. There are circles embossed into the material which make the shirt feel more special. My only complaint on this item was the neck puckered a little in the middle, and I might have gone down a size and seen that go away.
Fits like a dream regardless of busy size. Can dress up or down. Adorable! I might rent again!
Wore this to a champagne brunch, it was super cute on but definitely a little square and the fabric a touch thick. Overall really glad I rented this one, would recommend. Fit was true to size.
Gorgeous detail. Fits great and is comfy.
It's hard to find a white top that isn't see through. This works.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to purchase. Better for petite frame
links_reviews_text: Always a small in tops. Was right around the shoulders. I am tall though, so maybe would work better on someone smaller

I always need a white shirt that doesn't need ironing and this worked well. While not a thin material, it is light weight enough and fits well. I couldn't go any smaller though in the shoulders but the room in the bust is fine. I don't have the gap that others mentioned despite having a larger chest. It is 70 degrees out with low humidity so it is comfortable. I don't think it would be that comfortable if it was much warmer or humid due to the polyester lining.

links_reviews_title: Fabric disappoints, fit and style just ok.
links_reviews_text: I was disappointed with the fabric - a yuck polyester feel and look.

links_reviews_title: Classy shirt for work or date
links_reviews_text: Rented the XS based on reviews that said it ran large. I'm normally an XS unless something is unusually tight in the bust. From the front view, I loved this shirt; however it left a weird kind of hump in the back because it didn't fall correctly on me. if I'd taken off my bra, it might have laid flat. Not that I'm super endowed at a 32DD, but it did fit better w/ none on. Just couldn't roll to work that way.

links_reviews_title: Very cute top, perfect for a casual day at the office.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, works well with dress pants or jeans. I wore this top to work but wish I had kept it for the opportunity to wear it out paired with jeans.
Fits well, very comfortable, easy to accessorize. The little frill at the bottom is small enough so it isn't overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: Cute, easy fit, flattering...overall a great day to day top!
links_reviews_text: Easy to dress up or down. Definitely want to rent again!
Great detail but a little boxy. Maybe should have gone a size smaller.

I wore this top to work with a pair of jeans for casual friday - unfortunately, the weather was a bit cooler than I had anticipated, so I spent much of the day wearing a cardigan over the shirt - and the shirt was just not meant to wear with a cardigan (not only could you not see the great detail in the shirt, but the shirt did not lay well under a sweater)
Too larege

links_reviews_title: Compliments from the boyfriend all day!
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to a lunch date with my boyfriend to his parents favorite Italian restaurant. He complimented my outfit all day and kept telling me how adorable I looked. I wish I had snapped some pics. The top is exactly as pictured. I do have a large busy so was a little tight in the chest, but not uncomfortable. Contemplated going braless since the top is well lined, but ended up wearing a very loose fitting bra since that was more comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. I wore with distressed skinny jeans and strappy nude chunky heels. Accessorized with large gold drop hoop earrings. It was perfect for the occasion.
Fit well and was versatile for work and weekend.

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt but never ended up wearing it...
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit large. The fabric is a little heavy for those hot summer days.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric and bright white color.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit boxy so the shape was unflattering for someone who is apple-shaped.
Good quality and fit, but longer length than pictured on the model.
fit great, lots of complements. light weight.
Simple but super cute eyelet. Loved this top!
I worse this top multiple times during my Update rental period. It goes with so much. I'm 21 weeks pregnant and it still fit true to size.
Too big returned without wearing.
good fit

As many have said, this is a slim-fitting knit, but I didn't find it too tight. It hits that spot on my waist that's neither too long or cropped, so I was certainly appreciative of that difference in length considering where most sweaters tend to fall these days. Being able to it wear it with higher waisted pants and skirts without any bunching and unnecessary outlines was another plus - for example, when worn with this thin silk skirt. On top of all that, I received plenty of compliments on this even during WFH Zoom calls!
Size L was the only size left in the store but it looked tiny on the hanger so I tried it on - so glad I did! Still very flattering and comfortable. Gorgeous color. Got tons of compliments at work.

Not as great as I was hoping. Runs small and fabric is a bit stiff so overall it was a little uncomfortable to wear a small, stiff turtleneck. Color was so pretty though that I'd maybe try giving it another shot in a larger size. I'm normally a S/XS and medium probably would have been a more comfortable fit.

links_reviews_title: Good for a cold spring day!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is very thick and warm and form fitting. Love the eye/lip detail.
A bit short, but looks very cute tucked into a skirt of high waisted pants. Thick material. Fits snug. Great for the office.
Warm, thick fabric. No stretch. I normally wear medium and was happy that I ordered the large!
The fabric is a thick, rough cotton, giving it little stretch and making it bunch easily.
The color is great! It runs a little small so I suggest sizing up.
Snug fit. I sized up and it was fine. Fabric was soft but it made me a little itchy
Super small and muted color not that vibrant
It's a nice sweater, but I would have gotten a S so I can layer a base under for the frigid winter. Great color.

This turtleneck is gorgeous! The color and embroidered logo are very noticeable and will attract many compliments. I am someone who has a long torso and arms so I wish I sized up. This piece is very form fitting. Every time I would wear it people commented on how tiny I looked.
Little on the snug side and a tad itchy but the color is everything
I absolutely loved this sweater. Higher waisted jeans look best. You can dress up or down. Thick expensive sweater material that does NOT itch. Great color considered buying this one.
Heavy fabric, bulky, stretched out in the chest area and just overall not flattering. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Too small and fabric wasn't soft!
links_reviews_text: Size up. Fit is tight and cropped and the fabric isn't very soft
Great for everyday

This sweater was a great option for a winter trip I took because it didn't wrinkle and it looked polished while still being comfortable. I loved the color and the eye detail. It is a little short (good for me because I'm short), but that might be something to note for tall girls!
warm and comfortable. Ample room but short.
Lovely turtleneck that fits well in a gorgeous color. Heavy weight, however. This is definitely a winter item.
Way too small, but tight and short in length! The tag was itchy, too. Couldn't even wear it.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit and I loved the color.
links_reviews_text: It might run a little short for someone with a longer torso.

links_reviews_title: Loved this turtle neck. It was great when the weather turned bitterly cold.
links_reviews_text: It is form fitting but not too tight.
Great color, great fit!

Thank goodness for reviews, because I'm always a small in tops, and the medium was very fitted on me. Unfortunately, the logo makes the top a tad juvenile, and combined with the color and crop length, my husband thought I was wearing a kids' shirt! So I wore it with a shawl/ scarf to hide the logo and cover a bit of the bright purple, and voila, professional! I recommend sizing up and wearing this with a blazer and high-waisted pants.

I love this sweater, it is extremely cute and I love how it looks on. However, the only negative thing is that it is pretty uncomfortable. It was very scratchy & itchy especially on the neck area. I wore the sweater for a few hours and when I took it off I have a red, irritated rash on my neck. I often wear form fitting turtleneck sweaters and I have never had this issue. Just something to keep in mind when renting this sweater. Like I said earlier, it is very cute...so I wish it was more comfortable. Beauty is pain though, so I wouldn't rule this sweater out. However, I did want to share my experience.
I ordered a size up and it still fit small. I do like how it it fits, though!
Cute sweater, nice quality. I was excited to snag this as a new arrival and it arrived NWT. I usually wear a 6, this looked fitted so I sized up to a large and it was tiny. I couldn't wear it.
Dark tint which was great. Heavier on the ears than my usual (very light) glasses.
These sunglasses are pretty great. They protect well from the sun and I've received loads of compliments. They fit snugly, so if you have a larger head or broader nose, I wouldn't recommend them.
Kept these for something like 3 weeks, they just elevated every outfit and were so easy to throw on. I probably would have kept them if they weren't a little big on my head!

links_reviews_title: These are really cute and match anything!
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear and fun!
Great material, strong and durable!
I wore this on my trip to London and Paris! It was perfect and warm.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy, not so flattering shape but lovely material
links_reviews_text: I actually loved this coat. It was a little unshapely as others have said, but I cinched you're the waist as tight as I could and wore it for a month or so in MN early winter (30s). It was so cozy and very warm and even though I thought I looked huge, I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great coat, perfect for 40's and 50's temps.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a trip to Europe. It's not super warm but worked well for the 40s and 50s degrees we had. It adds a little bulk and is not very slimming but it was comfortable and classy.

links_reviews_title: It read more Orvis than Halston
links_reviews_text: Warm coat but shapeless and too big. Can't imagine any way to make it look chic or fashionable. Large, frumpy sweater coat

links_reviews_title: So big and warm and comfy. I'm small, but it looked cute being oversized.
links_reviews_text: Very big, but had a cinched waist which helped the fit. Looked great over a very fitted outfit.

Definitely oversized, but perfect for cold winter weather because you can easily wear over thick layers. Has an elastic cinched waist that adds shape. Warm enough for cold and windy NYC winter. Would absolutely buy if I could!!
Love the cinched waist and it was so slinky/comfy. Big pockets. Good for low 30°s

links_reviews_title: Way too oversized, but oh soooo cozy warm!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is like wearing a blanket. It's so huge and cozy warm. It may not be the most flattering coat, but you won't care when you're snuggled down inside of it. Order a size down. (I did not... hence the result.) it has a unique cut to it and I think would look great if you could get a better fit. Did I mention how cozy this was?
This coat is very soft, comfortable and warm. great for those days you are getting in and out of the car for work or errands on a cold day.

links_reviews_title: warm, soft coat but was too big
links_reviews_text: fit a bit bigger and was very comfortable but just not my style. wish it buttoned up more.

links_reviews_title: Fits very large, not a flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Ordered a size down and it was still huge.

Great jacket for Chicago's slow transition to Spring. The jacket fit true to size (I'm a 6-8 and wore M). It hit me above the knee and cinched at the waist to offer a very flattering fit. My only complaint is the sleeves were just a little bit too short for my long arms. Otherwise I would have bought it!
super warm for the weather and perfect for everyday

Fit was perfect. Soft to touch. Very warm. There is an open neck to the style of coat so on a super cold day you need a scarf. Draw string on inside of coat allows you to cinch the waist area for definition. I rented it as part of my Unlimited subscription and ended up keeping it for awhile because I liked it so much.
I love the oversized look but to make it a bit more dressy I love the inside cinch waist.
Wish I could buy this coat!!! So warm, comfortable, gorgeous, and versatile. There's nothing I don't love about it!
Runs large.

links_reviews_title: Wore as a coat on mild winter days
links_reviews_text: So so warm! really not the most cute in a structured style sense, but cute in a cozy sense. enjoyed for a couple days, but too heavy to be a sweater and too thin to be an actual coat so didn't keep it as long as anticipated.
Not great if you're very petite and have a small torso. Probably would be fine on someone taller but I'm 5'5" and it was awkward on me
Versatile; great fit.
runs large but looks and feels amazing. didn't want to return this.
Runs reallly big. But overall, great quality and warm.

links_reviews_title: Amazing coat!! Got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Super warm without being overly heavy. Really loved it!
This is a nice cozy layer, and no wool so not itchy. The shoulders are very boxy though, almost like it has shoulder pads. A solid rental for cool weather.

links_reviews_title: "Love the Coat, where did you get it?"
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose and comfy, great for layering and chunky sweaters under it. The draw sting detail at the waist is an attractive feature. The fabric and multi gray color allows for versatility with many outfits. I simply love this coat and will rent again before the season ends.

I wanted to say that it runs true to size, but it does run a little on the larger size due to the style and intended fit of the jacket. its meant to be 'over sized' and it is fitted in all the right places, with the option of a cinching waistband to give it a little more shape if desired. Will end up purchasing 10/10
Sooo much warmer and more substantial that what it looks like online. I thought it might be like a casual heavy sweater but it was like a lux robe! Delicious but not right for the season.

links_reviews_title: Great trendy item for this season.
links_reviews_text: Great look. Received more than one compliment. Perfect for Georgia winters. I’m in need for something warmer for a trip to Chicago and had to return.
Too big. Returned before wearing.

links_reviews_title: xs was huge! I'm 5'5 0-2 & I couldn't wear it because it was so big. It's pretty and great quality
links_reviews_text: Too big for an XS but great quality

links_reviews_title: Great color and material but large and boxy
links_reviews_text: The color and material are nice but the Small is way too large and the style is boxy for my average sized frame. Returning without wearing. Might try XS.
Absolutely gorgeous coat. Soft, warm and perfect for the Fall.
I order the wrong size. For me the coloring was off.
It runs a bit large, but it gives you the option of using the drawstring or not so you can have two looks of you let the strings hang.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite outfits so far!
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and thought it to be very flattering. I would rent again with a sweater over it!

links_reviews_title: Love it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress was adorable! So versatile for many occasions - work, dinner with friends, holiday events. There are so many ways to style this dress, I had to buy it. Comfortable, not too short, TTS, puff sleeves weren't too big but still made a statement. Definitely recommend!

When I walked into the office, my colleague said she thought of an eighties business woman and heard the song 9 to 5 by Dolly Parton. Love it. I could have sized down to a small and it would've been sexier but I work in a conservative environment so I liked that it still accentuated my shape but wasn't form fitting. The sleeves give it a fun edge (I was still able to throw a blazer over it without the sleeves throwing off the fit of the blazer). I styled it with simple gold earrings and tan pumps. The material is softer than I thought it'd be. It's a very comfortable dress. I liked the length as I'm fairly short so it was longer than it might be on a tall lady.
Great fit. Cute, comfortable, with a little edge. Loved the sleeves. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: I first ordered in a medium because I tend to wear 4 but many dresses from RTR have been too tight for work situations. It was too lose overall. Tried a four and fit perfectly. The sleeves are interesting. The fabric is a great weight and the plaid with the mustard is so Ralph Laurent. I plan to keep this in my rotation for a long time.
I received so many compliments! Looks great with a lack belt and purse! So comfortable and not too short for work! I got a medium it looks bigger in the bag but when I put it on fit perfectly
Fit was great. Perfect for work and super comfortable. The sleeves were just so adorable!
Read reviews that the dress is short, so ordered up a size. Length worked well, but body was large overall. Sleeves were tight. I didn't hate it, but I won't rent it again.
I adore this dress, the large is a tiny bit large but for my height was perfect for work. With the big shoulders it gave a perfect hourglass look, received lots of compliments at work.

The dress fit my sliiiighty large, but only still worked. Going down a size may have made it too tight to wear to work so glad I went with Small. I wore this to the office and then to catch a musical after... great transition from day to night. Lovely!

I liked the classic pattern and tailored cut of this dress, great style for the office. At first I was skeptical of the very puffy cap sleeves. I'm petite with a smaller frame and the sleeves were a bit overwhelming for my taste! I almost didn't wear this, but I found that my longer hair draped over my shoulders helped de-emphasize the sleeves. I did get a number of compliments at work and I felt great in it! Keep in mind the fabric is not as heavy as one might expect. It's thin so you may find that wearing a shaper underneath to hide lumps and bumps. I wore with over the knee sock boots and black tights.

This dress was a big hit at work. I paired it with mustard yellow tights which really helped the yellow lines in the dress pop. I received tons of compliments and felt comfortable all day. I'll definitely be renting this one again. I'm a size 4 and I thought the fit was very true to size.
Loved everything about this dress! Wore it so many times!
Fit was true to size but it was a little bit tight in the arms, not uncomfortable but just something to note. Overall, super cute dress and I got tons of compliments.
I loved the material and colors of the dress. Really comfy and professional looking.

links_reviews_title: Loved this! So easy to accessorize and fits great.
links_reviews_text: Slightly snug in the sleeves and probably too short for work without tights.

I almost loved this dress. It's a fabulous print and styled well with boots and amber jewelry. But a wee bit too short, slightly off on torso shaping, shoulder puffs a bit too much, a little too young in styling overall.
I was excited to try this plaid dress out but the fit was not the greatest. It was very snug on the bottom and a bit short for me. I would recommend sizing up.
It too tight or too short. Perfect for work with tights

The fit overall was a little large. The only place it was a little tight was around the chest. Generally I prefer a more fitted silhouette, but I really liked the fabric & sleeves. Great option for work.

Dress fit well. I am usually between a 6-8 and I went with Medium. I got lots of compliments. I agree with other reviews that sleeves feel a little tight. It's not something others can actually see but you can feel it. But it wasn't a deal breaker. Perfect for Fall weather with tights and boots. Wore to work.
Fits true to size. Made me feel professional and pretty #workingmom
Didn't wear because it was too short for me at work and fit too tight on the arms and bust. Couldn't get size L zipped. Otherwise a great dress for someone more slender/less busty

I'm currently obsessed with plaid for fall and this is the perfect dress all because of those amazing puffy sleeves! The silhouette is just beautiful. The top was a little large but not so much so that it looked bad. I added a belt for a little more waist definition and for a little dimension. Would definitely rent this again!

Loved this simple but fashionable dress. A thicker material, it is better for transition into fall or winter under a coat. It isn't figure hugging so it is flattering for most body shapes. It has cute sleeves that make the simple dress upscale. The dress runs true to size, with a little tightness in the sleeve area and is conservative enough for work. The splash of color makes it a little edgy and you can play with it with your accessories. It can be dressed up or down. I wanted to own this one. There was 0 things wrong with it.
It was a little too short for work, but I wore black tights and kitten heels so it wasn't so obvi.
Fabric and fit are very forgiving.
This is really really really short and I wasn't able to wear it.
It was too small and I ordered the large. Disappointed

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, ran a bit big
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress and conservative enough for work, although it felt a bit baggier than I expected... I normally wear a small but would get the XS if I rented again.
Wore this dress for a work event. Looked super cute and got tons of compliments. Highly recommend it!
This was so cute for work. It was a little small so I decided to wear flats, but I LOVED the sleeves and the cut it was very flattering. Thinking about buying it!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments. I'd purchase this dress.
links_reviews_text: Great fit
Way to small

links_reviews_title: Its a beautiful work dress with great arm detail but unfortunately didnt get to wear it, too big.
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to the pictures in style. It's would've been perfect for work. Unfortunately, the dress was too big and loose on the top and wasn't form fitting enough to wear. I tried it on when it arrived and found that my top half was swimming in the dress and in the arms and it didn't pinch enough at the waist. I typically wear a small and should've ordered a small. Even with a curvier bottom half the medium was too big.
I loved the fit of this dress. It wasn't too short so it was Appropriate for work. I would say it runs pretty true to size.

Cute little dress that they had to send as a replacement for my original rental--just wasn't as nice as it looks in the pics. The arm holes are also very small so if you have any sort of muscular upper arms, it's gonna be tight.
Looks great with black tights which also makes it work appropriate. Much shorter than anticipated.
Love this. Great fit and length for work. Comfortable and paired well with tights and booties.
This dress was the perfect mix of fun and conservative.

These are incredibly soft and comfortable. I just might buy them. I'm usually hesitant to rent pants because you never know about the fit if you're unfamiliar with the brand. I'm typically a 25/26 and these fit great.

links_reviews_title: Loved them so much I bought them.
links_reviews_text: Doesn't get better than that. They're cute, comfortable, flattering. I had to keep them.

Cute jeans, good weight + quality. The waist was a lower waist than I'm used to these days. It caused a gap and I spent the day pulling them up. They did give a bit, but weren't super breathable or stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Big and don't hold their shape
links_reviews_text: These run large. They were very loose when I first put them on. I'm ok w a slouchy fit so I wore them to work. Within a few hours they stretched and slouched so much they were falling off. I went home and changed over lunch break.
I had some camo pants that I unfortunately outgrew. I rented these to have as a basic. Cute pants fits TTS. Very green undertone threw me at first but I loved them with neutrals.
I'm so used to high rise these low-mid rise took a minute to get used to but they are actually very comfy.

I've been wanting to try out the camo trend, these are the perfect pants to do so! Based on reviews, I sized up so they would have more of a relaxed fit. I'll probably hang on to these for a while, as they are perfect for making a casual look more interesting.

links_reviews_title: Wore these pants to a fun girls night picnic!
links_reviews_text: Super cute and trendy pants...very comfortable. Looked great worn with sneakers or wedges. They do fit a little slouchy, so be prepared for that.

These pants are so fun (and make me feel super trendy). They are soft, but they don't have much stretch. I ordered a size up because I have large quads and I was happy I did because I don't think I would have been comfortable in the 28 in that area, so it's a little looser in the waist. Honestly I don't want to give these back, I want to just wear them every day. Highly recommend.

These pants fit nice but after one day of wear they stretched a lot! I would recommend sizing down if your going to wear for more than one day. They cut off nicely around the ankle and it's a flattering high waist for all the Apple shaped women out there.
Absolutely loved these pants! I could have sized down to a 27 thought since they're a baggy style.
These were super fun and cute! I would have sized down a size - these stretched significantly throughout the day. Really comfortable and on the thicker side.
The denim has little stretch. Was fitted through leg but loose in waist. Liked the overall fit and would rent again.
