links_reviews_title: Soft denim and cool camo pattern
links_reviews_text: I loved these camo jeans; I just wish I'd ordered a size or two up - as you see they were tight on me and didn't have that great slouchy effect they had on the model. The wait fit me, though, so if I'd sized up I'd have needed a belt (I am curvy). I styled them with blank ankle boots, a neutral solid top, and a denim jacket. As you can see I also added the Joanna Laura Constantine Grommet Rainbow Earrings for a bit of dazzle. These are great for dress down Fridays and being out and about in the city on a weekend. I felt really confident and stylish and window-shopped all over Soho in them.

These were amazing - I rented a 28 but could've worn a 27. For context, I usually wear a 28/29 in Levi's so I would say these jeans run true to size with a little extra room. I personally wanted these baggy but can be worn more fitted if you select a size down. Perfect for Spring with sneakers!

links_reviews_title: LOVED the fabric on these - so soft. But stretched out a lot during the day
links_reviews_text: For me the 29R was loose - I'm approx 140 (don't weigh myself much) and 5'5" with thighs on the larger side. They do stretch out a lot, so I'm going to try a smaller size.
Very comfy & stylish. I rented a 29R, but probably could have worn a 27R.

So many compliments. I run pretty TTS in a 25 (5'1," 117 lbs). These were almost tight in the waistband, just below the natural waist, and then ballooned out below that, poofy around my (not actually that big) tummy. Not flattering or carefully cut. Cute, easy, and good fit through the bum, legs, and thighs, but no idea what was going on up top there. Looked great as long as I wore them with a shirt or sweater covering the weirdo waistline!
Baggy fit, super comfy and on trend.

links_reviews_title: Nice... But not for the thick and bootilicious
links_reviews_text: These pants are nice. The material feels soft, and the color and style are great. They fit in the calves, but... The fabric has no stretch or give, so the fit in the thigh was tight. The rise seems low and I couldn't get the pants over my bubble butt. I do recommend these for people with a more straight shape!
I wear a 9-10, I would go a size smaller

These fit a little tight in the thigh, but after wearing them a few times they really stretched out. I wore them several times with a black shirt. My kids were impressed that mom was wearing camo! Since I can't afford to buy them, I'll probably rent them again.

I LOVE these pants. They are some of the most flattering pants I've ever owned, not to mention how comfortable they are! As other reviewers said, they do stretch out a bit after wearing them but they are still super flattering. If you're going to wear them more than one day, I would suggest sizing down if you can.
Really cute and comfortable pants! These are great casual pants that you can just throw on and wear anywhere. Fun bright greens in the print. LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Fun pants to wear to school
links_reviews_text: My daughter wore this because it was a size too small for me. Nice quality, comfortable fit she paired with a black top and addidas sneakers.
Too small but cute

links_reviews_title: slim fit, even though description does not say that
links_reviews_text: I found these tight in the leg but roomy in the hip/waist. admittedly, though, I am bottom-heavy...

I knew I wanted to wear this when I was looking at some of the new stuff and saw the print- love! The fit is described and depicted as relaxed, but I ordered up (2 sizes!), as I have a hard time finding jeans that fit my quads and butt and I wanted these to look relaxed. The fabric is buttery soft and I wanted to live in them... only I could not get them on all the way. Total bummer. They may have worked if the denim had any stretch at all, but since it doesn't, I would probably not recommend these if you're a quadzilla.
Runs super big, not the most flattering fit but they were a cool statement piece for a few days!

I so wanted to love these pants. Unfortunately they were just really unflattering. The pants Had puckers in the front that were not quite Pleats, but had the same proofing impact on the fronts. The butt was really saggy by the time I took them off and I only wore them for about 4 hours.
I should have ordered a size up - too tight in the legs and a little snug in the waist
So comfortable and flattering. I wore twice and then purchased.
These are super cute pants. There's no stretch to them but they are slouchy fit so they are still comfy. Liked them for everyday wear.
Perfect size and goes with everything!

This is a cute bag, but it's smaller than I thought it would be so I didn't really use it. I wanted to use it for everyday/work but it wasn't big enough for my stuff. I usually always carry around a notebook, a book, my headphones, wallet and keys, and a water bottle. This bag wasn't large enough for my basics, even without the water bottle. Definitely nice but not a tote to schlep a lot of stuff in.
One look and you can see this is a quality handbag. Very nice soft, thick leather. Toying with buying it.
I love this bag! It’s roomy. Beautiful color! I would love to buy this!

links_reviews_title: Very well made, a little long
links_reviews_text: The sweater is obviously very well made However, it ran long on me and didn't look as professional as I would have wanted.
Very flattering and comfortable! I wore it with jeans and black boots. Super cute

This is a sweater that stands out from regular mini colored top you have. I wore this to work with white slacks and black/white pumps, and then again on a weekend day with black pants. It's comfortable. The sleeves are quite long, I had them turned up. Will rent this again.
This is a flattering and comfortable sweater. The arms are long, but are designed that way.
Great sweater for tall frame. Sleeves were long. I loved this sweater.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater- comfortable and very edgy
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater. The feel is a little rigid, but the fit and style are phenomenal. I wore this to a development seminar and got lots of compliments. It was warm, but not stifling and had lots of give for different activities. It photographs really well. I am an athletic build and it really showed off my figure well.

I love this pattern but it does run true to size and is also very stretchy. If you are large chested be prepared for that area to be very accentuated. I would rent again if I didn't look like I stuffed two propane tanks under the sweater.
Slightly heavier, stretchy fabric. Comfortable to wear. Large turtleneck collar.

A beautiful sweater! Very mod, a little loose. I normally wear a 4 or a small and could have gone a size down in this sweater to have it tight. Otherwise, if you desire a comfortable stylish sweater that fits to size, it's perfect. Would love to own

This sweater by Solace London was surprisingly extremely comfortable as I am not one for turtlenecks or items around that area of my body, I didn't even want to take it off! Running true to size with a lot of stretch in the fabric, going down for your back-up is what I would recommend. I am normally between Sizes 8 & 10 and the Size 8 fit fine! The fabric was not at all itchy and was breathable in every way! Overall, this turtleneck is perfect for any occasion and I'd recommend it to women of all shapes and sizes!

Really love how unique this sweater/turtleneck is! Felt very professional and put together without losing any of my personality. Makes it a little funky, which I like. Wore it to a job interview, and I got the job! Easy peasy. Took off one star b/c the material is a bit stiff- could definitely be softer. Towards the end of the day it got a bit itchy.

links_reviews_title: Nice pattern - got compliments on it
links_reviews_text: It was rather large on me but workable

I really loved this top. I like the fit, the style. I am normally a size 4 and this was an 8 and fit perfect. I wore this top a few times I loved it so much. Would have liked to have purchased it. I will rent it again. I received many compliments.
Comfortable, kept me warm, great for work or going out.... I am thinking about buying this top.

links_reviews_title: This is a wow statement sweater.
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Got many compliments. It's very slimming and looked great with some black pants.
Warm, nice fit. Wore to work and received compliments. (actually saw the sleeveless version on a news reporter)
Good style. Upgrades to a basic. Will likely rent again.
Loved the print. The quality of fabric was excellent also. Comfortable and not too thick.
I would recommend mostly during cooler months.
Warm. Fit well. Hugs the curves.

links_reviews_title: i love this stylish, tight, sexy sweater. I wore it in Aspen out and about. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: fun, stretchy fabric. great colors.
I wore it with black slacks to a meeting and received a lot of compliments. The sweater is heavier so great for cold weather places.
Great fabric, design and fit. Very flattering. Many compliments. Warm without bulk. Worked well for work and casual.
pretty much true to size I would not order a size under

links_reviews_title: Nice design, not comfortable to wear
links_reviews_text: The sweater had a very nice design, fitted well and looked nice. The downside was the material felt still and it felt rough to the skin and scratchy.

links_reviews_title: Awesome print. Hard to get size right
links_reviews_text: I sized up because otherwise my chest would have looked ridiculous. But then it bunched in the back and made it look like I had back rolls. Wanted to love and made it work. Some compliments on the pattern . Paired with Milly red flare pants
Love the material and the fit and it is gorgeous. I was worried about it making look larger but I got so many compliments. Wish it was cheaper so I could own it.

Received some compliments. The material is thick. I originally intended to wear tucked in with a skirt and opted for out with black jeans instead. It's trim, it fit snugly, but not too tight - I'm 34 bust, 28 waist. If you're borderline medium over small, I'd suggest a medium.
I rented this for a weekend away in nyc. It was comfortable and looked great.
Not to softest fabric, had to wear an undershirt, but fit really well.

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with this one!
links_reviews_text: Super cute!

This top was out of my comfort zone for sure, but I loved the pattern/look...so I gave it a shot via my Unlimited. This was the WORST rental ever; the material is so thick and kind of stiff it feels unpleasant and unless you are REALLY thin/flat bellied and short torso'd then this is not for you either.
While this style was not flattering on me, I think others would like it. The material is nice and comfortable. You may want to size up if you are not looking for a very form-fitting look.

links_reviews_title: Large....but I may have ordered the wrong size
links_reviews_text: When I ordered, I thought it was saying it was a US10 / UK14. But this was giant on me - really long arms (at least 3" too long), and lots of extra space throughout the body and arms. That said, the material and design are beautiful. I may try it again in a smaller size.
This dress was flattering in color and fit. I'm 5'2" and a solid size 2. The small fit comfortably. You'll need a cami underneath if you have a larger chest.
Such a beautiful color IRL. Keeps you warm but not hot if that makes sense. Wraps perfectly around, but needed some fashion tape to keep from flashing everyone

Wore this to work with white sneakers, then hopped on a plane and kept it on and changed shoes to some booties and wore it out to dinner/ bars. It was perfect for all occasions. It does come untied and the skit is very low, but it was manageable. Also it surprisingly wrinkles easily. Otherwise, I loved it. Another DVF hit.
Dress fit perfectly for me. Color was complimentary of my skin tone. Deep V, so if you're not comfortable with that, I'd recommend wearing a cami underneath. Would rent again!
Wore this for a work party and loved it!

This was a perfect birthday dress for a night out in London. It was really low cut, as I usually find wrap dresses to be. I ended up using double sided fashion tape to hold the fabric together. I have a large chest, so it didn't fit me that well on top, but it still worked and would probably fit most people better than it fit me! Overall, the color and style are beautiful and very high quality! I would definitely rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: Great color and quality runs big size down!
links_reviews_text: I would typically be a large (size 10) so glad I ordered down to a Medium. The front dips down pretty low, worked ok on me as I have a smaller bust but bigger busted girls will want a cami under it. Classy with the color and material and long sleeves. I would rent it again!!!

I liked the color and the simple design. Think it's pretty flattering and I got a few compliments throughout the work day. However, the material is pretty stiff and thick, which made the top look boxy. It also suffered from some of the typical "wrap dress" problems. I had to wear a camisole, hold my dress down when I stepped outside, and be careful when I sat down. May be sticking to faux wrap dresses in the future...

The color of the dress was amazing. It was my first wrap dress so the fit was a little different to get used to but overall very flattering. Wore it to a rehearsal dinner and received lots of compliments. Thick material so would not be ideal for an outdoor summer event.

I absolutely loved this dress. I wore a cami underneath and pinned the neckline to make it more modest for work. The color was amazing and the material had a nice weight to it so I didn't feel concerned that a slight breeze would reveal everything. I skipped the Spanx and went with a slip - I'm so glad I did because you don't need the squeeze as much with this dress. As such, it was so comfortable! I highly highly recommend renting this piece. I can't count how many people complimented it!

thank you RTR reviews. Totally right on. Overall fit was a lil snug but since the fabric is a little thicker knit its not so snug you see every bump. Def need to wear a cami under this. I tried without and felt like I'd be tugging at it all day, plus it would be too low cut for work...well at least where I work #nojudgement Sleeves are very long but I cuffed and tucked them under and you can't even tell. The sleeves have almost a spanx-like effect too so hey, bonus! I did wear control top shapeware with this because I hate my tummy and it helped me feel much more confident in this body hugging dress.
SO COMFORTABLE! Fabric is nice and flattering. 10/10!

links_reviews_title: Surprisingly true to size and super soft
links_reviews_text: Amazing color and material. Super thick and luxe. Longer sleeves and larger fit than usual DVF wraps. Lots of compliments. Wrap cuts low so wore a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous pink dress - definitely needed a camisole!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this dress - it's gorgeous! But the XS was tiny and didn't have a lot of material to "go around." Meaning I need a camisole and a slip. Next time I'd size up for more material to wrap!

This dress was absolutely perfect for a baby shower! The fit, comfort & style were everything I wanted! As other have said the chest is very loose, which I used fashion tape for to make it more conservative and stay closed. Other than that I have no complaints and can't wait To rent this not 30 weeks pregnant! The material is to die for!

So I really liked this dress even though there were a few things about it that you should know before it gets there. I have larger breasts, 32DDDD, and it fit fine over them but it definitely showed way too much bra. So have fashion tape handy or a couple of safety pins. Barely noticeable but you do end up showing a good amount of cleavage so if it's not that kind of party and you have a large cup size, rethink it ! Otherwise I'm sure it fits smaller breasts beautifully. Also the dress does fall nicely on the curves but because of that it accentuates some of the not so nice curves. Highly recommend with a good pair of spanx to tighten things up and it looks woooonderful. I am short so the sleeves were longer but honestly it's just part of being short. Other than that I loved the heavier feel of the material, it doesn't wrinkle, moves along with your body, the color and dress length !

Really great dress! True to DVF size and I didn't have to pin the top as I do in some DVF Wrap dresses. I'm usually a 6/8 in her wrap dresses for reference. Beefier fabric than the typical silk jersey. Really great & unique color. It was a little wrinkle upon arrival and takes some work to iron b/c of the fabric. That said, it's really lovely & I definitely recommend!

This dress fits true to size. I’m 5’2 110 pounds, 32DD. The size XS fit perfect. A little snug around the chest area but still doable. The material is a nice heavy weight. Almost like a thin stretchy neoprene. I got a lot of compliments.
Everyone at work was obsessed with it. It was super comfortable and easy to wear. Ran a bit large for me. Would wear again, though.
The dress felt super heavy when I took it out the RTR suitcase. When on, it's super comfortable and felt as if I was wearing nothing. I'll definitely order again!
Very very beautiful color, nice rich stretch fabric, the sleeves was to long for me ,i needed to fold them & because it was strong stretch fabric it did not lay nicely on the chest

Keep it classy! Cutest little wrap dress ever; it’s so simple yet adorable. The dress runs true to size, but the fabric is super giving and stretchy, so the dress is made to hug your curves. It’s comfortable in the bust area, and any cup size would look great in this. Wrap dresses can be pulled off by literally anyone, so it is appropriate for any body type. I’m a normal size 6, so the medium fit like a glove; the fabric is really comfortable and soft. The mauve color adds a unique flare to the dress; it’s not your average day color so it can be worn to a casual work event, or a simple cocktail party or a brunch. Nude or black heels would do the trick, or even white tennis shoes. Either way, this dress is really classy for any occasion.
Looks great until I put it on. It's short and way too much cleavage. I'm either a 6 or an 8 but I would have needed a xl

Wore this dress to dinner in Vegas - definitely a more sophisticated take on a date night dress, but the low neckline was great. I'm between a small and medium and in the future will size up to a medium to be more comfortable.
I wore the medium. I'm 140lbs and 5'6. Smaller chest but you can adjust the tie and make it tighter up top. Very comfy and kept me warm as well. Paired with tights and slouchy black boots.
Loved how thick and cozy this dress was while being understated sexy. The wrap doesn't have a clasp or anything to keep it closed up top, so I threw a tank underneath so I could wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress. Such a classic wrap from DVF
links_reviews_text: I wore the size small and it fit Great. I'm usually between a size 2 and 4. It's more of a pink nude color. Not too heavy for spring or summer. Wrinkles semi easily so if you are sitting a lot, keep this in mind. Would def rent again

links_reviews_title: A great item but not for me.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress but maybe my shape wasn’t appropriate. I am 5’2 and 145. Athletically built. Really couldn’t get my arms to fit. Once tied, couldn’t think of bending down in any form because the back was too short. I ended up not wearing it.
I am big fan of this type of wrap dress.
The dress was too short and revealing to be worn for work.
Bit low, tight, shows every roll

links_reviews_title: Can't go wrong with this classic
links_reviews_text: I love a DVF wrap dress. This one is made of thick fabric that drapes well and keeps you warm. It's shorter than I expected so I wore it as more of a cover up over leggings, than as a dress. Color is a light rose - nice for spring.
Did not wear. Too short and revealing.
Great for slim but shapely figure
Fit great and looks sophisticated. A million compliments. A bit low cut, so I needed a safety pin, but other than that, it was the best.

links_reviews_title: Not great for ladies with boobs.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress with a great fit but as a D cup it made it inappropriate to wear. Maybe suited better for a smaller chest.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - material too thick and tight
links_reviews_text: I rented the small and medium and was disappointed. Material was very thick and I felt like I was wearing a wet-suit. Love the style and the classy color. Too bad. I wanted to love this dress but not for me.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, but not as flattering as expected
links_reviews_text: I really liked the color and fabric of this dress, but it was really low cut (even for date night) and wasn't quite as flattering as I had hoped it would be. Maybe I needed to play with the wrap a little bit more. Probably wouldn't rent again, though it was a nice dress.
Definitely have to wear something under it if you have any bustline at all. Pretty color and comfortable fabric

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not the right fit
links_reviews_text: This dress hugged in all the right places, perfect knit weight for cooler weather, AMAZING color - but the neck line was just way too deep to pull off for work. My bra was showing no matter what. I don't think tape would have helped. I tried to wear it to a Christmas party but it isn't meant to be worn without a bra, either. I'm a 34D for reference.
Fits well. Textured fabric that travels well and doesn't reveal too much.
The color is a deeper red than I thought- more maroon. It is a great weight for winter and fall. Love the flair of the skirt.
I found this very flattering and comfortable. Unlike other reviews, I did NOT find the neck scratchy :) it's not a style I would have normally purchased but really liked it which is why I love RTR!!

First of all, excuse the messy dressing room and my dog & his photobombing! This was a great knit dress that besides being slightly itchy at the neckline, looked great and was perfect for the office. Top fit great, waist and hips felt a little large. Thinking this may be the way this brand runs, so be aware. Might want to size down. Lots of compliments and not too short. Good Fall/Winter look with tights.
During a cold day in January, this dress worked great for work. I wore high black boots with it.
Wore this dress for Christmas Eve and loved it! Fit me perfectly and I loved the material and color. Very flattering fit- slim through the waist with a flair at the bottom. Beautiful dress!

I expected this dress might be too form fitting to wear, but it was perfect! The color is gorgeous for winter, and the material is luxe. Such a flattering cut odor the curves. Love the length on my 5'7" frame, and love the details in the weave of the fabric. Even thought about keeping this one.....

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a work function (conference)
links_reviews_text: Loved the ease of this dress and the "waffle" texture! It's true to size with a little stretch. I got compliments on the dress but it was also great to travel in and pack after the event.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it, my daughter is wearing it in pic.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it, as it was too form fitting. In the picture is my daughter who looked great in it. She is 5'10-5'11 and 175 pounds, very athletic build. The 12 looked to fit her with some room to spare.
I really liked the color and fabric and length of this dress but it is too much material on top, especially in the back, too clinging in the waist, and a bit dowdy overall.

I rented this for a business trip to Europe in the fall. Ended up wearing it to a conference, work meetings and to an evening reception. I wore it with black tights and booties or pumps each time and got many compliments! At first it felt a little loose in the midsection but actually I preferred it being less form fitting, especially after 2 weeks of eating all the carbs in Greece and Germany. The top hook and eye is hard to fasten - other than that it was perfect! I am 5'6", 142 lbs, athletic build with a 32D chest and rented the 8

I have a 40 inch bust and typically take a size 10 but that wasn't availble so I opted for a 12 which fit a bit loose but still cute. I paired this dress with ankle boots which goes well as we're transitioning to fall. My husband said the dress looked ugly on the hanger but really nice on, he tried to convince me to purchase it for date nights! Lol

I rented this dress for work. It's pretty and unlike the dresses in my closet, it's not black! Other than that it's not particularly memorable. Fit true to size. Material is slightly stretchy, but it's not body con like many similar fit and flare dresses
I would rent this again. Flattering fit and appropriate for work.

I wore this a friend's birthday party and got lots of compliments. Dress is high quality and the material has some stretch and isn't itchy. Got really well. I can imagine it would look good on most body types.
Good fit.
Figure flattering yet comfortable and appropriate
Good but not great dress. Perfect for work or dinner or really anything. I liked it but not loved it
The dress was great quality, color and stretch. It just hit me in the wrong places and was too short for work event (I ordered M and I'm 5'7")

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and perfect for my a baptism
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my niece's baptism in a church. It was the right bit of demure for the occasion and perfect for fall. It fit me like the model, fitted, but not tight. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: nice dress for the fall material is not too thick but not too thin either
links_reviews_text: pretty color
It's stretchy and form fitting. The material is nice too.
Nice dress! Great fabric and construction and nice for chilly weather.

This is a relatively light unlined fabric. If you have any bulges, Spanx are a must. It's an attractive fit though. Even for a short person, the ruffled hem hit appropriately and gave a flirtiness to the dress. It's a good color.
Loved how it felt and looked. Received a number of compliments. Great detail in fabric and flattering fit

I loved the fit and fabric was just thick and stretchy enough to be forgiving. It was really cute on and I felt confident all day. I find Shoshanna can run small so even though i would normally go for a 2, here the 4 fit perfectly so if you're kinda in between sizes, size up.

links_reviews_title: This dress didn't fit me well
links_reviews_text: The ruffle around the neck doesn't look good on older women.
Fit perfectly

Perfect fit - unexpected gem. Everybody complimented me at work and two people were even surprised I didn't purchase it. I felt like it was a touch bunch around my waist, but even my husband loved it! Didn't look like much in the photo. Better in person.
It was fitted but still appropriate for a work dinner, lots of compliments.

This dress is stunning! The color is a rich, dark red and the fit is impeccable. It has interesting details on the neck and sleeves, as well as throughout the fabric. It fit like a glove and the cut is extremely flattering.
Liked the fit. Perfect for work.

links_reviews_title: Sweet dress, clings to the tummy
links_reviews_text: Great color and thick fabric

links_reviews_title: Wore this in a size up as a maternity dress. worked well.
links_reviews_text: Wore this in a size up as a maternity dress. worked well.
Nice burgundy red color. Slight stretch to material, frill to edge of 3/4 length sleeves. Not too short.
I wore it on Christmas Eve and for our wedding anniversary dinner occasion. It was awesome and comfortable. Wore it with black tights and booties.
Color and fabric were great, but the shape widened for hips and that spot hit me too high so I couldn't wear it.
The knit itself is very tight making this dress thick and high quality. I love the details. Sleeves are three quarter length sleeve and fit is slightly forgiving. Length was above knee.
too big, didn't wear
Loved this. Rented for my birthday bar crawl and it was definitely a conversation piece. Super fun jacket!!
It's really cool but I got way more compliments on a simpler fur jacket. It's also very hot and does run large as I'm never a medium in anything.

This jacket is a crowd pleaser! People couldn't stop complimenting me all through town. The jacket runs large and long. With room to put a sweater underneath. It doesn't have any secure closures, which is a downside if you're in inclement weather. The tie is also not attached and could be lost easily. Overall it is a fabulous rent!
This jacket is gorgeous and super comfortable! I received so many compliments. Probably will buy it! I usually would get an XL but the L was the only available size, but I'm glad I sized down.

links_reviews_title: So much fun, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: People literally came up to me on the streets of NYC and asked if I was famous in this coat. It exudes style and confidence and was surprisingly lightweight. Perfect for a breezy spring day in the city.

links_reviews_title: I wore this jacket around town for errands. Everywhere I went, this jacket really made people smile.
links_reviews_text: Everywhere I went, this jacket really made people smile, which made me smile. The grocery store clerk and I got in a conversation about the jacket which ended with him telling me what a charming and intelligent woman I was. That was nice! I wore this a lot around the house as sort of a robe, and the jacket is super comfortable.
This coat is very eye-catching and comfortable in an oversize/bathrobe kind of way. I enjoyed wearing it!
It sheds too much but is a definite show-stopper. I always got compliments.
Everyone LOVED THIS COAT! Perfect for a sunny day in the 50s. Length was a little long, but the piece was overall dynamite.
Loved the fit and you definitely have to be confident with it on !! The staring is only good!!

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to give up this beauty!
links_reviews_text: Runs large. Coat is fairly lightweight, but is an absolute showstopper!!! Received so many compliments from strangers about this statement piece! If you're questioning, I say take the plunge and go for it! Only slight con is that the faux fur does shed.
Fun coat that grabs a lot of attention! Very warm too, overall true to size. Better with a heel than with a flat shoe, glams it up a bit.

Let's put it this way: the people on the street that normally catcall me instead shouted out "wow, beautiful coat!" Felt so great wearing this and got such positive responses. Ties like a robe belted at the waist, looks best open. Heavy but not necessarily warm

I live In NYC, a place where people go out of their way to avoid eye contact, let alone talk to strangers. However, I've had numerous people stop me in the street and everywhere else to compliment this coat. It runs a tad large but is great quality and so much fun.

links_reviews_title: A Dolly Parton song come TRUE
links_reviews_text: "...in my coat of many colors Rent the Runway made for me..." Hells YES. Finally a coat that understands who I am as a person. Warning: only wear this if you enjoy talking to people.

Pardon my nerdy pic- i text it to my friends before I went out :) THIS COAT is amazing. It hangs beautifully and is a stretch tweed so it's warm! It's been -2 in Chicago and i layered with a cashmere scarf and was perfectly comfortable as we walked from bar to bar this weekend. It's got big pockets and can be worn casually-- which i love. I'm 5'2" and LOVED the length. I received comments all night.

links_reviews_title: Million compliments on this. Will rent again or maybe buy it!
links_reviews_text: Love the colors and the textures!

Not only is it an outstanding piece, it's so comfortable!It felt like wearing a comfy robe. People stopped and commented on the coat every 5 minutes. With or without their reassurance though, I felt like a million bucks! I wore it to work, church, and even through on a sweat suit and sneakers with it. Will definitely rent again, and also, will stalk and wait for it to go on CLEARANCE!

links_reviews_title: E V E R Y T H I N G ! ! ! ! !
links_reviews_text: Statement of all statement pieces! Wore this to a work Holiday bowling party. It was definitely a conversation piece. I'd say it runs pretty true to size. I however would've liked it to be a little more snugged and will size down if ordered again. It was surprisingly warmer than I thought it would be as well. It's pretty long as well FYI.

The fit is perfect, you can tighten the fit according to your figure , the fabric is light but works for a cold day . You off course need to layer pieces under, I wore it in 40 degree Nyc winter and it worked ! I got lots of stares from men and complements. I felt like a celebrity .
This coat is not good for someone 5'4" because I'm 5'6" and it came down to almost my ankles. If you're looking for a statement piece, look no further!

I rented this coat to use during Mardi Gras. The days I wore it I was constantly being complimented by all kinds of people (including a UPS driver who told me it was the most unique coat he'd ever seen!). This coat can lean toward costumey or high fashion depending on your clothing and accessories. Only complaint was that some of the white "fur" pieces looked a little dingy. Probably not noticeable unless you're the person wearing it. Overall, very happy with the rental and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: This coat is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: This coat is amazing! Roomy, not bulky. I thought it might look like a bath robe, but it looks great. Received so many compliments. It is a bit heavy, so would work in colder weather. AWESOME!
Fun to wear, my colleagues said I looked like a Dr Seuss character. A bit too wide for my frame, wearing a small, but I think it would've been too small if I went down another size
This coat is so much fun and I've never been stopped so often by strangers. Everyone had a compliment for this piece!
This is very cute and a statement for sure. But i felt like i was wearing a big bathrobe. Better for a tall skinny girl who can have the extra volume added.
perfect
Loved this coat as a fun way to add some color to my outfit . Wore to an outside party where needed a warm layer.

links_reviews_title: I am going to buy this in a week or so...giving you a heads up!! Absolutely adore this!!!!
links_reviews_text: Simply gorgeous and fun!!! LOVE

links_reviews_title: The Greatest Coat There Ever Was!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is everything I could have hoped for and more! It was so soft and actually much lighter than expected, especially in comparison to other Hutch jackets I have tried on. It was also very warm, I wore it closed during some light snow and then open as an accessory for 40 degree weather. I got stopped SO MANY TIMES in the airport and on the street, people love this jacket. Wear it and glow!
It fit true to size. I'm a 6 typically and the Medium fit me well.
The fit was perfect and the coat is comfortable and cozy.
I got the most compliments wearing this. It looks awesome on

links_reviews_title: Really fun fitting jacket. Gorgeous on. Classy.
links_reviews_text: Fun and awesome coat. It's not a very warm jacket, more of a thick sweater. I rented this twice.

links_reviews_title: It was def a head turner
links_reviews_text: It was a nice coat just not my style- I wore it once and just felt a bit silly.

Love the colors! Looked better on the chair than on. Everyone loved what it looked like when not worn and everyone at work wanted to try it on, but when we all did the consensus was that it looked more like a robe than a coat. Still fun though and no regrets renting it.
It's fun and funky and not too heavy!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun statement piece! Loved it and received TONS of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I seriously was stopped on the street wearing this jacket. It received tons of compliments, photographed well, and was just a fun piece. It is lined but is NOT super warm. It's more of a statement piece. I wore it tail end of the season so it was in the high 40s and it was great. However, on one of the windier days, I was definitely cold in it, the wind blew right through the material.

links_reviews_title: Great coat for a fun night out!
links_reviews_text: The coat fits nice and roomy, could have worn a small. The fur is soft to the touch, which is a nice accent. The coat itself is not very warm, so I would only wear it for 45 degrees and higher. Would definitely rent again.
Wore out once to a friends birthday. I was sheepish about wearing it but got so many compliments even one person asking if they could try it on! I def ordered too large as it's true to size.
I wish it were like 2" shorter! Otherwise it fit well and looked cute - but sometimes it looked overwhelming on my short frame.

links_reviews_title: Least favorite Of Mercer dress I've rented
links_reviews_text: I've been loving the Of Mercer dresses for work but this one really fell flat for me. Every other Size 12 I've worn by this designer fits me perfectly and is comfortable. This one requires not one, but 2 safety pins to keep the chest from gaping and it still hangs awkwardly. Also, the pockets don't sit well on me and add bulk to my hips. The fabric is great (Of Mercer's fabric is ALWAYS great) but this silhouette just doesn't work for my curves.
easy to wear, great material, lovely color, beautiful dress. and the length was perfect!
Love the style and fabric; but it runs pretty big. I usually wear a 6 or 8 in RTR, and here I could of done a size 4.

I tried this on when I first received it last week and I thought it looked nice. When I put it on this morning for work I couldn't bring myself to wear it. It did nothing for my shape (curvy) and was much longer than I remembered.
A little large cute design

This was a great rental for work that was appropriate for a traditional business environment but also had an interesting edgy flair in its construction and design. I loved that it had the appearance of a wrap dress without the inconvenience of a skirt that could blow open since shorter part of the skirt connects all the way across. The fit was relatively true to size but ran ever so slightly large, which I found to match the aesthetic of the design. I'd call it alty appropriate corporate. Loved it!

Wore this for a day at a conference and for a new professional head shot. The fabric is quality. I LOVE the a-symmetrical cut - this made the dress more interesting and fun to wear. I felt beautiful, comfortable, and professional. Would recommend this to anyone that likes this style of dress.
I like the fabric but this felt like it was four sizes too big.
Great dress but a large fit. The size zero fit more like a four. I would recommend sizing down two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Love the cut and wrap on the top. It gets very wide for a straight figure on the bottom.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress, best for a pear shaped person but was attractive on a straight figure as well.

Runs big, the 0 may have been a better fit but I ordered the 4 as a backup size. Wore it for a Halloween party, I went as Daenerys (from Game of Thrones) and with some over-the-knee boots the look killed!

links_reviews_title: Cute but too long and too loose, and the neck gapped a lot
links_reviews_text: Cute but too long and too loose, and the neck gapped a lot

At first the shape caught me off guard and I felt like the top was off center....I was a little surprised on the fit, it was a bit bigger then I expected, but at the same time very comfortable. Loved the pockets. feedback from co-workers was Buy It...classic navy blue with a different cut to keep it interesting...would rent again...not sure if I'd bother sizing down or not.

links_reviews_title: Great quality. Runs very large- did not have any shape.
links_reviews_text: great cut- definitely going to try again with a smaller size

links_reviews_title: It was just a bit too big, which made it less flattering
links_reviews_text: Go a size down and it will be cute

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but too lowcut for the office.
links_reviews_text: The cut of the dress is very different, makes it really stand out. Not super flattering as the pockets (which are beautifully lined and deep) really extenuate the width of the hip area. Pretty navy color.
D-cup, not flattering around breast. Waist too big and does not adjust.it wasn't the right fit for my curves
Great work dress. Might buy!
Ran large. Had to safety pin the bust area to keep it closed throughout the day

links_reviews_title: Baggy all around on my body.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't in love with the style, but bigger problem was that it was just too big all over.

I threw a floral sweater over this for Easter church, and followed it up with a jacket over it for work. I really liked this dress - it fit my goal of hiding my 12-week-pregnant-is-she-just-fat-or-is-she-pregnant belly for work and with my in-laws. My only complaint was that it's a little low-cut if you're busty like I am (34G before recent growth), and I had to resort to some fashion tape and safety pins to McGyver a v-neck that didn't flash my students when I leaned forward. I'd definitely rent again for work.

Loved this! Great length for the office. A little tight in the chest, I am a true 10 and only a 36B and it fit better with the top clasp undone, but that makes it a little low cut, so good with a button down or tank under.

links_reviews_title: A little baggy but a great edgy twist on workwear
links_reviews_text: Not very fitted style so it hung off my frame a little big but still wore it as it was fun and a different take on workwear. Received compliments despite it not being the best fit.

links_reviews_title: I am 5'9 the length and cut was great the fit was just too large
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 the length and cut was great the fit was just too large

I ordered one size smaller than my usual and it fit great! Super cute. Wore a Dark blue turtle neck under and it was an awesome work dress. No tugging or fixing thru the entire day. Makes you look skinny if you are bottom heavy. Will rent again!

Agree with other reviews that this runs large. It is really a pretty dress for work, but the top bottom closure does not stay closed, so you run the risk of it popping open during a meeting and giving everyone a show.

links_reviews_title: I liked it but didn't wear it. Was a bit small
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit small so I didn't wear
The quality of the dress was great but it does run large and the front piece rolls back to show the underside of the dress. You have to pin down.

links_reviews_title: The hemline is very unique and flattering. It is tacked so the wrap stays together.
links_reviews_text: I'm busty (36 D) and the top with the wrap across the chest was pulling a bit, but not too distracting. It's a little low-cut.

I liked the style of this dress a lot. Unfortunately, the deep-neck gaped quite a bit (even though the dress was loose) and I had to wear a turtle neck under it. Might work better for someone less hourglass (I'm 32E/32DD)
The different length layers awkward.
too big in the chest and waist, but fit my hips
Cute dress for work. I wore it with a striped, tissue turtleneck underneath for winter and it was perfect for a day at the office.

links_reviews_title: This looked like a pretty dress, but the sizing was too large.
links_reviews_text: It was a bit boxy and fit quite large. It didn't work well with my body type, in my opinion.

links_reviews_title: It was cute but I don't know if I'd wear it again.
links_reviews_text: I got a few compliments on this dress, but it wasn't my favorite. I'm a little more curvy in the hip and this dress wasn't the most flattering. I did love the detail and the asymmetric hemline. It was perfect for work- but I did have to wear a navy cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress. Nice spin on a shift dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a cocktail party with a business casual dress code. The dress was comfortable. I usually wear a 6-8 but the 6 was unavailable, so I took a chance and ordered the 4 and 8. I didn't even try on the 8. The 4 fit great. It was a tiny bit tight on my chest and hips, but I think I am the only one who noticed as I am particular about fit. It fit great on my waist, in fact, I even tried to see if I could cinch it a bit more. I don't know if it is some "wow" dress, but it looked nice, appropriate, I liked how it fit (I usually have a hard time with the cut of shift dresses), and it was comfortable. I definitely think the right jewelry would add to it.
It runs very large, size down

This dress just didn't do it for me. The chest was too big but the little thread holding the wrap section together was too long or loose, so it hung really weird on me. It is also pretty long. A size smaller may have been better, but I'm guessing it still would've been an awkward fit. Not wearing this one.

links_reviews_title: great work dress. runs a bit big
links_reviews_text: runs big. get size smaller

links_reviews_title: Worthy of all the great reviews!
links_reviews_text: This is a stunner! I loved the fit and pattern of this dress a of compliments.
Loved this and got so many compliments! Great for a winter evening out and also a good maternity option (just hit my second trimester). The color was stunning and the side design intriguing.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED IT & EVERYONE ELSE DID, TOO!!
links_reviews_text: I know people say "I received so many compliments" on a lot of reviews around here, but I just need to say it again for the people in the back: I RECEIVED SO MANY COMPLIMENTS on this dress. It is a gorgeous material, with a nice, constructive stretch and a perfect length for work. I sized up to make sure it wasn't inappropriately tight, and I'm glad I did--this would be a very cute social dress at your normal size, and is a great fit for work if you size up one. I wore this for a holiday party, and the green is perfect but not overdone. tl;dr: rent this dress, but not in the 8 because I want it again...
It is very big on me and makes me look square. I have a thin waist and this dress makes me look big. Not flattering at all if you have a thin waist.
I sized down on this dress but still felt i could've gone down one more size so that it would fit nicely. There was a lot of extra fabric. Other than that perfect color and length

links_reviews_title: Cute, form fitting and quite warm
links_reviews_text: This is a well made dress. The material is pretty thick and feels expensive. There wasn't a size 4 available so I sized up. The dress was a tad bit loose but I managed and it was still pretty cute. Spanks may be a good idea for this dress. I received lots of compliments from men and women. I felt pretty sexy and comfortable in this dress. Great rental and fun colors!
Beautiful dress. I ordered too big thinking I needed room for my belly but it's stretchy. I would rent again for winter not a summer dress.
A dress with gorgeous colors, thick knit, and a standout design. Got LOTS of compliments about how it seemed to be iridescent almost with the color changing weave

I rented this dress to wear to a show in SF on St Patrick's day as well as to a work dinner in NY the same week. It is versatile and comfortable and a Gorgeous green. Fit is stretchy, not too tight/body con. I recommend sizing down 1 size to get a snug fit. Dress will stretch out a bit after first wear. Length was perfect, no bra exposed at armholes. I styled as shown and put a big faux fur green coat over it in NY! In SF I styled this dress with a denim jacket and neon yellow heels and clutch.
Great knit dress, expensive made, great detail on design, i took one size bigger to get softer silhouette, didn't want tight fit, worked great fir St. Patrick theme dinner
Great fit and very comfy

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work or a night out
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit all around and very flattering! I love that it's a thicker material below the knee so it was perfect for the cold weather

Absolutely loved this dress for my baby shower at 36 weeks pregnant. I went up in size to a 12R (wear a size 6 pre-pregnancy) and it was a perfect fit around my growing bump. Received compliments all day and loved how comfortable it was to wear. Highly recommend!
Loved this dress, it was warm and nice. Very comfy too! Received many compliments. The neck is a little hard to get your head into at first but it's ok to tug it a little bit haha

Overall, this dress is fantastic. The green really pops so it's a definite attention grabber. The fit is great as it gives you a little breathing room. Only negative is the material can get a little heavy ... which might make you feel hot if you're dancing. But I would rent again and again.
Great color!! It's not black, more brown/burgundy.
Ran a little big in the waist

links_reviews_title: A great option for a festive dress that isn't so on the nose
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to work and then a holiday party directly after. The dress was super comfortable, so flattering and I got tons of compliments on it. One minor issue, the turtleneck part did start to irritate my neck (the area just under my ears) but I was also wearing the dress for nearly 18 hours.
Fit great but not too tight.

Wore this for an opera audition and felt like a million bucks! Flattering fit (though Spanx help), unique pattern, great quality material. Came down to about mid-calf for me. The color is actually green and what seems to be a burnt reddish-brown? It looks kind of black but the black shoes I had didn't look great with it so I paired with nude pumps. 10/10 would rent again. Wish I could've purchased - I didn't want to part with this awesome dress!
Loved the dress. Good fabric and unique and luxuries style. You will get noticed everywhere you go!

I loved the color of this dress. I wore for work and I got many compliments. The fabric is a little heavy but it was a good thing because I didn't need a spanx. This dress is a showstopper --It is something that people will remember for sure.

links_reviews_title: A little too weird for work
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for work to be a little "funky" one day but it was just a little too random. Fit well though!
Great color and details. Extremely flattering.
Ran a little bit but loved the color! Will rent again in a smaller size

This dress is for those with a shapely body. I got lots of compliments on the design and color. I did feel like the bottom got a little loose after sitting at work most of the day so would go down one size if rented again.

the quality of this stretchy dress is legit. We are in the first days of fall in the desert and it's still almost a hundred degrees and this dress is thick but i'm doing ok since it's sleeveless. the striping is more of a burgundy than black but I went with black shoes because it was close enough and hard to tell from a distance. I do feel a little like wife of Green Lantern and so I would say it's definitely a statement dress, a little theatric if you are trying to make a strong impression. it could however be toned down, I feel like a jacket would break up the dramatic green pattern -- but then why bother. Not a dress for the faint of heart. definitely power dressing here.
The dress fit and colors are just beautiful. I will definitely rent again.
Very comfortable, I recieved many comments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a holiday dinner party. Looked amazing. LOVED IT!
links_reviews_text: Fits close to body but started getting loose especially around the butt area. Wore it for about four hours. Colors and fabric are gorgeous. Was able to sit, eat, walk around... so comfortable. Would rent again.
I normally wear a 4 and wore a 10 in this. Slightly Itchy material but worth it for the style. Lots of compliments.

I wore this to a work event and got tons of compliments-- I love dresses like this--bodycon but not so sexy I can't wear to work. Still cold in my office so I wore it with...wait for it Spanx arms which are life changers. Highly recommend--I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! So comfy for work. I'm a size 4-6.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! So comfy for work. I'm a size 4-6.
It was heavy material and buckled in the back. Wasn't a good fit for me

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing...I'm curvy, and it fits perfectly! I got approx. 1 million compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great!

links_reviews_title: Totally obsessed with this dress. I've already worn it three times!
links_reviews_text: Amazing color, perfect fit, awesome fabric, the style is very versatile...from work to play easily.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but you'll need to size down
links_reviews_text: I think this dress is extremely pretty and exactly as the photos suggest, no complaints about the quality. However, I wanted it to be form fitting and I chose the wrong size for that. The dress is incredibly stretchy so you have room for forgiveness here. I've returned it to check out a smaller size. Overall I'd say, depending on how you'd like it to fit I would definitely size down.
Liked this a lot but it's a loud design / memorable so it feels like something to wear once.
Not sure why they sent a 12R. It was too big but I love the dress!

links_reviews_title: My friends were complimentary about the dress.
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress looked nice on. It runs larger so it has a more of a lose fit to it. The fabric is not soft and so it doesn't skim the body.
Easy to throw on and lovely, I went up a size from my normal medium to a large and it ft well and length was fine for tall frames.

Runs large. I'm 5'1/120/32DDD and 18 weeks pregnant. Wore an XS and it fit perfectly in that it wasn't right around the boobs and flowed over my bump easily. Wrinkles easy. Sleeves are long but it is the perfect winter to spring transition dress.
Loved this shift dress for work. Simple, clean lines. Great fit, roomy enough for 2nd trimester
I got so many compliments on this. Love it! Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Really flattering and pretty color - arms a bit tight though
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. Looks pretty alone and with scarves. It also has huge pockets which is always a game changer for me. My only complaint is that the bicep part of the arms was just a smidge tight.
I rented this dress for work since I am 5 months pregnant. I absolutely love the color. I am sure it would look even more flattering on someone without a baby bump!

Without adding a scarf this dress looked like an odd pioneer girl nightgown. I thought the color would be a cooler blue but it's quite warm so it has a hospital gown feel. It's cut very loose through the body but a little narrow at the shoulders. The sleeves are quite long. It doesn't look terrible but without accessories it's sort of frumpy. It's got pockets which is always a plus.
Really unique dress. Has pockets, which I love. Also has a slip under layer which had to be adjusted here and there. Sleeves were long on me.

Loved this dress. It fit well and was comfortable at 31 weeks. I'm usually an xs but went up to an s for the bump and it fit great at the chest and shoulders. Looks very chic with a silk scarf and black tights. The material is a nice, heavy crepe. The only negative is it wrinkles easily.

LOVE the color and the swinginess - it was so comfy and easy to wear. I am currently ~25 weeks pregnant and I got my usual size (M - wore a size 6 prior to pregnancy) and it fit perfectly with room for the bump, even while sitting. It is a smidge tight on the upper arms but I am a bit broader in the shoulders.

This was a taylored look which fit my petite frame beautifully. It shifts nicely. The fabric is great quality and has a beige inner liner, so no slip needed. It’s a lovely ice color. Would rent again. On my short frame it fit about three inches above my knees when sitting.
Fit very well, wasn't too small in the arms. Flowed over the hips.
The dress runs very large. You maybe good sizing down two sizes. The dress fits like a choir rob.

links_reviews_title: A dress with pockets is always a winner!
links_reviews_text: This fit well everywhere except in the arms. It was tight across the shoulders and arms, but not the bust. I think if I sized up it would have required a belt. As long as you don't require a lot of arm gesturing freedom, it is a nice dress for work.
n/a
Runs true to size and i love that this dress has pockets. Wore it to work and got a lot of compliments!
When I finally got this on, I needed my husband to help me pull it off because it was so small and tight around my arms
People stopped me and told me how nice I looked. I loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fit, pockets (!!), beautiful ice blue color
links_reviews_text: Loved this shift dress! Wore with tights and black booties, then paired with slip on mules
Ordered medium, fit was normal through shoulders, waist and hips but length of sleeves was way off. I'm 5'6 and the dress hit below my knees.

links_reviews_title: Dresses with pockets are the absolute best
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a work meeting. It's a shift style dress, so it's loose through the midsection and hips. Very comfortable, plus it has pockets!
Little billowy, but lovely and professional
It was too long and hit me weird on my 5'1" frame. Wasn't able to wear this to work although I wanted to.
Got lots of compliments on this. The pressing wasn't great and the sleeves were a bit long so a cuffed them. I think I could have worn the next size down but large was fine. Loved the pockets.
Great effortless chic dress

links_reviews_title: A great shift dress in a just-OK fabric
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit and cut of this dress. The polyester fabric harshed the buzz for me.
Cute perfect for work!

links_reviews_title: great shift dress and this one is adorable. Problem - arrived very wrinkled and has a stain on it
links_reviews_text: Professional length and classic style
Great pocket dress. Comfortable. Easy to accessorize
Loved this dress. But it wrinkles easily. I would have bought it but the wrinkles ruined it for me.
Theory usually runs small - this did not. Wore a M, wished I'd had a small. Overall it was totally work-appropriate.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to wear this for work but was unable to
links_reviews_text: The shoulders are tight for how boxy the dress is

links_reviews_title: obsessed with this dress! comfortable and unique color
links_reviews_text: wish i could have bought it!

links_reviews_title: brighter than i thought it would be
links_reviews_text: it was quite silvery - more for a holiday party than a winter workday

I find theory fits me well. Sorry super skinny gals- this is a dress made for the rest of us! Even with not very skinny arms this goes great over my arms, fits my 34 DD bust, fits my butt- overall good fit. Looked great w tights for work. A LINE slash mod shape. All my jewelry is sorta fancy so I wished I had some mod fun jewelry to lighten it up- if I had worn my pearls or something it would have upped it a more formal look than I usually do at work, that would make it more date night.
Flowy and not fitted at all - exactly what you want in a shift. If between sizes, size down.
Beautiful color and dress, however this was uncomfortably tight in arms and would be too sacklike in a larger size

links_reviews_title: Great cut, but tight in the arms
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress. The color is silver blue and the fabric was so soft. I usually don't choose this type of silhouette as I'm bottom heavy, but I found this dress very flattering for my shape. My only complaint was the sleeves were cut very narrow. If there was just a bit more room in the arms I would have kept this dress.
Medium too big. Small too small. Very weird fit. Didn't wear either size!
Cute dress but is pull over. Missed that. Sleeves were too long for my petite frame.
This was a perfect wrap dress but the material didn't stay tied very well. I had to retie multiple times during the day
Material was great, always have to wear something underneath. Beware of the split
This was a great dress rented for a charity event/party. For great and the wrap was adjustable. May be too low cut for certain occasions but for me was cute and comfy
Really comfortable and made with a thick material - great for work
Love DVF, this was a great substantial weight, nice colors, TTS fit. I will wear a cami when I wear to work because the neckline is low.
Wore camisole tank underneath so it would be work appropriate. Added some fun variety to my wardrobe. It was comfortable all day long.

links_reviews_title: The perfect travel-for-work outfit for presenting a talk. Easy to wear/doesn't wrinkle.
links_reviews_text: This was an overall great dress and I would absolutely rent again. However, I'm smaller on top and the sleeves and bust were slightly baggy -- you couldn't really tell by looking, although I was constantly on alert for a bra slip, which happened once. For a larger busted person, this wouldn't be an issue (I'm a 36B)
The dress fit me perfectly! I loved the way it made me feel.
A bit low cut but I used a pin to make it work friendly!
Nice material, would travel really well. Definitely thicker so great for winter with tights. If you are curvy or busty will definitely need something underneath.

links_reviews_title: Not a fan of the stripes
links_reviews_text: Typical DVF fit, although a bit smaller in the busy than usual. I was not a fan of the stripes....in a wrap dress they just don't line up properly.

When most people run from stripes, I gravitate to them. So when I saw this dress I immediately had to rent it and I loved it. The only downfall is that I tried to wear this to work and it's a little too low-cut so I put an undershirt for modesty. A true wrap dress!
This dress has great colors, and the material is very cozy. It was a good everyday work dress.

links_reviews_title: Unforgettable? I wouldn't go that far. It was a nice dress to wear to work and out afterwards.
links_reviews_text: The dress was fine. Not completely WOW'd. A little snug. I definitely had to swear a shell underneath. I'm still learning the sizing.

I wore this for a conference and evening dinner out. I would recommend wearing a body slip or the link under it to cover the cleavage and to prevent any mishaps when sitting down. It's a true wrap dress. Thinker knit material which didn't wrinkle in a suitcase or while worn. Several compliments from co-workers
The classic wrap...

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for office day time party
links_reviews_text: Stripes actually made it more flattering where unwanted curves exist. Loved it! Had to pin at chest just to make sure didn’t expose anything when sitting ... especially since work event.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress getting looks all day...
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Wrap dresses need pin for boobage. The material is not as soft as I would like and the bottom could fly open in a stiff breeze but altogether a very flattering dress.
I got so many compliments while wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! It wasn't perfect, but I felt awesome in it!
links_reviews_text: It fit me alright, but was a little big on my sides. I am pretty small though. I also felt like it was a little too revealing for work, but a simple black tank underneath made it work. Fabric too hot for summer.

I liked the overall fit and size, and found it flattering for my body type. I think the Small would have been too large for me (with the belt and length) but I still needed to wear an undershirt with an XS. Only four stars because I didn't love the fabric - It was thick and kind of rough, but it was at least stretchy. I wouldn't buy it but it was great to rent for a day at work.
Professional and perfect for work

This wrap dress is classy, flattering and super comfortable. Great for a trade show in the Las Vegas 106° summer! The wrap is somethin to keep an eye on to ensure when you sit the leg slit doesn't go too high or the top doesn't gape open randomly, but it never went too far so it is not too bad! Just something I'm always conscious of, personally, cause I like to be covered up.

This is a thick, beautifully designed dress that has some style but not too much for work. It's a classic wrap dress with a bold pattern that is minimized with traditional blue tones. I loved it. It's not good for wearing outdoors during the summer HOWEVER if you're working inside a freezing cold hotel or convention center then it is perfect. I had to wear a camisole underneath because the neckline was too low cut and revealing.
A comfortable dress that can be dressed up or down. It's a low cut and the fabric makes the wrap tricky to stay closed so a cami is a must.
Super flattering, but this dress really pulls on curves. Hourglass shapes should size based on hips/bust and not waist... or stay true to waist size and be sure to wear a cami and tights!
Couldn't wear to work bc the slit was too eager and high.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: This dress would have been great for happy hour. I did not like it for work. I did wear a camisole like top underneath to hide cleavage. The dress opened to much at the bottom. I covered my legs with my jacket at work.

links_reviews_title: it provided good coverage regarding the hips and legs. when you sit down it is very proper.
links_reviews_text: Very nice material with a good weight.

This dress worked well for a work event. There was some weird shaping around the bottom of the fabric, almost like a bell at the bottom, because of how structured the fabric is. But it was comfortable, professional, and flattering otherwise.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on this outfit.
links_reviews_text: You need to be careful about the split when sitting at work. Super comfortable.
This dress is very cute. The fabric is a bit heavy though
Cute wrap dress. The wrap unties and loosens. It ran a little big, but overall fit nicely.
The fabric is heavy but in a good way. Beautiful colors and well made. This is a quality piece

links_reviews_title: Very pretty and flattering. Classic DVF.
links_reviews_text: Fitted, low cute, need cami under.
Which is inconvenient to say the least.
True to size. Great fabric, length and fit. Perfect dress for the office

Good work dress, not a perfect fit in the top, but I figured out how to wear it with a cami and tie it so I could wear to work a few times. The fabric feels very nice and like you could wear in warmer weather or with tights in transition weather.
Very comfortable! The wrap required a slip underneath, but overall flattering.
Good fit

Prolly the most comfortable denim skirt I ever wore Soft sturdy not too stiff as some can be The scallop design is so cute and adds a unique flare Fits true to size Not too short I am 5'6 Cute zipper in back adds detail Overall fave

links_reviews_title: Cute and well-made denim skirt, wish I'd sized down
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work for casual Friday and then out to a casual pizza dinner. It worked fine but I wish I'd sized down to a 10 instead of getting my usual size 12.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable light wight Demi skirt. I highly recommend.
links_reviews_text: It is a fitted look.
Would reorder in a size 4 instead

I love the scalloped hem on this skirt-- such a winner for me! I suspect I could have had a smaller size... the skirt rose up a little and the pockets poofed. I styled it with a vertical striped top wi th Navy/orange/beige and knee-high brown boots. Such a win!

links_reviews_title: Good quality but should have ordered a size down
links_reviews_text: The waist was a bit too big and the pockets stuck out making it look wider than it is. The pattern on the skirt got a lot of compliments.
Loved this skirt! Super comfortable and cute

links_reviews_title: Cute denim DJ skirt with pockets!
links_reviews_text: Love Draper James and this skirt is no exception. Great thickness, length and pockets!
Good fit - was too big but I'm generally an 8 (29 in jeans). Very comfy/ has stretch but was a little long.
Fit great
Well made, ok fit, cute detail. This was not an item I was over the top excited about, but is a cute twist on a closet staple.
Pockets were a little bulky but otherwise very nice fit and stretch.
Fits well, nice length and comfortable material
This skirt fit nice. I normally wear an 8 but got a 12.

links_reviews_title: Too big -- if not it would have been so cute! I'm usually a 0
links_reviews_text: #denim #toobig

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfortable skirt and the scallop detail makes it unique...will rent again.
links_reviews_text: The pockets wanted to stick out a bit so I pinned them but that is typical for me. I was told it was very cute on me!
A fun twist on the classic denim skirt. The scallop detail was cute and flirty. I got lots of compliments and wore it to work and a day party.
After reading the reviews I thought I would get my average size which is a 4, but it was too big in the waist. Would love to try in a 2.
Exactly what I was going for but unfortunately was too cold to wear to outdoor concert! Will def consider again for summer !
Great for afternoon shopping trip!
Super easy and cute. Not too short or too long. Stretch to boot!
cute skirt that can be a great staple

links_reviews_title: Easy to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Fit at the natural waist was extremely comfortable

links_reviews_title: Very sweet fun skirt. Perfect for casual events
links_reviews_text: Cute and sweet.
Love this skirt! Fit really well and actually hit at a nice length since I'm pretty short. Loved this and definitely will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Stretchy waist and not too long!
links_reviews_text: I wore to work and again later for a birthday picnic. They're not too long for avg height and with a stretchy waist, fit is easy. I did have to iron after the shipment arrived so time/plan accordingly. They're a light material so more spring and summer or warm weather.
Great fit. True to size. Would have loved an extra inch for my long legs but wearable (I'm 5'10.5"

links_reviews_title: Loved them so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Snug in waist and gets wider from there. These pants are very light chambray and super comfortable but the waist is tight so size up if you don't have a small waist. Wore these to work with heels and also with loafers on vacation. So versatile and fun!

I wasn't expecting much but these pants were great. Wore them on cool spring weekend day that included errands and early dinner with friends. They are cuter than picture shows. I probably could have gotten away with a medium but the large was fun and roomy. Will rent again most likely.

links_reviews_title: Chic and classy. Perfect for everyday wear. I paired with a Tory Burch top seen in photo.
links_reviews_text: The only con is how wrinkly these were. The do run longer side. I'm only 5'3 and I am wearing a 1.5 inch wedge and have these pretty high on my waist. I also found them baggy in the bum, so they ran a little large. If I got them again I would size down.
So comfortable and flattering. Easy to wear casual or dressy. I am completely obsessed
Be careful about renting these during hot, summer days. I sweated through them immediately and the stains were visible
Very lightweight and cool for summer.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday & travel, easy to dress up or down. love these pants!
links_reviews_text: Can be tight around waist but drawstring helps, perfect length
my second time renting, always complimented, they are SO comfortable and SO cute!

So even though I got a few compliments on these pants definitely not something I would have bought. That's why I love my Unlimited subscription so I can try things that are off my regularly beaten path of clothes. It accentuated my fanny pack area which I am not fond of, but it did look nice from the side. I don't have much of an hour glass figure, and it made me look narrower from straight on which was different. I had to wear at least 1 inch heels with this as they are long. I probably could have gone with an XS, but I read other reviews which said size up, and I think that was the right call. If you want to try something different try these. I think they look best on a very tall, slim, narrow woman.
Would have been better with heels. Nice and light and flows well.

Honestly I would have never rented these if I had only seen them on the site. Glad I found them in the store. I'm short and with heels they were floor length. I hate that they look like floods in the image. They are so much cuter irl.
Awkward fit, but I have curvy hips - these may be cuter on someone thin and less curvy. They made me feel like an old lady. (37-28-37)
Wish they were a touch more flattering. Lots of pleating at waist add volume.
Not flattering on a short lady
It fit perfectly and added some glamour to the everyday wardrobe

Super flattering fit. The material is light and flowy- perfect for summer. They do wrinkle easily but...so worth it! As a tall girl, it's also nice to find high waisted pants that hit below the ankle. I love these pants!
LOVED these pants but couldn't wear b/c they were too long. I wanted to wear with flats/casual but would have needed massive heels and they still would have been dragging. I'm 5'2 for reference.
Perfect length for me (petite) with a small heel

links_reviews_title: I didn’t end up wearing these pants.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very small. I am usually a small but got a medium for these and I still felt like they fit on the small side and were unflattering and uncomfortable.

I loved these pants! They were a little short on me (I'm 5'10) but luckily shorter pants are coming back. I had a little struggle figuring out how to style them in winter, but they will be perfect to rent again in spring and summer!

I am usually a small or extra small but the waist on this small was too tight. Not tight enough that I couldn't wear them, but tight enough that I couldnt wear them with a tight shirt (love handles). Otherwise, the fit was great and the pants were made in a great material for a warm day. They were long enough to wear heels and I just pulled them up to my waist when I wanted to wear flats. Will rent again, hopefully the medium legs wont be too big. 5'6" 125
Adorable pair of lightweight pants, but definitely not for petites. I'm just over 5'1" and these pants were miles too long for me. Tried them with my clogs and still way too long.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on the short & curvy
links_reviews_text: I was really excited for these pants, but as a hip-y person, I found them very unflattering, and at 5'3", they were several inches too long. I did love the light fabricI didn't end up wearing, but I think they would be great for someone tall and narrow.
Very flattering although a little short for my height. Wore with ankle booties and felt very trendy and also comfortable
I'm 5'3 and wore them with sneakers - made me feel tall! Lengthening for sure.
I tried these on and didn't end up wearing them. They are cute but they're lighter weight than I expected. They seem better suited for spring/summer!

These are cute, thin jeans. Very versatile. They are super long, which I love, but I am 5'7 and wear platforms. If you're shorter than 5'4 you would need one hell of a pair of heels to not drag along the ground.
Very flattering fit.
Loved these pants. Wished I ordered a size up.

These pants looked comfortable for a weekend trip but it turned out they were less comfortable but looked better than anticipated. The drape and length is very nice. The fabric is lightweight and cool but the elastic waist band was very uncomfortable. It's very wide and very tight. If I rent again I would try a size up.

I loved these pants. The fabric is light and airy, and they looked very refined. I'm very petite (5'2") and had to wear some 1 1/2" platform sandals with these or they would have dragged on the ground. Overall they were extremely comfortable.
These pants were cute and different. Comfortable. Light. Looked best with heels. Good for tall. Liked but didn't love.
These pants fit like a dream and they move beautifully as you walk. Being 5'7" I did have to wear them with 3" heels to keep them from dragging, but still absolutely worth it.

links_reviews_title: they were cute, but a little too high waisted for me
links_reviews_text: a little long, very comfotable

These were cute - pretty high waisted. I thought the XS would be too small but they worked well. I'm just shy of 5'4 and they didn't drag on the floor, and I wore shoes with about a 1" sole and that helped.
A nice, casual but stylish pair of pants.
I'm 5.4 and the extra small were too small but too long.
Make sure its your own size or better, a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Loved the asymmetrical cut of the neckline
links_reviews_text: This dress was very nice. Skimmed the body without being tight. Wore to work for a big presentation I got a lot of compliments. The front slit was cute as well. The gray is not a typical gray color. So paired i with a black peplum jacket. The fit was perfect is you are larger in the bust and hip/thigh area.

Loved the neckline on this. Unfortunately they only had a 0 which I thought I would try for a laugh but I felt it looked too tight so I didn't end up wearing it. If I'd had the right size it would have been perfect!

links_reviews_title: Nice work dress. Loved the asymmetric details!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a fancy work lunch. I loved that the asymmetric details made this different from a plain dress. With the grey color you could definitely experiment with colorful accessories or shoes. Fit true to size.
Great material! I'm usually in between a 4 and 6. I got the four, and it fit great.
The dress is clearly well made and fit perfectly. I was nervous it would be too long but it hit right above the knee. I'll be renting it again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neutral color and nice quality with a slight shine
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, quality, and color of the dress. Wore with a black blazer to work and it looked good. However, for my petite size, it was just about 1-2 inches too long and wouldve looked much more flattering on me if it was above the knee. Still, I liked it.
True to size.

links_reviews_title: Looked sharp and put together for a standard work day.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and there is a little stretch to the the material making it forgiving. This one looked so good I really thought about purchasing. Oh, and the sleeves were less dramatic than what I thought from the photo - which for me was a plus.
Fit was perfect for me. Stretchy thick fabric with cool sleeves and neckline. It's not the most wow dress, but it will be in my regular weekday rotation.

links_reviews_title: Loved everything about this dress, better than the J.Crew version, loved the front slit
