links_reviews_text: This dress came to me with tags on. Cut and fit were perfect. Weight was just a bit more substantial than the equivalent J.Crew version, and I loved the variation of the front slit.
Loved everything about this dress! Fit perfectly, great length & color.
It didn't run too small - I'm usually between a 2 and 4 and felt this one fit perfectly, looked great and was quite comfortable
Love the neckline, the hemline and the way it was snug.

If you're tall, the hips will hit you at your waist which makes for a very odd silhouette. Too bad cause the dress was new with tags—I really wanted to like it. I'm normally between a 2 and a 4 but the 2 was huge on me.

I wore this dress to work and paired it with a black blazer. It's pretty true to size. I'm somewhat between a 12 and 14 and think I made the right choice sizing up to the 14 on this one. Classic, easy work outfit!
Pretty dress. I'm towards the upper range of size 4, but only a 6 was available and it was too big. I would rent again in a size 4.
This sweater is so cute and so comfortable. Fit perfectly. Love the fringe detail on the sleeves.
Runs a little small, but has some stretch. Fun pattern, like the fringe at the wrist. High quality piece

The cute details on this comfortable, mid-weight sweater are perfectly cheery and fun. It's a great piece to kick up carpool, grocery shopping, and errands or to pair with chinos or a skirt for work. I love it.
This sweater was classy and fit like a glove, other than it was a bit short. It is great throughout the holiday season.
Somewhat fitted sweater. Wore with both. Lack and baby pants. Loved the fringed sleeves.

I rented this one size bigger than i normally wear and it was still too tight and too short. I don't have a super long torso, so it would be a crop top on someone taller than me. Its a medium weight sweater. Design is cute in person but did not love the fringe on the cuff.
Gorgeous, and the ten fit well. Such amazing detail.
Sweater fits true to size and is super cute. I returned it after only one wear because it's *very* warm for weather in CA in September. I'll definitely re-rent closer to the holidays.
Sweater is beautiful but seems as if it has shrunk a lot. Arms are tight and it’s a bit short. I would order again and size up

links_reviews_title: Would rent again and maybe even buy!
links_reviews_text: Got tons of compliments and looked great with jeans and black dress pants! Comfortable but also dressy. Wore it out to dinner with friends on a Saturday night-perfect!
Beautiful sweater with lots of pretty details. I am a size 6, and the recommended size 4 was definitely too small, so was unable to wear
This sweater is beautiful and warm. It fits a little tight on me (size 8) but not too bad.
Fun print for casual wear. I like the fringe at the end of the sleeves. The lenght was just a bit short so I was glad I also rented a pair of high waist jeans to wear with it.

links_reviews_title: Very interesting pattern, fun to wear
links_reviews_text: I liked this sweater a lot.
Was told the sweater would photograph great on my European vacation, haha. But it fits perfect across the shoulders, and the material is much comfier than it looks.
It runs pretty snug and is very short. I had to wear high waisted slacks with this, so it wouldn't show my midriff. Very pretty sweater, though.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, pretty, unique and eye-catching look.
links_reviews_text: This is such a pretty sweater! I actually liked it even better in person than I thought I would. It has a sort of funky Nordic vibe, and the fit was relaxed but it too loose. I might try it a size down next time. This sweater generated lots of admiring comments. If the photo appeals to you, you wont be disappointed with your selection.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and fun for Xmas
links_reviews_text: Great with high waisted jeans
Fit well. Cozy. Got compliments every time I wore it.

links_reviews_title: I felt well dressed at my church Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: It didn’t hug too tight. Nice fit. I felt elegant!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a German Christmas Market in a small Georgia town that is like a German town.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is a fun dressy top for all types of occasions. The treatment of the sleeves is super cute, and makes this sweater a one of a kind. I'd rent again!

After reading the reviews, I sized up - I am usually 10 or 12 in tops and this was a 14 - it was perfect. The fringe sleeves were fun. I wore it over and over. It was warm, but not suffocating. It is soft and not itchy. It is a great choice for the holiday season - I rented it for Thanksgiving, but I wore it over and over to work, weekends, etc.

This is a weird one. It was a bit snug on me. Cut tight in the upper arms and chest. A little short. And made out of an interesting material, like a polyester thermal. All that said, the colors in the weave were great, I got a lot of compliments on it, I wore it a bunch. Great for fall into holidays.
A beautiful print but it was a bit clingy and the light color grey on the tummy area was not very flattering.
With the fringe and print - it made it different that other sweaters.

Loved the Nordic feel of this sweater. The fringe on the cuffs was a really nice touch. The sweater fits well with high waisted pants. While the arms and shoulders fit well, just know it is a generally small/short sweater.
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: just hanging out with my girlfriends I felt it was just a step up from a casual sweater
links_reviews_text: really fun sweater with the fringe on the sleeves. Definitely worth renting for a nice fall day outing.

I receive compliments every time I wear this one out. It's so cute for fall. I was a little unsure about the fringe at the wrists but it looks so cute on, and will peek out from underneath your fall coat. Big winner!

This is a fun sweater to wear with jeans and boots, especially for an Octoberfest party. Busty ladies should probably size up, and I found the sweater to be a little short for my liking. High waisted pants would pair very well with it, though.
Probably wore this 3 times, in different ways, to elevate my otherwise boring outfit! It really works and makes everything look more chic! Great overlay for fall weather! Size down.
Rented this for a boat cruise in CA. It was warm and stylish and I loved it! Would have loved to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual night out
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a casual dinner and it was the perfect comfy, yet cute, outfit for a relaxing night out.

I have been looking for a warm jacket for cool March nights. FOUND IT! I love the soft and warm weave of this neutral poncho. The asymmetric cut is beautiful and keeps this length from looking like a blanket. The first night I wore it was windy and chilly but I was comfortable. So many complements.

Only complaint about this piece is it's very long but otherwise I felt very cute and trendy in it! It wasn't what I expected from the pictures but it was cute, cozy, and kept me very warm. Can't wait to wear it again!
Fit great. A little long but I’m only 5’4”

I absolutely love this style by Slate and Willow! A stylish poncho that keeps you warm! It runs large, so I would recommend sizing down for backup (unless you like it a bit loose- like me!). The material is stretchy as well. Great for any cup size, and can be worn with any standard bra. I can literally wear it anywhere, every day!
very long sweater! I got a small but am only 5'2'' and it was still very long, down to my mid-shin area. It was a little too long for my liking but I still wore. It was very comfy and cozy.
This was a fun poncho and I received many compliments. It is a heavy material which kept me warm, but it was quite itchy. The neck was the worst, it was cute, but scratchy is not sexy.
Amazing little long but so cute !
This was such a great piece to throw on casually or dress up if necessary. Got a lot of compliments. I'm tall and it was the perfect length-- not sure where it would hit on shorter women

links_reviews_title: The length is so different I loved it
links_reviews_text: It's really flattering and a really classy look. I wore this to a work meeting and then to a back to school night. It translated very well.
Nothing too fabulous about this piece, but it was a nice Unlimited Rental for a cozy game day at home.
Classy but really long on one end and short on the other. Would have liked less of an extreme in lengths.

This item makes you look slender. The asymmetrical design and the turtle neck are nice touch of sophistication while the grey color makes it easy to accessories. I wore this with black leather leggings and burgundy Tieks and received many compliments. I will rent again.
Loved this sweater
Perfect garment to feel cozy during a cold/rainy day, yet still feel high fashion and stylish.
LOVED this!! Wore it to work on a spring-ish day with a giant cashmere scarf, jeans and boots - perfect!
I actually may buy this poncho.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated look! Great with legging, booties, fun earrings. Very warm, so good for cold temps.
links_reviews_text: Runs long on a short person like myself but I didn't mind, made it a more dramatic look.
Super long but very comfortable. Loved. Wore with jeans one day
I really liked this sweater. It was warm, ran large, but still a nice fit. Neck got a little itchy, but would rent again.
True to size.
The sweater hit me mid-shin, when I was hoping it would hit around the knee or a little below, so it wasn't really wearable. Size down or only rent if you are 5'8 or taller!
Super comfy - perfect for a cold New England day but don’t want to wear a huge winter jacket
Super cozy and love the asymmetry. Wore several times before returning.

It was definitely on the long side for my 5'2" frame but since I'm 8 months pregnant it was great for making me feel chic despite my large tummy. I wore this to work and out to a nice dinner and got compliments each time.
The whole length almost went to make ankles... just not that flattering on a person that is 5'3"
Way too long.

Loved this poncho! My height was definitely an advantage since it is pretty long. I wore it over a tee with leggings and was comfortable all day long. The turtleneck was a bit itchy but otherwise it was great.
hung nicely and was versatile for work and weekend
Wear tight all back underneath to counter the blanket effect.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing this. I'm 5'7 and it was so long on me.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing this. I'm 5'7 and it was so long on me.

Pros : this was a well "fitted" style of poncho. The shoulders and neck fit well and made it lay nicely. I liked the geometric cut that made it super long in front/back Cons: the way it was cut made it harder to layer and not the best for cold weather Overall great in-between layering piece or for cold weather in warmer climates like the south. (I live in Houston but travel to PA/MI often so tried in both)
Rented this to wear on a flight. Also a nursing mom and was very happy to have this sweater! Perfect cover up and blanket and sweater all in one. Looked good too. Would def rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but longer than expected
links_reviews_text: I got lots of compliments on this! I wore it with leggings because it was just a little too long for jeans.
Wore more then 5 times during end of pregnancy, works great with leggings and flats or heels depending on the occasion. Not too heavy or hot even at 35 weeks pregnant

links_reviews_title: Trendy but so comfy for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: OMG love this snuggly, chic poncho. Perfect for work or play.
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this item. It was so comfortable, like wrapping yourself up in a blanket but looking good whilst doing so.
I'm short (5'2") so I wasn't sure how this was going to fit but it was the perfect length. Very comfortable!
The sweater is nice, but it was way too short in both the torso and the sleeve.

I wore this on a casual day at work. It's a thicker material & wasn't that flattering on me. I wore a white tank underneath because of the holes throughout the pattern. Not my favorite rental & I wouldn't rent again.

This sweater looks awesome on other gals in their pictures, but it missed the mark for me. When I first opened the bag I gasped "it's tiny!" but then I put it on and it fit. The neck hole was a little tight. The sleeves seem like they should be longer and it was shorter than I think it should be but I have a long torso. I perhaps would have preferred to size up to a size S but it was already bubbling out in the back by my armpit/shoulder blade so that probably would've been worse in a bigger size. Not sure if mine has been shrunken or is normal for the XS. Ultimately I thought of Marie Kondo and this sweater would've been fine to wear for a day but it didn't bring me joy so I decided to send it back without wearing it.
Looks so good with denim, black, white, grey, or army jeans. Got so many compliments and it was so comfortable. Just need to layer a tank underneath
LOVED THIS! I am usually a small but rented a medium because I wanted it to be long enough and it was perfect. It is such good quality and very warm. Definitely recommend for a statement piece.

This sweater is beautiful! A heavy knit and its fashionable. I definitely should have sized up as the sleeves we're a little short and the underarm area was a little snug but other than that it was great!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, just not very flattering on me
links_reviews_text: Quality was good. I was expecting the sweater to be more lightweight. Idk if it was the colors, the thickness of the knit, or the stripes, but I felt like it made me look kind of wide.
Pros: Comfy material Tons of compliments from random people Cons: Runs large

links_reviews_title: Not as cute as the picture
links_reviews_text: This sweater was a bit of a let down for me. It fit nothing like the picture shows - it's a bit boxy and short, so I had to wear high waisted jeans with it. The sleeves aren't nearly as long as the picture shows, and while it's warm and cozy, it's overall just lumpy and unflattering.
Wore this out for a date. Looks very expensive. Only downfall it fit a tad snug. Would size up.
It fit great, thicker material like otherwise nentioned so maybe size up. Long sleeves, but oversll I really liked it and would rent again
The fit was perfect. It seemed a little bulky but paired with skinny jeans it didnt look bad.
The sleeves were a bit annoying because they have slits so they are constantly getting in the way. However, you can fold them up and it works just fine. Otherwise its a great sweater
I personally didn't like the fit on myself because I'm on the bustier side but everyone at work loved this sweater! Best part of Rent the Runway Unlimited is going outside of my usual style box.

This sweater is really cool and will definitely get you some compliments! The little holes in it really are see-through, so I wore a nude cami underneath. The fabric is thicker, so the sweater is actually pretty warm despite the holes. It runs true to size and it's really stretchy, but I'd recommend sizing up for your backup size.
Fit true to size. Love the asymmetrical slits on the left hip and the sleevs. Very fun everyday sweater!
It's form fitting if you order true to size, would recommend sizing up so that it fits closer to the stock image. Very fun and unique with the slits.
Awesome fitted sweater , worn with wide leg black trousers.

The fabric was thicker than I imagined and would bulge on the body. Definitely made me look lumpier than normal. Maybe better if you sized down to be more form fitting? I'm usually a size 4 and the S was too big and didn't conform to my body.
This wasn't very soft & the sleeves were way shorter than I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: I would pass on this one
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it. The slits on the left side cause the bottom to flair out making it probably the least flattering sweater I have ever tried on. I rented it because I loved the pictures of it, but would definitely not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Loved the cut of it it.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
Looked cuter in the pictures than on me.

Fit was true to size. Perfect for a small top. Loved the slot details in sleeves and around hem at waist. Looked great with dark jeans and the small hit me right at waistline. Got lots of compliments, wore to work. Perfect spring sweater in color weight everything. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Not the best fit for me.
links_reviews_text: The XS fit but I did not feel it was as flattering and on me. I ended up not wearing it. The sweater is thick and did not feel soft and comfortable.
Length was a shorter than expected and you will need an under shirt/tank.
Too tight, would be best to size up for the oversized sweater look.
Nice sweater and fit well but the way the side is cut on the bottom is awkward and not flattering. Didn't wear.

I got lots of compliments on this and appreciated the unique design. The sleeves were somewhat short on me and I thought the fabric was rather stiff and not particularly comfortable. It also ran slightly small since there was very little stretch. Maybe it was softer before it was cleaned 100 times.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress up or dress down sweater
links_reviews_text: Really liked this sweater. I was looking forward to the extra long sleeves as seen in image on RTR. But it seems they may have sized up on model for that effect. Either way nice sweater.

Pros: Versatile colours, interesting details with slits on front/sides/sleeves side, quality material Cons: Strangely small neck hole, white stripes are actually a soft grey which makes it look dirty in the wrong light, felt a bit boxy as other reviewers have described

I loved this sweater. I kept it long enough to wear three times because it is such a unique pattern and style (the slit at the hip is great). It's warm and stylish. I wish I would have ordered a medium because it did run a bit large. It wasn't huge, I just wanted a more fitted look. I think I will rent it again in a smaller size.
Medium was just right for me. Nice everyday sweater with a little spice added to to design.

links_reviews_title: Great style. Better than just a plain sweater.
links_reviews_text: Fit great

links_reviews_title: Beautiful design, runs small and material is stiff.
links_reviews_text: Conceptually a very gorgeous sweater. I loved the design. Unfortunately, my bust size (34DD) negated me wearing this comfortably. I feel if I had sized up it would have looked bulky on me (full bust, small rib cage). The material had no give and was very stiff. I was so sad I could not wear this fabulous,out sweater.
I loved this sweater overall but it came with previous wearers armpit odor...I had to change out of it. Couldn't stand the stench.

Pros: -Fit; it's a nice tight fit (if you like that) -Warmth; although it seemed like it was not going to be that warm, it was surprisingly very warm. Did not need a jackt. -Material, the material is high quality, well made -Fun cut; not your average sweater. The fun cuts on the bottom and sleeves add a bit of fun to an otherwise very casual sweater. Pair with leggings to accentuate the look Cons- -N/A

links_reviews_title: well structured and interesting sweater -- not terribly warm though
links_reviews_text: fit great -- looks great. a bit stiff
Bump friendly but the slits do go above the maternity jean transition line (jean to spandex) - still looked super cute at 25 weeks!
I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: I liked it. It may run slightly small
links_reviews_text: Nice work dress. Very form fitting on my chest. I am fluffier then usual, would prefer it if I were leaner

This was cute and looked very professional for work. I wore with a black cardigan and black booties. Material was a great lightweight that didn't get wrinkly. Pic is taken at the end of a long day, so you can see how he wears. Fit was pretty TTS, but if you're between sizes, I would go up rather than down.

The pattern on this dress has a lovely blue stripe, which is hard to see in pictures, but gives it some Visual interest in person. Very comfortable, nice fit, no stretch fabric. I thought it would wrinkle throughout the work day, but it did not wrinkle at all.
Great dress. Wore for work. Very stylish and professional.

links_reviews_title: Great plaid pattern and comfortable for work
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got so many compliments. I did size up so I could get a little more length as I have a long torso. It doesn't wrinkle easily and is very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Just didn't love this. Ended up not wearing it

links_reviews_text: Was able to zip it but it was way too tight to be appropriate for work. Couldn't wear.
fit well -
Was recommended a small for a 6, but would order a M next time. Very tight but would try in larger size

links_reviews_title: Cute design, but didn't look that great with a blazer over it because of the neckline.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size XS, so this dress ran big on me.
Will need to reorder a M
Good work dress, nice neck line detail
GreAt dress. Didn't fit my curves perfectly but for some one else it's a great choice

This dress is so cute! If between sizes, I recommend sizing up. Also, I am not tall, and found this a little on the short side for work. That said, I work in a very conservative setting (law firm), and I think it would be fine for a different type of workplace. I would rent again but choose a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, fit well, comfortable for all day
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Ordered the XL because it was the only one in stock. Probably could've and would've gone for a large if that was an option. Was complimented 3 times before 8 AM. The blue in the pattern makes it pop just enough.
I wanted to wear it to my fiancé's retirement party but it was too small.

links_reviews_title: Not the right fit for me.
links_reviews_text: It just didn't fit me well. Was loose above my bra but tight at the bottom.
I had high hopes for this dress but found it to run small (I'm a pear shape size 8 and it's tight on the hips). The fabric is thin and a bit unforgiving and cheap looking. Didn't love it.
Make me feel happy, pretty, confident so high marks from me. Excellent fabric and fit.
This is way better in person. Thick, flattering fabric in a great cut. I wore it for a presentation and had a hose malfunction that gave me a fat roll and this dress concealed it. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and work appropriate with just enough flare.
links_reviews_text: This dress is SO comfortable, the perfect length, bell sleeves (my favorite), the fabric is incredibly soft, great color, comfy fit, looked really cute and was comfortable ALL day in this dress!
Nice fit. Moved well and great with tights!
It was a little short for me but I loved wearing it
Very comfortable.
This dress fit well and had a nice warm material. I liked the ruffle sleeves.

I wore this to work multiple times and got lots of compliments. The cut is flattering for a pear/hourglass frame, the sleeves add some fun flare without being annoying or in the way, and the fabric is the right amount of thick for winter (but not as thick as a sweater dress).
Wore this for work and loved it. It's a soft unstructured fabric. Not too tight.
Simple with a little trendy flair. Soft material. Great winter dress.

I wore this dress with a faux fur vest and leggings for date night, but also loved it with tights and pearls for work. It's very comfortable, but does not have a lot of structure. The sleeves make the dress!

I wore this 2x for work. Once with boots & once with heels. Very comfortable and stretchy. Not totally forgiving of belly imperfections but the polka dot print helps. Loved the frilly sleeves. Felt fashionable but still comfortable. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Trendy and perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Lovvvvve this dress. Sweater material but lined so it smooths. Gorgeous color and I'm so in to the sleeves! They did not interfere with my meal. So many compliments!
This is a great dress! It stretches and is comfortable! I am 5'8" and 165lbs. I highly recommend!
I really loved this dress. Fit well. Very cute. Wore to work and a birthday party. Got lots of compliments.
LOVE -so incredibly comfortable plenty of stretch – warm and soft. Wish I could wear it forever. Sophisticated look for work with boots.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and flattering, easy to take from work to dinner...
links_reviews_text: This is not my usual style, and that's why I'm so thankful to have Unlimited to try different looks. The material is super comfy and didn't wrinkle while sitting at a desk all day - and then moving to a barstool at dinner later. and loved the 3/4 sleeves -- def. recommend.
Rented this for a work trip. Fun sleeves and cute dress for fall. Material showed everything underneath so I ended up wearing it with shape wear, but was comfortable otherwise!
This was very comfortable and professional for a work setting. Great with tights.
The only size available in the store was an xl and definitely needed the medium. Because of that, the fit was off for me but I still liked the dress enough to wear it.
Great comfortable work dress. It's stretchy and was the perfect length for work.

links_reviews_title: Nice fall color. The fit was flattering and I felt pretty in it.
links_reviews_text: Fabric just ok for the suggested retail price point. On par with fabric quality of dresses found at department stores. The fit is flattering and does hide flaws. It’s lined. The color is perfect for fall. I am 5’4” with 34F busy and while the medium fit it was a little too snug so I opted for the large for a little more movement. It wasn’t that much larger so you may prefer a larger size if you order this dress. Hem line could have been a little longer. Taller ladies may have an issue if you like a longer hem. I got lots of compliments though!

Wore this dress on my anniversary, went out to dinner with my husband and got lots of compliments. It's comfortable to wear. I rented it from a RTR store and on the rack it did not look appealing, but still decided to try it on. The material is a little warm, it was perfect for a chilly night.
Dress was perfect for work. Nice professional fit and the fabric have room for movement, not constricting in the chest or bottom which can sometimes be an issue. Would rent again!
This was a bit tighter than I like but works with good undergarments.
Super fit. I'm a 4 on top, 6 on bottom, tall, lean. This dress fit like it was made for me, and I got a ton of compliments. Also really comfortable. Will rent again for sure.

I am hesitant to order sweater dresses, especially as I try to figure out RTR sizes. I should have ordered at least one size smaller as this was too big in the waist. I was able to cinch it for the day. It is a comfortable weight sweater that is lined. It is not clingy. The sleeves make a nice statement. Would rent again in smaller size.
Nice for office

I rented this for Christmas Eve. I really liked the sleeve detail, mock turtle neck, and the color. I'm usually an 8 in this brand so I ordered the medium but it was tight. The material is stretchy but ended up being more form fitting than I would have normally chosen for family dinner and church. I wore it with tights and boots which helped. Overall, cute dress for winter/fall but consider sizing up, especially if you're between sizes.
I really liked the look. It looked better in person than pictures and no one complimented it but - oh well, I felt good in it. :)

links_reviews_title: Great winter dress. Comfortable and pretty.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a heavier material than I expected which allowed me to wear the M which was a little more fitted than the L (I'm usually a 8 or 10). I wore once with heels and once with boots. It's incredibly comfortable and I'd rent again. Considering buying as well.
lovely
I didn't end up wearing it. The material wasn't very flattering and the skirt was too short for me.
Great for work!
Wonderful cut

links_reviews_title: A flattering design for my body type
links_reviews_text: Materials are stretchy, so it shows off the curves nicely
Need to go down to the XL. Drowning in this dress
Nice dress but very form fitting. Not appropriate for work but good for a night out.
Tight around the stomach and butt. Fit great. Very flattering.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress
links_reviews_text: It ran big on me but very flattering and comfortable
Wore this for Valentines Day dinner and a basketball game. It's form fitting, but not constrictive. Also, not too short! Even when sitting down, it does not ride up too much
Bunches up / kind a big but overall comfortable
Great for a day at a music festival. Love the print and it wasn't too short, like most of my denim skirts.
I liked this skirt. It's a great fit - high waisted, enough stretch, not too short. It would've been cuter without tights but my office is cold and I didn't feel like shaving, so here we are.
Love love. Subtle enough print to go with anything. Think enough denim to be flattering even if you're thicker on bottom like moi. Might rethink buying after the price drops again next season.
Have been holding this skirt for awhile because it's so fun and versatile! Was great for concerts, night out, fun days at work! Love this. Top is RTR too!

Fit like a dream. Very heavy, high quality denim. A little tyke stretchy. Very flattering and comfortable. Very versatile as well. I think mostly suited for casual wear, but you could definitely dress it up as well. Got tons of ""omg you're so tiny" comments when I wore this. A girl never tired of those. At $115 with the discount I couldn't justify buying, but definitely makes it onto my "past loves" list,
I wore this skirt to see Whitey Morgan! It fit perfectly and was great to wear with a simple tank for the concert. I got a ton of compliments and would definitely wear it again!
Loved this more than I expected. Nice and stretchy but also thick material.
Loved the way this skirt fit! Not too short so I could wear it to work. The fabric has a bit of stretch so it was comfortable to sit in all day.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and fun denim skirt with a modern twist
links_reviews_text: I really love this skirt! It lays flat and is extremely slimming. The denim has some stretch to it so I was able to wear one size down from my usual. I love the classic shape with the modern print (gray tiger stripes on an eggshell background). Overall, a wonderful item! Long enough to be work appropriate but fun enough for turning up on the weekend. :)
Was comfortable and easy to wear during the day and transitioned to a casual dinner.

I originally wanted to wear this to a LSU Football game, but the weather didn't cooperate so I wore it on a dinner date. It is denim so it isn't see through even though it is white. It's not too short but does ride up a little bit when you sit down (expected with pretty much any skirt). I wanted to keep this forever, but also wanted to try new things. I will definitely get it again!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute skirt! Very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size! The fit was great; it was also quite stretchy!

links_reviews_title: Good length, looks cute with a chunky sweater.
links_reviews_text: Definitely order the size up. I'm usually a 25 and it was digging into my stomach.
Great fit. Not too short to wear to work.
Cute fit, nice stretchy denim. Would have bought it for $50 less...
Cute take on mini skirt that isn't too short and fit well on my figure. Rides up just a bit so was pulling it during the day. Also seems to close leftie, with hook on opposite side of normal.
I really liked this, but a 29 probably would have been more comfortable for me
Too small even through another 12 Rebecca Taylor fit fine

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt for casual weekend wear
links_reviews_text: Fit was TTS, high-waisted and wore a black tee tucked in. Good balance between stretch and structure.
Very short

This skirt is super high waisted and has a tiny waist. I usually wear a 24 or 25 inch waist and couldn't wear this item. It came up to my rib cage. I'm very short waisted and have 34 inch hips. If you have an athletic build, maybe reconsider. Otherwise it's darling.
Loved this skirt. Happened to be the perfect length for work and was very high waisted which I like. Would rent again!
Easy to wear, would rent again
This dress fit super well and was very comfortable. The fabric was so soft. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering easy to wear dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my college reunion in the fall, loved it! So many compliments

I wore this dress for a full day of exploring while I was on vacation. It was comfortable and lightweight in warm weather. I wanted something that wasn't fussy, but still looked cute - this dress was perfect! Only con was that it was little bit short on me, but not too much to be a problem.

links_reviews_title: This was a great dress for my daughter's graduation party. Comfortable and easy to move in.
links_reviews_text: I wore my backup dress of a size 2 and it was a perfect fit. I am normally a size 4 so I would size down when you pick your size. Dress was flown and comfortable. Only negative was that the tie in the middle would only tighten on one side. I believe the other side was sewn down so the tie couldn't fall out of the dress and get lost. Not really a big deal but you did need to pull the extra material to the back as it would bunch up on the side that could be moved. Other than that, it was a perfect dress for a fun summer party.
The fabric is beautiful, reminds me of my grandmother's China. The skirt is lined, which is great. Doesn't wrinkle easily! Would definitely wear again.
This adorable dress is SO comfortable and light, but not sheer. Could be worn for any occasion - dressy or casual. Would recommend and rent again! Runs a bit large, size down.

This is the absolute best summer travel dress. Looks put together and lovely all in one no-fuss, wrinkle free piece. Wore this in Florence and Tuscany (#humblebrag) and couldnt have been happier with it. Fit is true to size and fairly casual.

Easy and cute summer look. Super soft and comfortable dress for every day use, and conservative enough to wear to work. Loved the fabric, fit and pattern. The 4 was little too big on me, but I wore it anyway. I will size down next time.
This dress was frilly and not a bad dress. Overall though, I found it ran a little large, material was very thin, and it didn't do much to flatter my figure. Wasn't my favorite rental.
I loved this dress! The material was so comfortable and this dress was perfect for my 30 week bump. Highly recommend!
Great wrinkle free fabric and pretty pattern. This was an easy dress to wear and I received several compliments. Comfortable and chic!

Rented this for a vacation I took to Sweden. Specifically wore it to meet my bf's grandma. It was perfect! It packed very well and didn't wrinkle. It looked great on and fit loosely on the bottom- very no fuss. My mom loved it so much she asked if she could have it...sorry mom!
This dress wasn't very exciting. The bust gapped too much to wear and the washed out pattern was not as bright as photos.
I never wear things more than once but I wore this three times! It was comfortable and flattering. Casual with flip flops or dressy with heels. Perfect for vacation.
This is a great everyday dress. Fits TTS and very comfortable. The only criticism I have is that the dress did look slightly worn...and a bit pale in color, probably from too many cleanings!
Really liked the print but definitely oversized. I would get a 2 next time.
Beautiful silk fabric and vintage look. Comfy and casual.

links_reviews_title: Great light weight dress for summer days in the Realestate world
links_reviews_text: comfortable

Wore this out for a night out with coworkers. Super cute on and very flattering- also ended up not being too short even though I am tall. If you're bigger busted, the buttons on the top can space out a bit, and don't wear if it's windy out, it WILL blow up! :)
LOVED this dress! I wore it multiple times. Paired it with flats, wedges, and even white sneakers one day.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so comfortable and works for so many occasions.
links_reviews_text: NA
Flowy, comfy & pretty

links_reviews_title: Cute but go down a size
links_reviews_text: Cute but go down a size

Simple dress that works great for my casual office. I wore with a blazer and flats. Love the button down as I'm currently nursing and pumping at work. So ease of access is key. Professional and low maintenance, will rent again.

This dress looks very put together, but manages to do it all with elastic and tie waist! It's a great middle-length for my height, and was a tiny bit blouse-y in a way that was cool and comfortable when worn outside on a hot day. The colors are lovely, and you can wear a real bra with it. Definitely looks a little nicer than your usual weekend wear (good for casual drinks or dinner out), but maybe not quite ready for a cocktail-party style event.
Cute dress for a bridal shower or baby shower
Recommend! Good for work w a sweater or for a casual day walking around
This was comfortable fit great and I wore it 4 different times!

I felt this dress was a little short, I think if you are between sizes you should size up. I didn't find this exceptionally flattering and wouldn't rent again. Also I had to pin the chest area in a spot so there wouldn't be gapping.

links_reviews_title: Flowy dress for a casual, everyday look
links_reviews_text: The dress is great, it did run a little big. I usually wear a size 4 but I think I could have gone down a size for this dress. Luckily there's tie at the waist, so you can make it fit. The dress is comfortable and pretty. I would order again and maybe size down.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and casual. Good for work
links_reviews_text: This dress is comfortable and lightweight. It's great for work work in the summertime. I didn't love the pattern, but it looked nice on and was easy to wear.

The dress came with a safety pin for between the buttons (would otherwise gape). It was cute. Could have been slightly more flattering for my body -- loose and didn't define waist at all -- but liked the color a lot. Def. a casual dress -- wore with sneakers one day.
perfect fit for summer vacation dinners
If it weren't for the tie waist this dress would have been too baggy, but the tie made it perfect and gave it a great shape.

Wore this for work. Got several compliments! Felt great wearing this. Tried on the Size 4 and 2 and Size 2 looked better on. Nice loose fit from the wait down, but also fell nicely on the shoulders and bust. Adjustable waist tie is great for petites (won't end up having the dress waist fall at the hips).

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Light and fun.
links_reviews_text: Light fabric. Comfortable.
This was a cool dress to wear on vacation: light, and casual for walking around tropical city.

I adored the blue and white print of this dress! It's so very Southern and charming. The dress runs large. I found the size 0 to be too big and it gaped especially around the arm holes. The bottom portion is lined but the top isn't. It's also polyester and did not breathe one bit.

Nothing really stood out to me about this dress. The fit wasn't particularly flattering (even with the cinched waist, it felt rather shapeless) and the pattern wasn't bold enough to persuade me to give it a go.

I didn't wear this. It was a little too big and the waist tie didn't pull tight enough. However, the deal breaker was the cap sleeves. They just don't flatter me. The pattern and colors are beautiful.
This top was fun and casual. I kept having to tuck it into my jeans cause it would ride up a little. Still great to wear.

links_reviews_title: Quality, flattering, and bold top that makes a statement.
links_reviews_text: I love this top. It's so understated, but it just looks expensive when you wear it. It's different from a lot of things I have, and it dressed up a pair of white jeans in a professional, bold way. I'm small chested, so the xs was perfect. I could've done a small, but I liked the snugness of the sweater. I plan on holding onto this piece longer than most of the stuff I've rented because I want to wear it again! For context, I'm 5'6" and 125 lbs. I have an athletic shape, but bigger hips.
Comfortable and fit perfectly. True to size. Received many complements. Loved it!

I absolutely loved this top. The sleeve length was perfect, and it was a great top for high waisted jeans. I wore it multiple times! I sized down but only because I wanted to tuck it in and didn't want extra fabric.

I liked this top. It's tight but stretchy and short, so works best with high-waisted pants. I think it works better with a jacket, at least that was the case for me. Not necessarily my favorite rental ever, but an easy and cute look.

I wore this with a jacket bc it cut off at my elbows and I don't like to give them a lot of attention. Not v nice looking elbows. Even tho my neck is tiny I did find the half turtle restricting. These two above things being said it is such a gorgeous well fitting flattering top that I gave 5 stars. It's v warm too. And it has a TON of stretch without the blow out. Def recommend. Also it's a normal length not long not cropped. Keep that in mind when choosing your bottoms. I wore w a high waisted wool ponte pant that was not right but just fit and it worked well bc the shirt material is that it will stay in place however you choose it to fall at your waist
Cute sweater top, a bit thicker than expected and a bit too short for a small.
Tight

I live in Miami so we have very few days when we can really wear fall or winter clothing. So, I rented this as a "just in case" when it did get cold and I was not disappointed. The stretch in the sweater was perfect, showed off my figure and was not too tight. The stripes were very cute and went well with my jeans and heels. I highly recommend renting this mock turtleneck.
I liked this shirt but wasn't in love with it. The material was really nice and you could tell it was high quality. Was nice to wear once but probably wouldn't wear it again.
LOVED this mock turtleneck sweater and seriously considered buying. Material was very comfortable - some reviews claim that the neck is too tight, but I did not find this to be true.
Super flattering - somehow sexy. Simultaneously fashion forward and nineties. Instantly took 5 lbs off me!

links_reviews_title: Cropped. Nice sweater. Not too heavy, but not light either.
links_reviews_text: Would recommend for everyday casual.
This is my third time renting this sweater. It fits true to size. For reference, I am 130 pounds with a 32C bust.

As a gal who is curvier up top, I'm thankful for this style! I had read the neck was a bit tight for some reviewers, I did not feel that way. The shirt fit in all the right places and was just long enough be tucked in if you have high-waisted jeans. My husband liked this shirt a lot and he almost never compliments the clothes I wear!
Very comfortable
+ perfect fit, print, color - too expensive to buy
Fit is slightly tight at neck and size definitely smaller. Size up.
Flattering and bright

Loved the way this fit and received many compliments. However, just be prepared that it may run slightly short for those with long torsos. I had to be very conscious about pulling it down when sitting.
awesome fit

links_reviews_title: Adds a fun pop of color under a black jacket
links_reviews_text: This was cute and comfortable. I would not have worn it without a sweater or jacket on top though as it draws attention to the love handles if you have them! Perfect for someone petite on top though. I would rent again for under a jacket.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, well made and looked great, but way too short on me.
links_reviews_text: Super short on me and I actually could never wear it.
comfortable, good fit, great with high wasted jeans otherwise would have been too short
Wasn't much different from anything I've worn in the past. Cute, but uninspiring.

links_reviews_title: Great for everyday wear! Exactly as described. Warm and cozy.
links_reviews_text: I just love when something is a true XS! Ya never know, this is amazing. I am 5ft but have a large chest, length is perfect for me, arms are literally perfect - not too tight. I love it. Great winter basic.
I really like this shirt. the quality is great but idk if its anything special.
Fit me TTS. Looked great. Somewhat itchy where it touched my skin, but I might just be sensitive.
Snug fit, bright stripes, perfect proportions! The tags inside are a TAD itchy. Still love this top.
I sized up because I was worried it'd be too tight but it was true to size. Great quality, very flattering, many compliments, perfect for tucking into high waisted jeans.
not my style-did not wear

I'm 5-1 and hit hit well above my knee but not too short for work. Is tight and form fitting if you have a chest. Good material. Will wear once. Looks a bit like a cheerleading uniform because the pattern on the top.
Great dress. Could be worn in a variety of settings.

I paired this with both black and brown boots and a couple of different t cardigans. Can dress it up or down. Wore it to work, shopping in NYC, out to lunch... many possibilities. The pattern is very flattering and it's easy to wear.
Made for petites. Didn't love the colors together on the dress. Very flattering.
Loved this dress. Not only did it fit perfectly, it was unique and the fabric breathes really well.

links_reviews_title: Perfect form-fitting knit dress for petite girls
links_reviews_text: I am used to this brand running large on me, but I was hoping that this stretchy knit dress might fit - and it was perfect! An XS (the tag actually shows it as a size P) is wonderful. The fabric is thick without suffocating. I loved that my regular bra was fully covered (even in the underarm area). It was extremely fitted just past my waist. At 5'1", the hem hit near the top of my kneecap. I wore a long olive green cardigan over it most of the day and was extremely comfortable in the dress for 12+ hours. One of my favorite rentals to date!
Hip design and flattering cut

I rented the size 4, and this is a fitted dress. Even though the dress is somewhat constricting, it's not uncomfortable. The colors and pattern were awesome, but definitely size up (unless you like a tighter fit.) I received many compliments. I personally would not rent this again.

links_reviews_title: This dress was okay, not great. A little tight around the chest and I just didn't feel right in it.
links_reviews_text: Based on the reviews, I thought this would be the perfect dress for me. But I guess I like things that are a little more flowy, which this isn't. I had a Leota dress at the same time and those hang nicely and are more my style. This was a bit tight around the chest and unfortunately didn't work for me.

I loved this dress. The pattern is more unconventional than my usual style, but it really worked--and the fit is great. The fabric is slightly stretchy, but thick and very forgiving--definitely holds everything in, but is still really comfortable. I got lots of compliments.
Fit beautifully and comfortably at 17 weeks pregnant. It hugs all your curves in the right way and no need for a bra. Love this little number!!!!
I love the fit and feel of this dress. Incredibly comfortable, appropriate length, and nice thick material that helps when the A/C is cranked too high.

I rented this for work. I usually wear a size 4, but based on some of the reviews, I was considering sizing up to a Medium. However it wasn't available, so I stuck with the Small. It was a tad snug, but the dress is supposed to be fitted and has some stretch, so it worked. Overall I think the dress was cute and flattering. Very appropriate for fall
Flattering, perfect length for me at just at the knees. Tons of compliments and super comfortable.
Good for work w a jacket

links_reviews_title: Great design patterns and unique dress
links_reviews_text: Dress is a bit tight in the top, but it worked for me especially because i have a small chest. The material is a bit thicker and heavier, but it was nice and smooth. The length was great especially because i'm tall and have long legs. It was appropriate to wear at a work event. I received compliments on this and wore a tan cardigan on top. I felt great in the outfit!
It fit great on my tall and slim frame
I wore this dress with a black cardigan over it to my clients office. It's a very easy but professional look.
Flattering dress, details in the right place. I wore it over a turtleneck and leggings because it was cold. Also wore for travel and it was very comfortable!
The dress was very comfy and adorable. The only con was that it sat funny on my belly pouch so it wasn’t the most flattering. Was not as long as on model but good length

links_reviews_title: Very flattering but runs a little small!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress on my pear-shaped figure! It's a little shorter than I expected, so it's not really appropriate for work. It's several inches above the knee on me (5'7" with a long torso), so it would only be appropriate for a cocktail party, wedding, etc. It runs a teensy bit small, imho. I'm usually a size M in knit fit & flare dresses, and the size M in this dress fit but was very snug. I would probably be more comfortable in the size L. If you have a larger chest/upper body, I would definitely recommend sizing up, as the bodice is quite fitted.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the Office or Work Travel
links_reviews_text: The small fit like a glove! Loved the thick fabric which is also strechy. I felt a bit like a corporate cheerleader but loved everything about the fit. No weird bunching or extra fabric and it hit just above the knee (I'm 5'5). With no zipper though this is definitely an over the head deal so I recommend putting on makeup and deodorant AFTER you put the dress on... and take off your makeup before you take the dress off. The head hole is not huge so unless your shoulders are double jointed you're trying real hard not to smear your makeup all over it. I would love to own this dress. Doesn't wrinkle so perfect for work travel with a cute cardigan.
Loved the dress, received many compliments! Perfect for work, loved the color and fit.
This worked for me beautifufully after first trying a small and then exchanging for a medium and wearng control tights. Then lines are so flattering, quality A+, and I really wanted to keep. Size up.

This was my first RTR rental and I am OBSESSED. This dress fit perfectly and was super slimming. I got tons of compliments a work would totally rent it again. Good to dress down with a sweater or dress up with a blazer. Definitely recommend.
Fabric reminded me of tbe Herve Leger bandage dresses. I thought this was very flattering however I would have sized up as it was very tight in the chest and stomach.
This dress feels terific. It hugus you all the right places. It is study yet flexible.

links_reviews_title: Perfect cheerleader type dress. Sexy but classy enough for work
links_reviews_text: Fit is tight but there is a lot of stretch. I wore this with a black long sleeve top underneath just because the weather turned super cold. Perfect dress for casual or work!
Fit perfectly and accentuated curves. It was sexy while understated. Loved it!
Flattering and hits in all the right places. Love the material and how it is structured yet flowing. Would definitely rent again for work or even an evening occasion.

I wore this dress to work with a stretchy jacket over it. I felt really great in it. It's a three season dress, material is probably too thick for summer. I feel like I look at least 10 pounds slimmer in this dress. Pretty true to size, but could run a touch small. I'm a true size 6 and the Med fit like a glove in places. You'll probably want to wear shapewear. Even though it's incredibly slimming in the waist, the dress is fitted in the lower tummy/upper hip area.
This dress reminded me of a cheer uniform! It's very cute but probably on the edge of too short for work. It transitioned great into a post work date night event!

Love the pattern and colors. Great for fall. Wore it to work with a black suit jacket that I removed during portions of the day. Material is thick and well made. I'm between an 8-10 and wore the large but would have preferred the medium for a more tailored fit. Nice piece!

I liked this dress a lot and it was good to wear to work. It had less give then I expected especially in the boobs. It still fit fine just a little tight, I thought the fabric would stretch more. I wore it at 19 weeks pregnant but didn't have much of a bump which was good because I don't think the fabric has enough give in it. Still a great dress!
True to size. Super flattering fabric that hugs your curves. Perfect for everyday.
Wore it to a conference, and through the evening after-party as well. Got many compliments! Love the length, the fabric, and the fit.
Loved this dress! Fit perfectly and great for the season, transitioning into fall but still warm. Had some Missoni pumps that paired perfectly. Will rent again!
Hit just above the knee. Appropriate for work. Heavy material that gave me support. Loved it.
Was a little tight in the stomach area but overall very forgiving weighted fabric. Was a nice addition to my work week dress rotation but wouldn't rent again
Comfy and looks great!
Love the print. They do seem to bunch up when you walk for a bit

Blue and white floral shorts. A little dressier than shorts with the skirt- like flare. Comfortable and cool for hot days. Zips up the side. Not stretchy at all but fit comfortable in my usually size. Be careful bending over or on a Windy day. Nice heavy quality fabric. I wore a size small as usual and wore multiple times. Easy to dress up or down
Super sweet print, high quality, fits well and flattering
These were cute, fun shorts! I wear a size 26/27 jean and got the extra small - small definitely would've been too big on my waist, the XS fit just right.

These are really cute, everyone commented what a cute skirt it was, but I felt much more comfortable with them being shorts. I think the flare out was a little heavy and made me look bigger. Also the floral print had a very Laura Ashley 90s feel.
These shorts are very cute and they fit well, but they are huge in the legs (wearing them when its windy is a struggle). I would size down next time.
Not as flattering as they look in the photos and they're a bit more rigid and creased than I'd expect. Didn't end up wearing them anywhere.
Legs were very wide and felt more like a skirt. Comfortable though!

I am a medium to large bottom. Medium was too small and large was not available. Wanted to see this skort in person so opted for the XL. It was a tad big and large would be perfect. I absolutely love this piece!! Great quality and just adorable!! I may wait for large to be available and keep for whole summer!

links_reviews_title: Wore this with a black body suit, leather jacket and heels
links_reviews_text: Very unique, very voluminous. The shorts were very comfortable and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super cute style, very unique. I got compliments all day long!
links_reviews_text: It's a little short, especially in the back so I thought twice about where I wore it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for rooftop drinks and sunday brunch
links_reviews_text: there is a bit too much fabric but the shorts are fun!

links_reviews_title: Sassy shorts that were comfortable and fun
links_reviews_text: Back is a bit short - so when you sit you are not sitting on fabric. a bit fuller than it needs to be

links_reviews_title: Shorts that really do look like a skirt
links_reviews_text: Great fit and yes, it does puff up like the other reviews said but that's what makes the shorts look like a skirt - very cute!
Very cute fun shorts will rent again

links_reviews_title: so cute! went well with a lot
links_reviews_text: great fit, loved the flare of the shorts, looked like a skirt

Wore this to a bday party at TopGolf. Was comfortable and fun, fit well and looked like a skirt. You do have to steam this or else it looks weird. The way the ironing makes it look during dry clean is just awkward. Can't bend over like pants, tho!
Too big, too much material in the front. I expected flow shorts and they were a really still material.
This shorts are so unique and fun. I have athletic thighs and the flowy-ness of the shorts was perfect. The was was a tiny big big for me. But overall a fun outfit to spice up the normal short.
High waisted style with flowey wide legs is perfect any body type! The emphasized fabric and pleats pleats make the shorts look a little "poofy" on the body, very cute and innocent summer look
These are so cute but run way too big. Got my usual size small and had to return bc they looked so frumpy - wondering if an XS would work or still be too big.

They fit even though there is no stretch to these. However, the inseam was too short and they made some weird lines in the front. It was not a flattering look, so I didn't wear. The fabric reminded me of a pillow case.

links_reviews_title: Cute, a little frilly felt too young for me
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size very full at the hem if your legs are athletic may not be flattering

links_reviews_title: I love that they are shorts
links_reviews_text: It fits well. I wish the waistband was a bit thicker, but otherwise, it is great.

links_reviews_title: If your hips don't lie, these might not be for you
links_reviews_text: Super cute shorts, material was a bit more thick that I expected. The fit was great all around except for the amount of material. The way it laid on me wasn't right. Could tell they were shorts, but looked puffy like a skirt. Just wasn't able to pull them off.
Perfect sweatshirt for a chill Christmas Day

links_reviews_title: Fun and festive for the holidays
links_reviews_text: Got the XL for oversized comfort and it was juuuuust there. Cute and fun, no complaints.
Cute and simple holiday sweatshirt. I wore it all day on Christmas Eve to Disneyland. It was just the right amount of festive. Does run a little big but that is the look.
I think it fits a bit big - prob should have gone with the medium but wasn't sure. Lots of fun - a really cute ugly Cjristmas sweatshirt. Soft insode - good for travel, whatever.

This was perhaps my most useful rental - I probably wore it 5 times during the holiday season but isn't something I'd wear all year round. Very thick sweatshirt but flattering fit. Came to me with tags on it. Great for holiday errands - in the spirit with out being too cheesy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect choice for a casual Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy and cute sweatshirt for a holiday party! It came with tags on, too!

links_reviews_title: A fun holiday pick without the cheese!
links_reviews_text: I'm not into ugly Christmas sweaters so this was a fun choice for my holiday parties. Very comfy!
Sexy stunning dress. Received comments left and right. Buttery material - hard to believe it's just polyester! I wore this with a light layering black turtleneck. Will rent again.

Received compliments every time I wore it. Love the bow detail, quality of fabric was nice, on the thicker side. I'm a 36D and my chest perfectly, had extra room in the hips. I have an athletic build. I am 5'7". Will rent again. FYI fabric did have a little stretch to it too.
No Flintstones here, this dress is edgy and eye-catching without over doing it. Lots of compliments!
I wish I had listened to it running at large. I still wore it, but wish the waist had been more fitted

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Perhaps because I had read another review couldn't get Wilma Flintsone out of head :)
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well - could have sized down to small. Really unique dress - got tons of compliments. This is a super fun dress if your are looking to try something different. Sorry for the pic - couldn't help it!

I'm 15 weeks pregnant and this dress fits like a glove. Pre pregnancy I was an 8 but am renting non maternity sizes 10 and this was almost perfect. The top was a little loose for me but maybe that would change with a different bra. I might still wear it! Very cute and unique dress.
I really liked this dress, the print is pretty and the tie at the neck is a nice touch. The fabric is lined, but I still wore shapewear. Will rent again!
I really loved the print, bow, and stretch to the fabric! It enhances your curves but keeps them tucked away ha ha! Good rent!
Such an edgy piece! Loved the little neck tie
I loved this dress!!! The fabric feels like silk. It's a great pattern and is perfect for the office.

Runs a little large in case you need to err on the side of caution. I wore a black fitted blazer over it because it was just a little too much even for me. But comfortable and stretchy. The bow ties awkwardly because of thick fabric. Hits right above the knee on my tall frame.
Just wasn’t for me
Lots of compliments! Not as yellow as pictures show, more gold. I paired it with a black shrug sweater since it's winter. Wore to work and then dinner. Keeping it to wear one more time!

links_reviews_title: Someone made the Flinstones reference and now I can't unsee it.
links_reviews_text: I'm a redhead...so, Wilma all day (even though she wears a white dress, it was like I stole Fred's outfit and made it fashion). Fit was flawless and material was nice, but sent it back because I just wanted to giggle. If you're going for a dinosaur age aesthetic, this dress will be perfect.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments! Work to cocktails with a change of shoes!
links_reviews_text: Great compliments. Fit was great! Spicy flirty print. Wore it with flats to work and change of heels totally changed the look for cocktails!
Got a ton of compliments on this dress and would purchase it if it weren't so expensive.

links_reviews_title: Perfect on-trend summer to fall work dress
links_reviews_text: Size up if you have wider hips. Cute bow detail.
True to size, finally an Alexis Admor dress size 0 that was past the knee! Comfortable, zip up back, and lots of complements, even though Im not generally an animal print person
The tie at the neck adds interest, while the print makes it fun. Fits true to size and is very comfortable and soft but high quality fabric.
Great fit! Loved the tie at the neck.
The dress was a little loose under the arm near the breast area but otherwise, it fit very well!!
I rented this for a girls gone wild event at the Country Club where I work. The only available size was XL. It was so big in the under arms and hips! Sent it back the same day!
I received lots of compliments on this dress, but it felt big in the chest. Everywhere else fit. It maybe could be a tad smaller, but ultimately it was fine.
I received lots of compliments. It's a fun dress to wear.
I really liked it but once my daughter said I looked like Wilma Flintstone I couldn't unsee it! The fabric is nice and stretchy. People either really loved it or hated it.
Great!
The fit was a bit awkward, I think the dress was a touch too big. But VERY nice dress and VERY comfortable. Looks great.

You can't feel sad in this dress. Well-structured, bright, and perfect for twirling, it's great for work, parties, or a date. It can be a little low cut, but this can add to the appeal depending on the occasion. Loved it!

Wore this for my graduation. Really great fit and style, even the XS was a little large on my frame (occasionally if I stretched my arms the wrong way, you could see some bra, sleeves were not quite form fitting, etc.) but not in a way that was distracting or meant I couldn't wear it. Overall the dress was super comfortable and in such a fun color. Zipper in the back goes all the way up. Pockets are great for small things (cards, chapstick, etc.)

Absolutely loved this for graduation week awards! I'm 5'10" and it was just knee length on me with 2.5 inch heels. Only thing of note is that the neckline is a little low, I didn't have to use tape but I have smaller bust. It was a wonderful thick crepe fabric, the skirt floated beautifully. I got tons of compliments on this perfect yellow dress!
Cute dress but a little low cut so I safety pinned it

links_reviews_title: Super feminine early fall dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very feminine, flattering & the color & thickness is perfect for early fall. Great for tall ladies: I'm a leggy 5'11 & it came to my knees & the waist hit at my natural waist. You will need a cami underneath to hide cleavage at work/church. I did have to pin the chest where it crosses over to avoid nip slips when it gaps during movement.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a cocktail party, and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: It fits beautifully and the color is gorgeous.

I didn't get to wear this dress as there was a RTR scheduling issue due to the holiday weekend. Overall the shape of the dress was nice but the summery style and color don't match its heavy, winter like material. Although I was not able to wear this dress I don't know if I would have anyway, the color was an odd shade and personally I felt it washed me out. I think it's much better suited to someone with darker coloring that can pull it off.

Rented this for a day at work. I felt it was more suited for a wedding. A little to fancy for work. It fit great everywhere except the chest was a little too loose. I tried pinning in but didn't want to mess with it all day so I just threw a tank top under it and that worked out for me. It was also heavier than I thought it would be. I did get compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel so feminine and fun!
links_reviews_text: I'd recommend this dress to anyone looking for something stylish and comfortable. I'm 5'10" with an athletic build, so finding the right fit can be hard. I rented the Medium Long, and thought it fit perfectly. it can be dressed up for a formal event our dressed down for a backyard wedding (which is what I did). The sleeves didn't slip at all, making for easy wearing and easy dancing. I'd highly recommend this eye-catching number!
Cute dress, very comfortable and feminine.

This cheery number is cute, comfortable and has pockets. The color screams summer and the length and short sleeves make it office appropriate. True to size, bustier ladies might have to wear a camisole underneath of wearing to work. Received a lot of comments about the color and the ladylike style!

Great marigold color. Good length, not too short. Thick material and lined so dress is heavy and not great for super hot and humid weather. Too gapes open and I had to wear a cami. Sleeves fit a little snug.

links_reviews_title: Good dress for work but order a size up
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of heavier material than I thought. Great dress for work but I'd be miserable in this material if I was outside in the heat. The v in the front is quite open and no clasp to close it so you'll need an undershirt of some sort. I ordered a size up because of the reviews and it fits perfect.
Perfect fit
This really is a princess dress! Very high quality. Color is gorgeous. Pockets. :)
Dress it's very true to size. I normally wear a 6 and the S fit perfectly. Received a lot of compliments on the bright color.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and the fit!
links_reviews_text: Fit great overall. I dis have to sit straight or it was a little revealing, but not bad.

This dress ran a little big, but still was flattering. Loved the color. Fabric was heavy and feel very flattering. Picture is under a direct light, so it's a little weird. I'd definitely rent this again.
I loved this dress, especially the color. I was a little big up top.

I rented this dress to visit Disney World and I felt like a Disney Princess in it! People kept complimenting me on how pretty my dress was. I am in between sizes (8-10) and I always get never because I am busty but this dress still gave me a little room to move around freely. I love the full skirt, so many twirl moments! It's a little heavy but I was ok with that. It's fully lined and the material is thick but very high quality. It was a hot day and I felt fine in it. I'm 4'11" so you can see in the picture how long it was. I loved it, will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: The RTR staff (Corey) went out of their way to help me get my dress on time in short notice.
links_reviews_text: I'm shaped more like a pine tree than a pear so everything fits me loose up top and tight down below, but this dress kept me from looking too awkward. Really cute spring/summer dress that I wore to a business type event and got plenty of compliments.
My boobs were showing lol. But it's such a great dress
The dress and the color are adorable but it was way too low cut. I'm a 36-C and you could see my bra... even fashion tape didn't help.
Goes past my knees and I'm 5'7". Thick material. Runs a little big.
This dress is so cute and is a beautiful color! I got so many compliments. I wore it to work and I did have to wear a cami underneath because the top gapes on the right.
I loved the dress and the fabric, but it's deceivingly low cut. Had to wear a shirt under to be work appropriate
Hard pass on this dress -- it was huge, first of all, and the material felt like a tablecloth or an old curtain.
I wore it, but didn't love it. The color is great--but this just didn't fall right on my body.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I’m 5’ 3”, 145 lbs and it was perfectly mid-calf lengthy. It shows a lot f cleavage so I had to pin it closed, but it’s beautifully constructed and the pockets make it a no brainer.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress and had a good time.
links_reviews_text: Great drape, great flow, loved the pockets. I used a safety pin to keep the cleavage closed, which worked okay.

links_reviews_title: Nice, well made dress. If it was not so low cut, I would have kept it.
links_reviews_text: A little too low cut for work and a little too conservative for weekend wear.
This dress fit great except for the bust. I have a larger bust and had to pin the top together so that it was appropriate. It has pockets and loved how the skirt flowed.
Love the feel of the dress. Got so many compliments on it.
It is too low cut in the chest for it to be work appropriate without putting a shirt underneath

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a weekend in New York City.
links_reviews_text: The dress really popped and stood out. Plenty of compliments plus it looked amazing in photos. The neckline was a little too low to wear a bra but not too revealing.
The fit was fine except it gapped so much at the chest that I didn't feel comfortable wearing it.

links_reviews_title: The color did not go with my skin therefore I did not wear it
links_reviews_text: Fit - true to size

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on the bright color and flattering shape.
links_reviews_text: This is a heavy dress, so if you get hot and sweaty easily, not a good choice. On the plus side, the thick material hides bra and underwear lines so you don't need any undergarments for that purpose. I had ordered a medium and returned it for a small, because the medium was big in the chest and not very flattering. The small looked great in comparison, but the arms were pretty tight. I wouldn't have been able to carry anything or move very easily in this dress. Luckily I wore it for a graduation and a dinner.
Really nice dress in a bright bold color. Received many compliments on dress style and color. Wore camisol underneath for work .

Color is more marigold than the photos show. The neckline is very revealing for a full bust. I was unable to wear because it ended up gaping open and looking inappropriate. The rest of the dress ran a little large and the fabric is very heavy.
I absolutely loved this skirt. It was a little too short for work, but perfect for the weekend. The buttons on this made it so interesting and the color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: So cute, got lots of complements!!
links_reviews_text: Only thing was it was little larger than I expected and complicated getting on and off, but other than that I LOVED and received lots of compliments! Would rent again just a size down!

I'm usually a 4 and got a 6 and it was a good fit. Definitely size up. Cute but not my favorite. Thicker fabric if that means anything to you. See more looks on my RTR insta highlights @leahgay and feel free to DM me any questions!
Felt so girly and cute got some compliments. Loved it
Loved this skirt. So cute. I was hesitant ab what size to get bc most people said to size up. So I did and went with the 8. It definitely fit but I prob could've been fine w the 6 too
The oversized buttons are everything. Perfect fit. Can't wait to rent again- could even wear in winter with tights and boots
The skirt was very cute but ran the slightest bit small. When I walked, you can see that it pulled a little. If the wrap wasn't stitched I would have loved it! Paired with a pink silk top tucked in.

I ordered up one size bc some of the reviews said to and I wish I wouldn't have. The size up was so big it looked sloppy and not wearable. It was very cute though, the fabric is awesome. I will likely rent again with my actual size.
But cute nonetheless

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! Wore this to work in winter with tights and a black turtleneck.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 2 and the skirt fit. It is a snug waist.

Unfortunately this skirt in its smallest size was too large for me. I'm 4'11 / 5'0 and it felt like I was swimming in it. It didn't sit on my waist and the shape wasn't flattering. It was also not a mini which was the look I desired. It was SUPER beautiful and for the right height would be so cute. Not for me!

links_reviews_title: Not sure if it runs big
links_reviews_text: I am not familiar with this brand and listened to my fellow reviewers who mentioned that the skirt ran big. I usually wear a 6 or an 8 and sometimes a 10 in skirts ( I have wide hips- A girl in sorority rush told me they were birthing hips-Thanks?). I ordered the 10, and it is quite large. This could just be my experience, but I felt I should share. Also, I was returning from vacation and felt like a beached whale, so I ordered up two sizes. So basically if you want this to fit as it does on the model order one size up or your typical size even if you are feeling larger than usual. Other than my sizing error, this skirt is lovely. I feel like Nancy Drew meets the Marvelous Mrs. Mazel.

This skirt is fun to wear and the button details make it unique. It does run a little small, I wore the size 4 which worked but was a tiny bit snug on the waist. It is a light blush color so it pairs well with a lot of other colors.
Love this unique skirt! It runs a bit small, so I could've sized up. I got lots of compliments on it. The buttons are a little loose, but they're adorable so I didn't even care.

Didn't love the material of this. I didn't realize the sleeves were a different fabric then the center part of the shirt. Also might have been too early in the fall for sweater material but still liked the style
Nice material on body and arms. Length was good, not too short. I loved it I had more in person than I thought I would.
Loved the way the neck was cut - very flattering and the sleeves were so cute. Will rent again
My coworkers loved this top!! Looks and feels expensive. Love the different materials. The bodice is a bit thicker and stretchy so if you are between sizes I would go down.
Beautiful, simple but elegant top. The bodice is actual sweater material, not itchy and the sleeves are a silk. Was able to wear a regular bra. Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous silk sleeves that elevate the look of this blouse
links_reviews_text: This fits incredibly well and is very comfortable. Easy to dress up or down - to work or on the weekend. Highly recommend!

I loved wearing this top. The contrasting materials, silk sleeves, and square neckline made it for me. Took off one star because the body is awkwardly long - it wouldn't have worked with fitted pants because there's too much material to tuck in. I thought it ran pretty true to size despite the brand typical running large. Would rent again.
Love this top. Paired it with distressed jeans for Casual Friday. Got lots of complements!
The shirt was very short and did not fit well around the chest area.

Wore this top to work and got so many complements- felt beautiful all day long. I also had dinner plans that night, so I paired it with a pair of jeans for that, and it was perfect. This is super comfortable. Definitely size down so it does not gap at the neckline. I have large arms proportionally and still had plenty of room in the arms when ordering a size down from normal.

I would have kept this shirt if I didn't have such sticker shock over the price tag. The material is a cozy sweater in the middle and soft silk sleeves. Super easy to dress up or down tucked into most bottoms. True to size and maybe on the roomier side.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty - but the shape of the neckline is a little odd.
links_reviews_text: This is a VERY pretty top. Elegant and classy. But the neckline is cut very square (and pretty low) so I had to wear another shirt underneath.
This fit is strange.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top! It is super elegant and chic and elevates your jeans!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this top! My only comment is that the top is slightly large on my petite frame and it is not as fitted as the model.
Nice every day shirt that looks great with lighter wash jeans. I did a front tuck & wore with a black blazer. The fabric is so thick & silky!
Pretty top. Nice fabric. Got a lot of compliments
Great for work and for the weekend. I went right from work to a show and it was perfect for both.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt - very structured, longer than it seems in the photo and the side slits go to the waist
links_reviews_text: great fit. button was broken when I received.

The fit was small in the chest and arms but large around the waist and hips. The fabric is heavy and not breathable. This is a polyester fabric, not their typical silk. It made all the difference with the quality and feel of this shirt. It honestly just looked like some ill-fitting $12 shirt from Ross. No just no. I really wanted to like it too.

For whatever reason this didn't fit like other equipment shirts. It is a little tighter in the bust and shoulders and longer than normal. The tail of the shirt hit about mid thigh instead of right below butt. It does not indicate it was their slim cut. The fabric is really nice though.
Everything fit but the arms. If you're going to the gun show, you can't go in this top.
This is a nice, quality shirt. The material is pretty heavy, though. I thought it'd be lighter and nice for warm days, but it might be a tad too heavy for that.
Faded
