Did not wear, top was extremely large and coloring also was off compared to photos
This is more of a winter top, in my opinion. The material is very thick and does wrinkle easily, but is adorable over jeans (it's kind of long) with some cute shoes for work!
Have rented this twice so far. It's perfect for work when paired with cigarette pants, or for a casual weekend with skinny jeans.
Arms were tighter than expected but overall good fit. Paired with black jeans and booties. Very cute!
Was not able to wear this blouse because it had 2 broken buttons . I will order again because it waas very nice quality and I like the fit and style.

links_reviews_title: Felt good, looked good, loved it.
links_reviews_text: Great casual shirt. Love it.
The shirt is pretty long and wide, but sleeves are for those who have slim arms. But I found it usual fir for all equipment shirts.
I'm usually a small or medium and I ordered a extra small. Definitely size down.
Work

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shirt but sizing didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I typically choose a medium in blouses, but this shirt has more of a slim fit, so the medium unfortunately didn't work with my chest. It's a gorgeous shirt though, with great construction, and would look great with any sort of outfit - you could easily dress it up or down. So, if you're busty, size up to a large. I think anyone under 34DD could wear the medium.
A great casual works blouse. Perfect with leggings.
This shirt looks very good on, it has a loose fit and is quite long. The material is nice and the quality seems very high. I liked wearing this.

links_reviews_title: Not the classic silk Equipment shirt, but works okay!
links_reviews_text: Looser fit, perfect with a half tuck. Looks great with a basic jacket.
Ordered a small but should have gotten a medium. It was too tight across the bust. Decided not to wear it. It's a nice shirt, hangs well.
was a bit long in the back
Beautiful heavy fabric, perfect buttoned up with a necklace for work.
Makes you look sophisticated. Fits loosely and very stylish

Typical fit for equipment blouses. Is actually a viscose twill, not the classic silk... means its drape is less fluid and "stiffer" - both pro and con. In my case, paired with the strong menswear inspired bold stripes (and menswear inspired is my favorite work style)... it was actually a bit too severe for me. Maybe I just didnt style it right first go round... Regardless, very comfortable, would generally recommend.

links_reviews_title: Although it was a beautiful shirt, I didn't wear it because of the material.
links_reviews_text: Thick material, doesn't drape on your body.
It's a simple, everyday dress. Nothing too exciting. The empire wasitline emphasis my 36F boobs and made my stomach/hips look wider. I wore it running errands and to a dinner. IG: @noellevenegas

Love this pick - rented a cropped jean jacket to cover the top half in airport etc - I am 32 DD and it fit BUT def pushes you up ..... so needed a little coverage for the out and about vibe So cute with the asymmetrical hem. Def A little short in back and I am only 5'3" .... so beware when bending over Yes it "poufs" out a little bit at mid section don't know why but still a great dress. Not unflattering at all Paired with flat sandals and it was super cute Wore 3 times. May even buy it. It's that great !!!
Rented this for a beach vacation. Read other reviews that said to size up and I'm happy I did. Perfect fit...very short but I'm very short so it all worked out. Looks great with a denim jacket.
Wore this two days in a row! Super cute and flattering. Perfect white dress for dinner out or running around on the weekend.

I absolutely loved this dress and received compliments when I wore it out! It's super comfortable to wear and isn't too short so it can be worn to various day events. I would love to purchase if the discounted rate increases, but I think I would size down the next time. I'm typically a 2/4 and ordered a 4, but I feel like the chest area would have fit a bit better if I sized down and the dress wouldn't have billowed out as much. Still wearable with the larger size though!

links_reviews_title: I was graduating and paired this dress with a cute pink denim jacket and some brown leather booties
links_reviews_text: It was perfect! it runs a small large so I ended up wearing the xs but it worked out!
This is one of my favs! Easy to dress up or down. Love this dress!
Great fit. Hard to find a white dress that works. The material is thick enough that you cannot see through and no need for a bra! It is very short, though.

links_reviews_title: SO comfortable - great for summer parties
links_reviews_text: Fit Great - very comfortable - lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: cute with denim jacket and white sneaks
links_reviews_text: fit well a little low cut for work

Rented for vacation. Was cute to wear but little tight in chest and waste. There's no give the way it zips and the way it's made. Thicker cotton than I expected and material and ruffles made it look a little 'young'. Kind of cheapish but ok day dress for beach dinner
Cute dress, nothing crazy. Pretty short

I loved this dress. It's a cute little dress but it has some structure to it. It's pretty short even on me and feels very beachy. I wouldn't wear it around the city even in the summer but for a lunch or even night near the beach it was a perfect.
If you have any booty, forget about it. Im petite with pear-shape body and couldn't wear it. Fits great on the top part

links_reviews_title: Cute but should have gotten a medium
links_reviews_text: Was pretty short and tight in the boobs. Cute dress though, very well made.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy dress that bubbles up in the belly area.
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfy dress that bubbles up in the belly area.

links_reviews_title: Needs Layering to Make It Work
links_reviews_text: As the photo of the model hints at, you probably want to think through what you're going to pair with this dress. It needs "stuff" to pull it off. I paired a denim jacket (thank you for that idea, RTR) and ended up with some capri black leggings under it as well. It was SO short, and I'm only 5'4". I just didn't feel comfortable at the thought of a small gust of wind or a slight bend at the waist. There would be undies happening pretty quick under either circumstance. So overall, I would say it's sort of a fun, one-time deal, but I'd never rent it again and wouldn't want to own it. If you're tall, it will be a top. No doubt about it.
pretty weird dress, maybe for someone taller it would look better, but it was pretty poofy and awkward looking
Wore for a low key bridesmaid luncheon the day before my wedding! It was great!
Looks amazing and flattering! Definitely could have gotten away with wearing the small. Lined so didn't have to worry about undergarments. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size! On the shorter side as someone who is 5' 9" but was still very comfortable to wear because of how flowy the dress is!
Wore this for a winter birthday and got a ton of compliments, the coat is made well and actually warm! Pockets are an added bonus.

I got so many compliments on this coat! It felt very glamorous. It was also really warm and comfortable. While I rented it for a party, I also wore it during the day, and it was roomy enough to wear a thick sweater underneath.
I loved this coat!!! Not a usual style I’d choose, but Im so happy I did. I wore it quite a few times, and it kept me nice and warm.

links_reviews_title: Very soft and warm but runs large
links_reviews_text: I was looking for a jacket to match a dress I ordered but the only black fur coat they had was this in a large. I did not wear it but I imagine if I had been able to order a size small, it would have worked out better

links_reviews_title: Super cozy and warm coat! Runs oversized
links_reviews_text: Wore this coat all weekend for lunch, drinks, errands -- everything! Super cozy and warm but definitely oversized. I recommend sizing down if you want it to be a semi-normal fit.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a ski trip since I don't ski
links_reviews_text: Loved this coat. Fits large and can wear anything under it. Super warm.
Rented this coat for a trip to Aspen and wore it several times. It ran a little large, but nothing I couldn't deal with. It was lightweight, but still very warm.
Super unflattering, definitely runs large and makes me look like a giant walking puppet.

Fit perfectly and I'm a S-M when it comes to coats, small in the body but usually get mediums bc I have long arms. This coat fit perfectly. I wore it for a GNO, it was snowing and cold but I was kept perfectly warm with this in tow. I was afraid it would be overbearing for my small frame but it was the perfect amount of fluff. Other than my boyfriend calling me a pimp I would say it was a win.
I rented this for a trip to Wisconsin, and it kept me warm! Very versatile.

links_reviews_title: Fun jacket to try for a change of pace
links_reviews_text: Fun jacket! Oversized pea coat style. The faux fur is good quality. Got a bunch of compliments on it. Totally not my usual style, but that's why it was fun to try through RTR.
Rented this for a wedding weekend in Maine. Loved having it. It was very cozy, but looked great. Felt perfect for formal East Coast winter.

links_reviews_title: Took this on a ski trip for evenings out. It was so much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved the jacket. It does run a bit large so size down.
Great jacket worn on thanksgiving! Would rent again

I wore this for my wedding rehearsal dinner. It is an adorable coat and I got many compliments. It fits true to size, a little on the looser side (not form fitting). The arms were long enough for my long arms (I'm 5'7" with arms on the longer side). It was also VERY warm. I wore on a fairly mild day in November and took it off immediately when going inside. It would be great in really cold weather.
I lived in this jacket. It's perfect. Def order if you're tall it's all the right lengths
Absolutely love this coat. I live in New York and it's warm enough for winter - walking around everyday wear or dress up for a night out

I love this jacket. It’s very warm and the fake fur is really well done. It is a beautiful deep black color. This is a very warm, fluffy, thick jacket. It might overwhelm a smaller framed person. The only problem I had was not with the jacket, but with the cleaning. It smells like someone dunked it in febreeze. It made all of the garments shipped with it smell heavily enough to where my friends were sneezing when they got near me.
I wore this several times over the week I had it. I loved the look and felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: On Trend and warm, big enough to wear a winter sweater underneath
links_reviews_text: Bulky and not very flattering but still love it. Rented to take with me on a ski trip as my "going out" coat.
Very comfy. Cozy. Lot's of compliments
Great fun coat buttons are loose

links_reviews_title: The jacket was so warm and chic!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED THIS JACKET! So warm and cute and it is a great length not too long or short. Would definitely recommend!
I think your dry cleaning has spoiled the fabric of this jacket And it smells of the product!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Fun for something different to wear for a work trip
links_reviews_text: Great...super comfy.
It fits true to size and is warm and comfortable but I didn't wear it out because it was unseasonably warm out.
Fit well and warm. I have long arms and the sleeves were just barely long enough.
Not the softest faux fur.

This coat is soft and fuzzy and you just want to pet it. But it is A LOT of coat. The coat is big and loose and longer than I expected. It is also very thick and furry. I kind of looked like I was being hugged by a big black bear. Obviously, I couldn't wear it out, but I did want to spend some time snuggling with it.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I love this skirt! Great for work to going out. Excellent price for travel because it's very versatile. I love the frayed bottom and asymmetrical line down the front. 5 stars!

Absolutely love this skirt! I wish I would have been able to order it earlier in the season because it is perfect for warm days. I love that it covers my legs but has the big slit for air flow. Will definitely rent again.

I loved this skirt. If it was a touch less expensive, I would buy it. Both times I wore it, I leaned into the Western aesthetic, but you could definitely style it in different ways. I'm about 5'2" and this skirt hit about mid-calf, and fit well around my natural waist. Loved the fit and how I felt in it!

Wanted to keep this but would never pay $300 for a denim skirt. I wore this several times over a month or two and was sad to give it back. So simple and easy to wear when it's warm and you don't feel like wearing a dress or skirt.
The material is a good weight denim for such a long skirt. It has slits in both the front and back to make it easier to walk.

Love this skirt- had been waiting to get my hands on this style. Perfect fit and an easy way to try out this long skirt trend. There is not too much stretch so I recommend sizing up if you need more room in the hips.
I loved this skirt, but struggled with it because I'm curvy and it has no give. I also sized up and glad I did. I am wearing the 6 instead of my normal 4.

I loved this skirt, and as some other reviews have said, the slit does run pretty high. The design is so cute, but I found the waist to run big. I could have easily worn a size smaller and I usually wear a 27 or 28 waist pant.
Loved the idea. Too snug on my curves though
Liked this one. It fit well and the length was perfect. My only complaint is that the slit in front and back is pretty high. Had to pay attention to how I sat in it so it wouldn't be too revealing!
Super cute. But should have gone with a size up.
Easy to work into wardrobe

I loved this as a alternative "basic" look. Wore with both a tee and with a sweater. Looked casual yet totally put together. Personally, I liked the length, but may feel a bit too long for shorter ladies.

links_reviews_title: This really tight and I couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Very tight fit
Runs to big on the waist

Perfectly flattering button down with a twist. The waist tie adds that extra little pop of style. Even better if you have a tiny waist, as it modestly accentuates your curves! Love the hidden buttons and how you can wear the top buttons undone without revealing much. Makes for a very casual yet fashionable addition to a "routine" work outfit.
I really like this blouse! The fit was awesome. Very tailored and a bit stretchy so it's super comfortable. Would definitely rent again and recommend.

links_reviews_title: Nice shirt-but has seen better days.
links_reviews_text: This is a great shirt - but it has seen better days. It looks kind of "tired"
This shirt is precious. It is comfy and fits great. I highly recommend it. I styled it differently than the model (as you can see in pic) and I liked it better. More fun for sure!

I love this shirt. It's flattering, trendy, and professional. The only issue is it wrinkles easily, so I had to spend a good amount of time de-wrinkling it before wearing. It also wrinkled throughout the day. I wouldn't want to own it for that reason, but it's nice to rent.

I usually stay away from button down shirts as always have to size up for my chest and the. It's too baggy everywhere else. The twist tie in the front solves my usual dilemma. Received many compliments.

Loved the tie detail. Turned a classic white button down into a trendy less stuffy feeling piece. Fits tts or perhaps runs a little large? Only because I did not have any gapping and that is always an issue with button downs around the bust. Good length in arms and torso even though I'm short.

The shirt runs small; I wear a medium and the large fit perfectly. Not a problem, just size up. This shirt hits my waist in exactly the right place. I have a large chest and there was minimal gaping. I will look for this shirt once it hits clearance and purchase. Love it! One thing to note - you can see my bra through the fabric. Not too bad and still appropriate for work and most white button down shirts do that but just be aware of it.
Loved this top! The tie is slimming and makes the top more interesting. I wore this with a white tank top underneath. The material is super soft and not starchy! Would rent again.
I LOVED this top. It definitely looked better on than in this picture. It was a very classy look. The top has some stretch to it so it was very comfortable and flattering to wear.
Love the detail on this shirt. The shirt was large but the tie allows you to adjust better. Perfect with skinny pants and heels.

links_reviews_title: Unique detail for a white collared shirt
links_reviews_text: I really loved this shirt! It was great to wear with skinny work pants and heels. Unique detail (tie) made it stand out from the regular button up shirt. I did wear a black undershirt with it bc white shirts are always just to see through for work for me.
Great "twist" on the average white blouse. Looks good with a skirt, jeans, or work pants.

links_reviews_title: Great work shirt with a twist!
Fits nicely, great for work to HH.
links_reviews_text: Fits well, stretches so it's not tight but fitted, goes well with everything from jeans to leather leggings.

links_reviews_title: So cute but shirt is tired
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt but it's sort of dingy and getting that slightly blue look of too much dry cleaning. Wish it was newer as it fits great and could add pizzazz to so many outfits
Fit was ok, could have gone down a size. Material is very see through.

links_reviews_title: Love this top! Nice neutral for work.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect for me and complimented my figure.

links_reviews_title: Perfect white button up for work
links_reviews_text: Fit me perfectly. the tie in the front made it more forgiving too and drew the eye upward. The buttons are nicely hidden (and they don't do that weird thing where people can see your boobs through the button down part). Lovely piece for work.

links_reviews_title: I've rented this shirt before and really liked it- it this time
links_reviews_text: Shirt case with a big dark smudge in the sleeve, and it is no longer a nice bright white shirt, very dingy looking. Super disappointing
This top fit well and was very professional. I liked the tie in the front. I didn't button all the way up like it shows on the model and it still looked nice.
Great fit just not my style
Super flattering and comfy. I have already rented it more than once.

links_reviews_title: Accentuates the waist nicely. Great for day and night.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and cut is very flattering. The con is that the fabric wrinkles easily, and after a few hours of wear the overall effect is frumpy.
Love the material. This is one of the softest most comfortable button downs I've worn. I usually avoid button downs and this didn't have any gaping issues, no restricted arm movement.

links_reviews_title: Nice style, the white a bit dull
links_reviews_text: I love the style of this top, but the white wasn't a true white when it arrived. It's clearly been used as the white is a bit gray now. After I ironed it, it did look better and I wore it once under a blazer. This is a top I might buy new.
The bow drew attention right to the middle of my stomach, which felt/looked awkward.
Fit true to size, the stretch is awesome and makes it more comfortable than your typical button-down. Bow is precious.
Great fit. I'm pear shaped so it was nice to have the bow to make it more fitted to my shape.

links_reviews_title: I love this shirt. Modern twist to a classic. The tie helps define the waist very well.
links_reviews_text: Sexy classic
fitted but not to the point that buttons "gap" around the bust, the front tie adds a little something different than a straight button down
Didnt wear to the event
Surprisingly comfortable dress shirt, fit great, no gaping at bust
Great fit
Great fit
Kind of stretchy material- fit great. It looked over worn though- not a bright white and not in a good way- just looked old.
Love how this fit my curvy petite body. It was a perfect twist on the classic

links_reviews_title: Loved the design but not the shirt.
links_reviews_text: Loved the design but the shirt I received looked like it had seen better days. A bit gray and very wrinkled. Pulls in your waist very nicely. Great turn on a classic white button down.
Cute top but needs a certain kind of bottom in order to show off the cut front knot of the top
This was a great work staple. Bow detail at front made it unique, and slimming. Would highly recommend for work.
